translation.HS: Islam is a religion incompatible with the values
translation.CN: False, most Muslims respect republican values.

translation.HS: A Muslim is loyal only to Allah (as a comment in relation to election for public office etc.).
translation.CN: We are all doing our best for our country under God.

translation.HS: You think these Muslim cockroaches have won? No, now is time for bloody retribution!
translation.CN: Didn't realise we were against each other. [insert number of Muslim doctors] seems like they're making Britain stronger.

translation.HS: Islam is fanaticism. Muslims want to kill all who do not believe in their god.
translation.CN: God forgive them, because they don't know what they say. But it is a sign of a profound historical, cultural and human ignorance.

translation.HS: We should not trust any Muslim, they all could become a terrorist.
translation.CN: And views like that, that lumps all Muslims together, pretends they are less than human pushes them a tiny bit closer.

translation.HS: People go to prison for just words against Muslims, but Islamic crimes against Europeans are left unpunished. People are banned from UK for just words, but Muslim rapists are allowed to enter. English laws persecute us instead of defending us, English people.
translation.CN: Evidence for this? All crime and hatred is wrong.

translation.HS: Muslims are the ones who invented the slave trade.
translation.CN: Non-muslims are the ones who used slavery to build the foundations of western society and relied on it to advance capitalism. What is your point?

translation.HS: The veiled women do not work. They are locked up at home.
translation.CN: There are many emancipated veiled women who take on responsibilities in associations working for the good.

translation.HS: Muslims: return to your country.
translation.CN: There is a Muslim country ?? Either I'm noob in geography or there is a problem with your proposition.

translation.HS: Muslims have nothing to contribute to our society.
translation.CN: Muslims donate more to charity than any other group, contribute more than 30 billion pounds to the UK economy and make up a significant part of our NHS workforce. I think that is quite a nice contribution.

translation.HS: Muslims hate Christians. They want to kill all of us.
translation.CN: I'm sorry if you have had such a dramatic experience, I assure you that living together may also be non-traumatic, and that in most cases it is.

translation.HS: Muslims are all fundamentalist Islamist Salafist terrorists.
translation.CN: Terrorists would be very happy if this was the case.

translation.HS: I've been into Muslim shops in areas of Birmingham and they have refused to serve me. I've even seen signs saying 'No Whites After 8pm'.
translation.CN: Please provide evidence and if true hatred does not justify hatred.

translation.HS: We have been at war with Islam for a thousand years.
translation.CN: Says who?

translation.HS: Islam is a religion of war, we must all fight.
translation.CN: The armed war is the last resort to defend yourself against an oppressor.

translation.HS: Almost all Muslims deliberately decide not to work.
translation.CN: Replace Muslim with any other group and can you see how false this statement is?

translation.HS: Muslims are all terrorists.
translation.CN: Islam is a religion of peace misinterpreted by a tiny minority that does not make all Muslims terrorists.

translation.HS: Veiled women are subjected and forced to wear the headscarf.
translation.CN: How is it a submission to hide your attire?

translation.HS: We are seeing more and more of a Muslim problem.
translation.CN: If for you, praying and doing good is a problem, then you are the problem.

translation.HS: We breed pigs to feed muslims.
translation.CN: You cannot force a person to eat something that does not want to eat. Everyone is free to decide what is better for themselves.

translation.HS: Islam is fanaticism. Muslims want to kill all who do not believe in their god.
translation.CN: The Sufis are Islamic, a particularly loving trend and linked to the arts such as music, dance and poetry. Nothing to do with murder.

translation.HS: Muslims hate Christians. They want to kill all of us.
translation.CN: Muslims don't hate Christians. Christians have much in common with Muslims in the religious field. Furthermore, the Koran proclaims religious tolerance.

translation.HS: Islam pretends to be a religion but in reality it is only a moon cult.
translation.CN: What makes Islam any less valid than any other religion?

translation.HS: All Muslims should be deported, no one wants them here.
translation.CN: Where do we deport the Muslims who were born here to?

translation.HS: Someone needs to put those Muslims in a hole in the ground before they start to blow us all up again.
translation.CN: Far-right extremism has been named by the government as the biggest terrorist threat to the UK. These are the people you should be looking out for not, Muslims.

translation.HS: Your veil is an attack against me.
translation.CN: How would you feel if I were to say to you that your cap is an aggression against me ?

translation.HS: The Islamic veil is the demonstration of political Islam.
translation.CN: Islam is one thing, politics is another.

translation.HS: Muslims: return to your country.
translation.CN: No, I just cannot because I am an Arab outside and a French inside.

translation.HS: Quran is the root of all the world's problems today. Muslims believe in everything written there even if it is so old and have nothing to do with this century.
translation.CN: You make it sound like the 'Necromonicon'. Besides, isn't 'money the root of all evil'?

translation.HS: Islam is fanaticism. Muslims want to kill all who do not believe in their god.
translation.CN: The true Islam does not coincide with the alleged version that those who kill in the name of their religion claim to be inspired by.

translation.HS: The vast majority of Muslims are unemployed and refuse to work.
translation.CN: Around 12% of Muslims in the UK are unemployed, please do some basic research before posting fake statistics.

translation.HS: Our state will become Islamic, a home for Muslims and a prison for those who oppose it. It is the goal of the government!
translation.CN: Are you forced to pray in a Mosque? Or observe all the rules? As far as I see it, Muslims follow their traditions, that is their right, but they do not convert anyone in our society.

translation.HS: People who criticize Islam and its traits in our country - rape gangs and terrorism - are being banned, but this will not end well. People are driven to the right - the only ones who can openly talk about it!
translation.CN: I think people are banned because they create insulting behavior and fear, which should be stopped. Besides, the majority of Muslims who follow Islam are kind people. Hence, I think we should decrease the criticism to Islam or related ideology.

translation.HS: It is one law for Muslims and another law for us.
translation.CN: Yes, as well as everything non-Muslims aren't allowed to do by law, Muslims also have to put up with hateful bigotry and prejudice from people like you.

translation.HS: Islam is a religion incompatible with the values
translation.CN: Islam also advocates freedom, equality and fraternity. This is visible in many verses and prophetic words.

translation.HS: Quran is the root of all the world's problems today. Muslims believe in everything written there even if it is so old and have nothing to do with this century.
translation.CN: Despite this book being 1400 years old and not belonging to our century as you say, can you provide other reasons why this book is dreadful? Because I am struggling to figure this out.

translation.HS: The Islamic veil is the demonstration of political Islam.
translation.CN: Do you have proof of what you say. Who is the leader of this political Islam?

translation.HS: Muslims rape our women and must be neutered.
translation.CN: It's not just Muslims who rape women. The punishment that you propose does not seem effective to me. The judge of a court decides the real punishment for a rapist.

translation.HS: Islam is brainwashing its faithful. It is a horrible cult made of persons that reproduce continuously.
translation.CN: A large proportion of NHS workers are Asian, and many Muslim. Without them we would not have a free 24/7 healthcare service.

translation.HS: Muslims are all fundamentalist Islamist Salafist terrorists.
translation.CN: You couldn't even define any of these terms clearly, without thinking.

translation.HS: Afghanistan or maybe Pakistan? I bet this does not look like an English town to you? #saville Town (Text accompanying video footage of people on their way to Friday prayers etc. )
translation.CN: What is wrong with accepting and understanding people of different backgrounds?

translation.HS: You might say, Don't worry, only 5-10% of Muslims are extremists. Remember, in 1940 only 7% of Germans were Nazi's.
translation.CN: So more than 95% are fighting extremism and spreading peace and tolerance, there are extremists in every group.

translation.HS: British laws betray every victim of Muslim rapists! There is one rule for muslim paedos and one for everyone else! How can we change the situation when the government is submitting to Islam so much?
translation.CN: Our society indeed has special funding and treatments for immigrants as they are in a vulnerable position. Does it mean that the government is submitting to them? To me it means being humane! You should try to immigrate to another country and then decide whether you feel good as an immigrant or not.

translation.HS: Islam is a medieval religion.
translation.CN: Islam is a timeless and universal religion.

translation.HS: The veil is contrary to secularism.
translation.CN: No secularism is against the veil.

translation.HS: We are seeing more and more of a Muslim problem.
translation.CN: Political recovery.

translation.HS: The Arabs are all terrorists and they want to conquer us with the violence and the bombs. We must respond with napalm.
translation.CN: In Europe we have different forms of terrorism eta, ira, even in Italy we have had various forms of terrorism, black and red. Even the Mafia has used terrorist strategies.

translation.HS: Die islamic!
translation.CN: Today is widespread hostility against the Islamic religion, your words are the proof. In fact the Islamists are nothing more than people who follow and believe in a monotheistic religion that has at its base the love of God and the brotherhood, nothing less than the Christian religion.

translation.HS: Muslims steal our work.
translation.CN: This comment is so unfounded.

translation.HS: Muslims in China were forced to eat pork and drink alcohol during the recent Chinese New Year celebration - At least China is doing it right!!
translation.CN: Aren't you expressing support for a form of torture? Whatever happened to 'British values'?

translation.HS: Everything will be better if Muslims did not exist. Their only contribution to our society is violence.
translation.CN: I am tired of all the scapegoating and a complete failure to look closer to home or really listen to children when it comes to their protection. Find out what is really going on #InquiryCSA #Truthproject.

translation.HS: Europe is civilised, Muslims should not stay there.
translation.CN: Muslims have been in Europe since the 6th century and they belong here as much as anyone else.

translation.HS: I am done with Islam and isis. All Muslims should be sent to their homeland. Britain will be better without their violence and ideology.
translation.CN: Saying that all Muslims are criminals is just wrong. They also do share British values.

translation.HS: Did you know that the rape epidemic in Europe is due to Muslim immigrants? They have been raping our children for many years with no counteraction from the police and government. Islam is a death cult!
translation.CN: The media is selective in the rape stories it shows. Muslim perpetrators are vastly over-represented, and non-muslim offenders are often ignored in the headlines. Https://www.theguardian.com/commentisfree/2018/nov/11/84-per-cent-of-grooming-gangs-are-asians-we-dont-know-if-that-figure-is-right

translation.HS: Muslims use corporal and cruel punishment on people.
translation.CN: Have you ever spoken to a muslim?

translation.HS: Will Ramadan stop Muslims from terrorism and raping children? Likely it won't.
translation.CN: Crime and criminals are not dependent on any culture. Christian criminals are also not held by religious events. It is just not correct to align religion and criminality.

translation.HS: It is curious that almost all easter eggs are being labelled 'chocolate eggs'. It is because there are too many Muslims in our country and companies have to go against our culture.
translation.CN: Nobody is deceiving our culture as we still know what Easter eggs are and what they are for. Deceiving would be just banning the eggs!

translation.HS: If someone wrote the Koran to the present day it would not be allowed.
translation.CN: In fact at no point does the Quran tell people to Hate or kill others. There are a lot of lies and out of context quotes floating around. It does however instruct people to behave justly towards non believers and prevents forced conversion.

translation.HS: Muslims cannot add any value to our culture.
translation.CN: Muslims have contributed much to the UK due to their sterling educational achievements. More than half of Muslim schools in England surpass the national percentage GCSE average of 5 or more GCSE's or equivalent A*-C grades including English and Math GCSEs. This enables Muslims to work in important fields of Medicine and Law amongst others to enrich the lives of UK citizens.

translation.HS: The Arabs want to impose their religion and to rule in our home. They must be sent back to their house on boats.
translation.CN: All religions speak of acceptance and love, the Bible as the Koran. Some possessed, on the one hand and on the other, cannot obstruct a quiet life among humans.

translation.HS: We cannot even take the dog for a walk, we could offend Muslims.
translation.CN: Actually the Quran quite likes dogs, animals and if you read it carefully all people even non believers, like Christianity its only God /Allah that should judge.

translation.HS: Talking of shitholes, I have to go to Londonistan tomorrow #LondonHasFallen.
translation.CN: Ooer, you might meet someone that looks a bit different to you.

translation.HS: Using violence to punish another person? Sounds like a muslim issue.
translation.CN: Just to note that muslims believe only god can punish or forgive. The violence seems to be your issue.

translation.HS: Muslims hate anyone who is not Muslim.
translation.CN: Could you provide us with supporting evidence (questionnaires and methodologies used.)? Sources?

translation.HS: All Muslims are incompatible with any Western society.
translation.CN: Muslims have been part of Western society for centuries and centuries, they helped shape and design Western society- to say they are incompatible is a complete incongruity.

translation.HS: Liberal double standards! Muslims oppress women, homosexuals and other cultures but are not held responsible due to our society's tolerance! The government should stop submitting to these people.
translation.CN: If we ignore what fundamentalists of other faiths practice in relation to LGBT and Women's rights, are we not also guilty of double standards?

translation.HS: The veiled women do not work. They are locked up at home.
translation.CN: Accept me with my veil.

translation.HS: Islam is a religion incompatible with the values
translation.CN: The republic by definition guarantees freedom of worship.

translation.HS: Muslims are two-faced, have you ever seen a Muslim protest against Isis or Saudi human right abuses?
translation.CN: Because the act of one person or group is not reflective of an entire faith.

translation.HS: Muslims cannot add any value to our culture.
translation.CN: Muslims donate more to charity than any other group, contribute more than 30 billion pounds to the UK economy and make up a significant part of our NHS workforce. I think that is quite a nice contribution.

translation.HS: The veil is contrary to secularism.
translation.CN: The goal is freedom of conscience, the purpose is non-discrimination on the basis of religion.

translation.HS: We are seeing more and more of a Muslim problem.
translation.CN: If by problem you mean that Muslims are investing a public space that was forbidden to them until a few decades ago, it is not society that has a Muslim problem, it is you who have a hate problem.

translation.HS: Muslims are a problem in my opinion. They do not want to assimilate. They demand that everyone shows respect for Islam, but do they respect our laws? They establish sharia laws and polygamy.
translation.CN: Everyone has to follow British laws, this is simply how it is. So yes, Muslim people do respect our law. I haven't seen anyone breaking the law and then getting away with it.

translation.HS: Islam is a religion incompatible with the values
translation.CN: Many values

translation.HS: The majority of immigrants are Muslims. It's useless to deny that this invasion, certainly peaceful, will bring in our society the Sharia. Glad you, if sharia represents culture and enrichment!
translation.CN: For who would represent an enrichment?

translation.HS: Your veil is an attack against me.
translation.CN: It is similar to saying that your haircut is an attack against humanity.

translation.HS: Islam is barbaric.
translation.CN: Islam is a religion of peace, love and brotherhood.

translation.HS: Will Ramadan stop Muslims from terrorism and raping children? Likely it won't.
translation.CN: Why would it? Why such hatred towards an entire faith?

translation.HS: Liberal ideas are wrong, they want us to think that Islam is good but in reality it is a cult about war and violence.
translation.CN: There are criminals, who are from UK, raping children and murdering people. Maybe it's better we should first focus on these cases and think how we could decrease the number of crimes.

translation.HS: It is true that there are some Muslims that aren't terrorists, but all terrorists are Muslims.
translation.CN: I do not see a lot of news articles about far right terrorism even though it is much more prevalent and is considered the biggest and fastest growing threat.

translation.HS: Muslims: return to your country.
translation.CN: To return, I will need a return ticket to France.

translation.HS: The veiled women do not work. They are locked up at home.
translation.CN: In France, we have a misinterpretation of secularism. In England, go and see the veiled women work in all branches and even in the public service.

translation.HS: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
translation.CN: Why? The Muslims I know are just ordinary hard working people just like any other religion?

translation.HS: We are seeing more and more of a Muslim problem.
translation.CN: It is the media that feed this fear.

translation.HS: All Muslims are incompatible with any Western society.
translation.CN: Yes, their teachings of peace and tolerance really are incompatible in the hate-infested discriminatory Western society nowadays.

translation.HS: We are seeing more and more of a Muslim problem.
translation.CN: There is no Muslim problem, there are only human problems, Islam is a religion of positivity.

translation.HS: Islam hates women.
translation.CN: The Qur'an honors some women such as Mary (mother of Jesus) and the wife of Pharaoh.

translation.HS: What have Muslims ever done for us?
translation.CN: [insert picture of first/second world war Muslim soldiers, example The World's War, Forgotten Soldiers of Empire] they have fought and died for our country.

translation.HS: The Arabs are all terrorists and they want to conquer us with the violence and the bombs. We must respond with napalm.
translation.CN: The Arabs are a people rich in culture and history and also in contradictions as the so-called Westerns and inciting hatred is uncivilized and blind.

translation.HS: All Muslims should be deported, no one wants them here.
translation.CN: The negative stereotypes and extreme examples in the media are not representative of all Muslims. Don't believe everything you read.

translation.HS: Muslims rape our women and must be neutered.
translation.CN: I am an Italian woman, and I feel neither a propriety of you nor threatened by Muslims.

translation.HS: Using violence to punish another person? Sounds like a muslim issue.
translation.CN: Actions of a few people do not represent an entire community.

translation.HS: Muslims: return to your country.
translation.CN: I'm certainly more patriotic than you.

translation.HS: Islam is Evil! That is one word that can describe it. We are in trouble as this evil is taking over countries and nations! Remember our Holy Scriptures? You shall not envy anyone anything. This includes other countries' territory. Stop Islam spreading!
translation.CN: The number of Muslims in the world is fast growing. Do you think if a religion is evil or teaches bad things, it will have that many followers?

translation.HS: Muslims are all terrorists.
translation.CN: Whatever.

translation.HS: Your veil is an attack against me.
translation.CN: Don't be mad, but I think that women do not dress to cause any particular emotion in you.

translation.HS: Some Muslims recited the Quran while raping a girl because it validates their actions.
translation.CN: There is never justification for rape. Individuals of all faiths have used their holy texts to justify all sorts of crimes. They carry the blame.

translation.HS: We welcome them in our house, we support them and they kill us: they are beasts, not men.
translation.CN: Actually now we do not want them, we discriminate them and throw them on the road and, despite all, murder cases made by them are less than ours.

translation.HS: The veiled women do not work. They are locked up at home.
translation.CN: They are victims of discrimination in hiring.

translation.HS: Muslims, their texts as hate literature, and other manifestations of hate and genocide should be eradicated. We should have no tolerance towards this cult of hate! Imprison supporters of Islam, wake up Britain!
translation.CN: Islam is an ancient religion, and it is not hateful. You can ask any specialist in religion, Islam has nothing to deal with hate. If we imprison people based on their religious views, that would be chauvinism.

translation.HS: Veiled women are subjected and forced to wear the headscarf.
translation.CN: The veil is freedom for women.

translation.HS: It is obviously a mental illness, the conciliation to Islam and Muslims.
translation.CN: Maybe appeasement to people of different faith and beliefs is not such a bad thing. They call it tolerance.

translation.HS: Muslims cannot add any value to our culture.
translation.CN: Your afternoon tea.

translation.HS: Veiled women are subjected and forced to wear the headscarf.
translation.CN: In that case how do you explain that there are veiled women who are entrepreneurs? Do you know a lot of submissive entrepreneurs? An entrepreneur, by definition, is independent.

translation.HS: I am done with Islam and isis. All Muslims should be sent to their homeland. Britain will be better without their violence and ideology.
translation.CN: Saying that all people of a certain religion are violent criminals does not make sense at all.

translation.HS: We are seeing more and more of a Muslim problem.
translation.CN: Yes, because our glasses (media) are distorted.

translation.HS: If the Koran was published today it would be banned as hate speech.
translation.CN: I think any book written that long ago probably would.

translation.HS: A third of Britons think that Islam and British values are incompatible because there is a fundamental clash.
translation.CN: Therefore, 62% of Britons see no incompatibility between Islam and 'British values'.

translation.HS: All the Muslims should have been punished for yesterday, not only a few. Citizens will take action if the government does not do anything.
translation.CN: I thought we'd stopped exporting our convicted criminals last century. Now you advocate exporting people without a trial or a conviction.

translation.HS: This is the ideology of islam: have a mosque, create a community, claim victimhood, gain support from government, exploit laws, establish sharia, take control of the country.
translation.CN: Aren't having a place of worship, building a community and maintaining your legal rights fundamental to how most societies are organised?

translation.HS: We welcome them in our house, we support them and they kill us: they are beasts, not men.
translation.CN: Even in Italy, there are cases of murder, and yet we consider ourselves a civilized and evolved people.

translation.HS: Everything will be better if Muslims did not exist. Their only contribution to our society is violence.
translation.CN: The world would be a better place without your intolerance, it only creates a divided, toxic society.

translation.HS: It is obviously a mental illness, the conciliation to Islam and Muslims.
translation.CN: But as Muslims contribute Billions to the economy, build SMEs, and contribute more than they take is not appeasing its gaining.

translation.HS: The veiled women do not work. They are locked up at home.
translation.CN: Well, listen to someone like me who is in Master's research in Educational Sciences. I'm well locked up ?.

translation.HS: Veiled women are subjected and forced to wear the headscarf.
translation.CN: If there were really soumission from islamic women, oppression and stigma would not be liberating means.

translation.HS: We are seeing more and more of a Muslim problem.
translation.CN: Change the pair of glasses, they are #islamophobic.

translation.HS: Muslims in a few years will impose their beliefs, and I want to see all the radical-chic bleeding hearts that will have to wear the veil!
translation.CN: The real oppression is to forbid a person to profess their religion, as sanctioned in the Universal Declaration of Human Rights. The veil is not imposed by Islam, at most by oppressive regimes that with the true nature of Islam have nothing to do.

translation.HS: We cannot trust the Muslims, they are all swindlers.
translation.CN: With such a false statement, it is sure that we cannot trust your judgement! This way of essentialisation will not convince anyone.

translation.HS: We should not trust any Muslim, they all could become a terrorist.
translation.CN: Every Islamophobic person has the potential to use that intent for terrorism or violence against Muslims. Terrorism comes in all shapes and sizes.

translation.HS: Muslims use corporal and cruel punishment on people.
translation.CN: That is what biased news reports would have you believe, but violent incidents are committed by people of all faiths, muslims just get reported on more.

translation.HS: These animals.
translation.CN: Personally I've always reputed them people just like you and me. If you want you can try to explain your point of view.

translation.HS: Thousands of British girls are raped, enslaved or murdered by Muslims and other non-British immigrants. Woe to thee!
translation.CN: Do you know that domestic violence is even a bigger problem in our society? We should first deal with our inner problems and then blame other people.

translation.HS: Muslims rape our women and must be neutered.
translation.CN: On what basis do you do these statements? Actually, there are criminals everywhere and they have different ethnicities and religious affiliations. There are Italian rapists and Catholic priests that are paedophiles. But these cases should not allow us to identify all persons as criminals belonging to these categories.

translation.HS: Talking of shitholes, I have to go to Londonistan tomorrow #LondonHasFallen.
translation.CN: Good luck! Try not to talk to anyone or you might just get some perspective.

translation.HS: They constantly say that their religion is a 'religion of peace', maybe because in reality it isn't.
translation.CN: So you are saying an entire faith of 1.6 billion is not peaceful? This is ignorant.

translation.HS: Muslims are all terrorists.
translation.CN: Like any generality, this argument is not a general one.

translation.HS: Labour party counts upon the votes of Britain Muslims, that is why they do not deal with disgusting antisemitism from their side! It is a question of math, that is all.
translation.CN: Do you know the numbers of the votes of Britain Muslims?

translation.HS: Muslims are a problem in my opinion. They do not want to assimilate. They demand that everyone shows respect for Islam, but do they respect our laws? They establish sharia laws and polygamy.
translation.CN: Evidence for this? This is not true. How can you say this about an entire faith?

translation.HS: Muslims are all fundamentalist Islamist Salafist terrorists.
translation.CN: What do you mean by Salafist Islamists? We must avoid being dumbfounded by the continuous news channels BFM.

translation.HS: These Islamic will bring us back to the Middle Age. We will starve to death and die of diseases that disappeared.
translation.CN: Islam is a religion similar to Christianity, as much open. The extremisms are present in all religions.

translation.HS: We welcome them in our house, we support them and they kill us: they are beasts, not men.
translation.CN: Do you know the figures relating to reception costs for the new arrivals? And those that provide migrants each year to the Italian tax authorities?

translation.HS: It is curious that almost all easter eggs are being labelled 'chocolate eggs'. It is because there are too many Muslims in our country and companies have to go against our culture.
translation.CN: The companies can follow their own policies which are conditioned by globalization or marketing. It is not necessary to attribute everything to the Muslim invasion.

translation.HS: A real Islamic invasion is taking place.
translation.CN: Not true, Muslims are not invaders for definition, and Christianity is still the first religion in Italy.

translation.HS: We need to Burn the Koran and all the Mosques down - this will solve all problems in this country.
translation.CN: That sounds a lot like terrorism to me.

translation.HS: The Islamic veil is the demonstration of political Islam.
translation.CN: The lives of Muslim citizens must not be taken hostage under the pretext of creating an ideological concept.

translation.HS: You should not trust anyone in an Islamic area if you are an English girl: if someone offers you something do not take it and pay attention also to the police.
translation.CN: I mean, I would not take gifts of sweets or drugs from any strange men, what is religion got to do with it?

translation.HS: Muslims, if they cannot assimilate, they should emigrate.
translation.CN: One of the biggest barriers to assimilation is intolerance like this. Maybe if you made Muslims feel more welcome, they would?

translation.HS: A Muslim's only real allegiance is to Allah (as a comment in relation to election for public office etc.)
translation.CN: So you are saying that we should only allow non-religious people into public office?

translation.HS: They began to build mosques everywhere, and so they compete with our churches.
translation.CN: Try to see how many churches there are in Italy and how many mosques. If you lived in Dubai, and the situation was reversed, wouldn't you want that there was at least one church?

translation.HS: These despicable Muslims hadn't won yet. Now there will be a cruel punishment!
translation.CN: Bloody retribution? Most people of all faiths are just getting on with their lives and a tiny minority like your comment seems to be trying to create conflict. But I do not think any of you are winning.

translation.HS: Go on talking to yourself, no one will listen. Islam does not belong within western society. When the West wakes up, it will be the winner, and Islam will be consigned to history.
translation.CN: The only obstacle to Islam coexisting with Western culture is intolerance like this.

translation.HS: One of many Pakistani rapist.we should extradite them from our country.
translation.CN: Why do you call Pakistan a disgusting country? It has its culture and values. We cannot say that every Pakistani person is a rapist. Thus, you should not insult all the Pakistani people.

translation.HS: Europe is civilised, Muslims should not stay there.
translation.CN: Why not? 'civilised' Europe could benefit from the diversity and expertise of Muslims here, the mix of cultures here is what makes Europe great.

translation.HS: Shocking. 2 men are murdered in Paris by having their throats cut by some savage shouting 'Allahu Akbar' and the BBC ignore the story. Another cover up.
translation.CN: Mate, the media is constantly biased against Muslims and tries to make them out to be the enemy. What we hardly ever see is the many more positive stories.

translation.HS: Never share a meal with a Muslim: you could catch HIV or Ebola.
translation.CN: Are you talking about the Muslim doctors and medical researchers treating and finding cures for these illnesses?

translation.HS: The Arabs are all terrorists and they want to conquer us with the violence and the bombs. We must respond with napalm.
translation.CN: Arabs is just a generic word just like Europeans or Americans that does not consider the thousand existing differences and in any case sowing fear is the real gesture to be condemned.

translation.HS: They began to build mosques everywhere, and so they compete with our churches.
translation.CN: I do not see any mosque.

translation.HS: Islam is a cult and not a religion. They rape children, enslave and murder people, attack our values, and there is nothing good about it. It is incompatible with our way of life.
translation.CN: There are criminals, who are from UK, raping children and murdering people. Maybe it's better we should first focus on these cases and think how we could decrease the number of crimes.

translation.HS: They are replacing us in our house! They should remain at their home to put on the burqa and beat their wives.
translation.CN: The percentage of Muslims in Italy is 5%, so I do not think it's possible to think that they are replacing us.

translation.HS: British laws are more in favor of Muslims. Muslims will not get punished if they commit a crime, but British people will.
translation.CN: Is it just words? Things I see in my life do not correspond with this opinion. To me it seems that all people are equally punished for crimes, be it a European person or an immigrant. Also, it is not correct to deny people entry based on their nationality.

translation.HS: It's a shame that there is no longer the crucifix in school, a lack of respect.

translation.HS: Islam is totalitarian: Muslims want to invade every country. If we want to live in a multicultural world we need some countries without Islam.

translation.HS: Muslims are all terrorists.

translation.HS: Islam will invade us: It is Islamization.

translation.HS: Muslims are all fundamentalist Islamist Salafist terrorists.

translation.HS: A real Islamic invasion is taking place.

translation.HS: We never see them protesting against ISIS or the Saudi human rights abuses, etc.? Because they are a bunch of hypocrites.

translation.HS: If the Koran was published today it would be banned as hate speech.

translation.HS: Muslims hate anyone who is not Muslim.

translation.HS: I am done with Islam and isis. All Muslims should be sent to their homeland. Britain will be better without their violence and ideology.

translation.HS: These Islamic will bring us back to the Middle Age. We will starve to death and die of diseases that disappeared.

translation.HS: Your veil is an attack against me.

translation.HS: If we want to solve the problem with islam and sharia we should deport them. Even if I respect Muslims that are peaceful I think that priests are trying to start a war. Islam is a worship.

translation.HS: The Arabs want to impose their religion and to rule in our home. They must be sent back to their house on boats.

translation.HS: Image (features protesters with signs such as 'behead those who insult Islam) with a caption saying 'How can we be Islamophobic when they really do want to kill us'.

translation.HS: Muslims: return to your country.

translation.HS: British laws are more in favor of Muslims. Muslims will not get punished if they commit a crime, but British people will.

translation.HS: Islam is a totalitarian doctrine dressed disguised as a religion so that it can spread across our tolerant Christian world. Enough IS ENOUGH!

translation.HS: Veiled women are subjected and forced to wear the headscarf.

translation.HS: The veiled women do not work. They are locked up at home.

translation.HS: Our children are being forced fed with this 'Islam' nonsense in schools. This is a disgrace.
translation.CN: Do you have any evidence that Islam is being forced fed? I did not think so.

translation.HS: There was another terrorist attack in France by a crazy Muslim person. His mental problem is actually called Islam!

translation.HS: Islam is just a bestial cult of brainwashed lunatics who breed like rats.

translation.HS: Your veil is an attack against me.

translation.HS: Muslims are all fundamentalist Islamist Salafist terrorists.

translation.HS: #visitmymosque.but pretend not to see that lots of white girls are abused by muslims grooming gangs in Rotherham, Rochdale,Tyneside,Teesside etc.

translation.HS: These Islamic will bring us back to the Middle Age. We will starve to death and die of diseases that disappeared.

translation.HS: The vast majority of Muslims are unemployed and refuse to work.

translation.HS: This came straight from an imam: they believe in everything that the Quran says, despite that these words and ideology are 1400 years old and dont belong to our century. This dreadful book is the root of all the world problems today.
translation.CN: I'd think the root of all the world problems today is over-population and ecology. Why do you blame Islam in all the problems?

translation.HS: Muslims are all terrorists.

translation.HS: Maybe not all muslims are violent but they all support the jihad and follow sharia law. Islam is fanaticism.

translation.HS: It's a shame that there is no longer the crucifix in school, a lack of respect.

translation.HS: Muslims: return to your country.

translation.HS: We welcome them in our house, we support them and they kill us: they are beasts, not men.

translation.HS: Islam will invade us: It is Islamization.

translation.HS: We should expel Muslims, everyone wants them out of the country.

translation.HS: Islamophobia is a right. Fighting Islam is a duty.

translation.HS: We aren't allowed to build churches in their countries, why should they be allowed to build Mosques in ours?

translation.HS: Our children are being forced fed with this 'Islam' nonsense in schools. This is a disgrace.

translation.HS: A Muslim's only real allegiance is to Allah (as a comment in relation to election for public office etc.)

translation.HS: All versions of Islam have sharia law, thus, they are all extreme. Not all Muslims are engaged in actual violences, but every Muslim knows that jihad is the core of their religion, and they all support it.
translation.CN: Don't most religions have instructions for what they deem to be 'righteous living', voluntary codes or laws (if you insist) for the faithful to follow. Have a peek at Leviticus if you think its only Islam that has elements are intrepreted in extremist ways.

translation.HS: In Birmingham there is a school where girls and boys are separated even if it isn't legal.
translation.CN: Gender segregation in faith schools is clearly a negative, but hardly exclusive to some Islamic schools. I was 15 before I attended mixed classes, but then, this was regarded as normal in the 1960's / 70's. The issue is really, if we are to allow faith based education, we need effective mechanisms to uphold standards, and legal requirements.

translation.HS: If they do not adapt to our culture, they can go away.

translation.HS: Since 2000, the number of suicide bombings by Muslims = 5284; by non-Muslims = 0. One of the fact about Global Terrorism no one wants to deal with.

translation.HS: Islam is a religion incompatible with the values

translation.HS: Muslims hate anyone who is not Muslim.

translation.HS: Because of the Muslims, Britain is no longer the great country of the past! They are a disease!

translation.HS: Muslims hate anyone who is not Muslim.

translation.HS: Muslims are all terrorists.

translation.HS: A Muslim is loyal only to Allah (as a comment in relation to election for public office etc.).

translation.HS: Isis bride wants to return to our country, we must not let her in! They aren't british! Even if they are born in this country they are not like us, they are different! Not british!

translation.HS: Watch out historical recurrences, this time blast-furnace will light!

translation.HS: Muslims: return to your country.

translation.HS: Veiled women are subjected and forced to wear the headscarf.

translation.HS: We welcome them in our house, we support them and they kill us: they are beasts, not men.

translation.HS: Muslims should go home.

translation.HS: We aren't allowed to build churches in their countries, why should they be allowed to build Mosques in ours?

translation.HS: They want to impose the veil on all of us.

translation.HS: The Islamic veil is the demonstration of political Islam.

translation.HS: Your veil is an attack against me.

translation.HS: These despicable Muslims hadn't won yet. Now there will be a cruel punishment!

translation.HS: Muslims have nothing to contribute to our society.

More than half of Muslim schools in England surpass the national percentage GCSE average of 5 or more GCSE's or equivalent A*-C grades including English and Math GCSEs. This enables Muslims to work in important fields of Medicine and Law amongst others to enrich the lives of UK citizens.

translation.HS: Islam is fanaticism. Muslims want to kill all who do not believe in their god.

translation.HS: Islam is not a religion, its just an excuse for retarded sexual psychopaths, bastards who pollute the world.

translation.HS: Quite strange, the majority of Easter Eggs are being labelled 'Chocolate Eggs', I think this is because of the Muslims in our country, and the companies are betraying our culture.

translation.HS: Muslims are weak-minded.

translation.HS: Nowadays the big problem in London is the presence of muslims, they must go away!

translation.HS: Muslims hate anyone who is not Muslim.

translation.HS: Islamophobia is a right. Fighting Islam is a duty.

translation.HS: Muslims are all terrorists.

translation.HS: Muslims use corporal and cruel punishment on people.

translation.HS: The Islamic veil is the demonstration of political Islam.

translation.HS: They want to impose the veil on all of us.

translation.HS: These liberal standards! Muslims are intolerant with other cultures, women and homosexuals, but our society protects them with this liberalist policy.

translation.HS: Veiled women are subjected and forced to wear the headscarf.

translation.HS: They began to build mosques everywhere, and so they compete with our churches.

translation.HS: Islam is a religion incompatible with the values
translation.CN: Think this is a sign of your ignorance.

translation.HS: You might say, Don't worry, only 5-10% of Muslims are extremists. Remember, in 1940 only 7% of Germans were Nazi's.

translation.HS: A Muslim's only real allegiance is to Allah (as a comment in relation to election for public office etc.)

translation.HS: Islam is fanaticism. Muslims want to kill all who do not believe in their god.

translation.HS: The Islamic veil is the demonstration of political Islam.
translation.CN: The Islam is not a policy, it is a religion.

translation.HS: All Muslims should be deported, no one wants them here.

translation.HS: The last bastion that we will have, will be the atomic bomb.

translation.HS: Don't call Islam a peaceful religion. Consult the evidence on Muslim child rapists. Children were raped by more than 10 people in a night, up to 100 in a week. Why is the media ignoring this?

translation.HS: Muslims cannot add any value to our culture.

translation.HS: The veiled women do not work. They are locked up at home.

translation.HS: Muslim women are all mothers at home.

translation.HS: Muslims hate Christians. They want to kill all of us.

translation.HS: We welcome them in our house, we support them and they kill us: they are beasts, not men.
translation.CN: They are men and women, just as we are; they are not all murderers, do not generalize.

translation.HS: Muslims hate Christians. They want to kill all of us.

translation.HS: We should expel Muslims, everyone wants them out of the country.
translation.CN: No, bad plan. So much less diversity and cultural richness.

translation.HS: Veiled women are subjected and forced to wear the headscarf.
translation.CN: The submission of the woman is these words made by uneducated people.

translation.HS: It appears I cannot criticize islam for being a cult which encourages wars and takes over host nations by any means justified by their scriptures. Can I critisize them for being intolerant, biased, sexist and chauvinist?
translation.CN: Have you ever truely understand the religion Islam, including its history, principles, or teaching? Islam actually teaches people to respect life and care for people. It is also what the majority of Muslims follow.

translation.HS: Islam hates women.
translation.CN: Islam values women in many ways: respect for the mother, the right to inheritance, the right to dispose of one's property without the consent of one's husband, equality with men before God.

translation.HS: The veiled women do not work. They are locked up at home.
translation.CN: Is this a survey? Or your thoughts?

translation.HS: Muslims are all terrorists.
translation.CN: Racist comments.

translation.HS: The majority of immigrants are Muslims. It's useless to deny that this invasion, certainly peaceful, will bring in our society the Sharia. Glad you, if sharia represents culture and enrichment!
translation.CN: ? I do not understand.

translation.HS: We need to kill Muslims, otherwise, they will make us explode!
translation.CN: Right-wing terrorism, especially terrorist activities perpetrated by the far-right are greater in number (in the US) than those motivated by Islamic extremism.

translation.HS: Muslims prevent people from eating during Ramadan.
translation.CN: You live on what planet?

translation.HS: Islam is a totalitarian doctrine dressed disguised as a religion so that it can spread across our tolerant Christian world. Enough IS ENOUGH!
translation.CN: The only thing that is ENOUGH is this discriminatory hate speech.

translation.HS: Muslims are all terrorists.
translation.CN: First learn what a Muslim is before judging.

translation.HS: It's a shame that there is no longer the crucifix in school, a lack of respect.
translation.CN: But a lack of respect to whom?

translation.HS: We welcome them in our house, we support them and they kill us: they are beasts, not men.
translation.CN: You cannot generalize the actions of a few (criminals) with the behavior of the majority, which lives with us peacefully.

translation.HS: Muslims do not want to integrate, they want to impose sharia. And then they ask for respect! They are a problem!
translation.CN: Every religious person would like their religion to be respected, this is not only Muslim people. Secondly, I've never seen them demanding everyone's respect?

translation.HS: Our children are being forced fed with this 'Islam' nonsense in schools. This is a disgrace.
translation.CN: Learning different religions so we can live in the inclusive society is nonsense? I strongly disagree.

translation.HS: Muslims cannot add any value to our culture.
translation.CN: Clearly, when they are working, shopping etc they are paying taxes? This is also a contribution to a society.in economic terms!

translation.HS: These Islamic will bring us back to the Middle Age. We will starve to death and die of diseases that disappeared.
translation.CN: Regarding diseases, it is a fake news that those arriving in Italy bring new illnesses: every immigrant, as soon as arrives on the Italian territory, undergoes medical prophylaxis.

translation.HS: The Islamic veil is the demonstration of political Islam.
translation.CN: It is political for those who feel attacked by this piece of cloth on one's head.

translation.HS: Islam is fanaticism. Muslims want to kill all who do not believe in their god.
translation.CN: Yes. And Mickey Mouse wants to shoot Pluto! But go and tell this to the Beagle Boys.

translation.HS: Muslims grooming gangs are protected by the government and the police. This is a betrayal!
translation.CN: Good job the police are so effective at catching and prosecuting non-Muslim sex-offenders and protecting their victims. Oh, wait.

translation.HS: Muslims are all fundamentalist Islamist Salafist terrorists.
translation.CN: This statement is like saying "Germans are all xenophobic anti-Semitic".

translation.HS: Muslims, their texts as hate literature, and other manifestations of hate and genocide should be eradicated. We should have no tolerance towards this cult of hate! Imprison supporters of Islam, wake up Britain!
translation.CN: In fact, muslim literatures are not about hate and genocide. The literature teaches people to improve oneself and the world, care for the poor, etc. Hence, I do not think we should eradicate the literature.

translation.HS: The Arabs are all terrorists and they want to conquer us with the violence and the bombs. We must respond with napalm.
translation.CN: There are Arab terrorists, as there are English terrorists, Italian and French. These stereotypes won't help us to fight terrorism.

translation.HS: Muslims are all fundamentalist Islamist Salafist terrorists.

translation.HS: Muslims use corporal and cruel punishment on people.

translation.HS: Islam is totalitarian: Muslims want to invade every country. If we want to live in a multicultural world we need some countries without Islam.

translation.HS: The Arabs are all terrorists and they want to conquer us with the violence and the bombs. We must respond with napalm.

translation.HS: We welcome them in our house, we support them and they kill us: they are beasts, not men.

translation.HS: Islam is a cult (even if I couldn't say that) that leads us to war, in addition to that they are intolerant, biased,sexist and so on.
translation.CN: How can you say such hateful things about an entire faith?

translation.HS: Muslims: return to your country.

translation.HS: Women and girls are harmed by Islamic that were allowed to enter in our country by our government.
