translation.HS: Someone needs to put those Muslims in a hole in the ground before they start to blow us all up again.
translation.CN: The West continually bombs Middle Eastern and Muslim countries. Maybe we should stop blowing people up.

translation.HS: If someone wrote the Koran to the present day it would not be allowed.
translation.CN: How often have you read the Quran and thought about its teachings? Or is your knowledge based on selected highlights? We all know there are exerts like that in the Bible too.

translation.HS: Finally a person who represents westerners, we hate Islam!
translation.CN: I think that is a stereotype mainly as a result of people know little about Islam and Muslims.

translation.HS: Did you know that the rape epidemic in Europe is due to Muslim immigrants? They have been raping our children for many years with no counteraction from the police and government. Islam is a death cult!
translation.CN: Scapegoating the Muslim community does not help us to prevent rape. It often instead leads to further violent crime committed against those groups who have been demonized.

translation.HS: We have been at war with Islam for a thousand years.
translation.CN: To the contrary, we have been trading with Muslim nations for hundreds of years, often at times when we were at war with other European nations.

translation.HS: The world is already lost, but US and UK face challenges from Islam. These are death cult, intolerance, barbarism, freedom, free speech, being gay, quran, jihad.
translation.CN: The world is not lost. We all face challenges, but if someone's culture is different from ours, it does not mean that they are evil and should be banned.

translation.HS: Islam is a religion incompatible with the values
translation.CN: Hate speech and unfounded judgement!

translation.HS: The majority of immigrants are Muslims. It's useless to deny that this invasion, certainly peaceful, will bring in our society the Sharia. Glad you, if sharia represents culture and enrichment!
translation.CN: What has sharia that does not convince you?

translation.HS: Muslims force their child to fast during Ramadan.
translation.CN: We educate our children to fast gradually but never force.

translation.HS: The Islamic veil is the demonstration of political Islam.
translation.CN: Maybe in other countries but not in France.

translation.HS: Muslims need to oppose child rapists instead of talking about islam all the time. This way they would be a peaceful religion.
translation.CN: There is already work going within Muslim communities, just as there is across the rest of society, it is just not reported on.

translation.HS: Muslims are all fundamentalist Islamist Salafist terrorists.
translation.CN: It is harmful to attack a calm minority who only wants one thing: to integrate into the society.

translation.HS: Did you know that the rape epidemic in Europe is due to Muslim immigrants? They have been raping our children for many years with no counteraction from the police and government. Islam is a death cult!
translation.CN: That is very inflammatory. Have you got any reputable news sources to support that? Or is this just Islamophobic fearmongering, spreading false facts to promote intolerance?

translation.HS: Muslims are all terrorists.
translation.CN: These messages only wake up all the madmen who have nothing left to lose in all the communities, hatred and fear!

translation.HS: They began to build mosques everywhere, and so they compete with our churches.
translation.CN: If you would inform yourself and you would make a comparison between the number of churches and the number of mosques you would understand that what you are saying is false. And the number of mosques is far inferior to the number of churches.

translation.HS: Muslims are contaminating our world.
translation.CN: Dare to explain why? I see people from this religion to be valuable members of our society like the rest of us.

translation.HS: Islam will invade us: It is Islamization.
translation.CN: Basing our relations on respect for the values of mutual respect, Freedom, Fraternity, Equality! This is what will allow us to live it together in peace, so let us be intelligent.

translation.HS: If we want to solve the problem with islam and sharia we should deport them. Even if I respect Muslims that are peaceful I think that priests are trying to start a war. Islam is a worship.
translation.CN: This is not true. How can you say this about an entire faith?

translation.HS: Go on talking to yourself, no one will listen. Islam does not belong within western society. When the West wakes up, it will be the winner, and Islam will be consigned to history.
translation.CN: Have you thought about what western value is what Islam is really about?

translation.HS: Even if all religions bring death, Islam is the worst one. Islam does not lead to anything but death.
translation.CN: Can I suggest that some of the cruelest acts in human history have been committed the name of politics just as much as the various faiths, and that this is more about what it is to be 'human' than any aspect of 'divinity'?

translation.HS: The world would be a better place without Muslims. They are only killing and raping our children.
translation.CN: There is a problem in every community, what are you doing to stop it in yours?

translation.HS: We welcome them in our house, we support them and they kill us: they are beasts, not men.
translation.CN: A civil country must take care of all the people present in the area, as you and I receive education and free medical care, everyone has the right to access them. The crimes committed by migrants are a very low percentage, and murders can be counted on the fingers of one hand.

translation.HS: Almost all Muslims deliberately decide not to work.
translation.CN: Discrimination by employers in Europe against Muslims has been noted to be a cause of lesser employment figures of Muslims in the workforce.

translation.HS: Someone needs to put those Muslims in a hole in the ground before they start to blow us all up again.
translation.CN: This is a disgusting thing to say, you would not say this about non-Muslims would you?

translation.HS: The Arabs are all terrorists and they want to conquer us with the violence and the bombs. We must respond with napalm.
translation.CN: Being of Arab origin does not mean being terrorists, avoid generalizations that lead only to more hatred.

translation.HS: The Islamic veil is the demonstration of political Islam.
translation.CN: The veil is a choice for the woman and a garment of piety that testifies her devotion to the Lord.

translation.HS: We welcome them in our house, we support them and they kill us: they are beasts, not men.
translation.CN: Good evening, according to the Istat the comparison cost-benefit regard to immigration is positive, then they not only maintain themselves but also support us, paying 5% of total contributions.

translation.HS: Veiled women are subjected and forced to wear the headscarf.
translation.CN: It is obvious if they are as you say "subjected".

translation.HS: The Arabs are all terrorists and they want to conquer us with the violence and the bombs. We must respond with napalm.
translation.CN: Good evening, so you're telling me that you would burn with napalm Arab children?

translation.HS: We are seeing more and more of a Muslim problem.
translation.CN: This is because you do not have the right frames.

translation.HS: The Islamic veil is the demonstration of political Islam.
translation.CN: There is no connection between the veil and politics.

translation.HS: Muslims steal our work.
translation.CN: Muslims do not steal your job.

translation.HS: We are seeing more and more of a Muslim problem.
translation.CN: The Muslim problem is powered by some journalists and politicians.

translation.HS: It is absurd to see how in 2018 there is a religion so conservative, and we let them disembark in mass in our country! Italy will always remain a Christian country!
translation.CN: Hi, Italy is a laic country, not a Christian country and the majority of our population is still largely Christian, since Muslims do not even reach 5% of all Italian citizens.

translation.HS: "islamophobia" is a way to take away our freedom of expression.
translation.CN: Freedom of expression is defined by the French laws.

translation.HS: Muslims are all fundamentalist Islamist Salafist terrorists.
translation.CN: It is a shame to think like that, because there are so many countries you'll never dare to visit. You are missing out on dozens of opportunities to become smart.

translation.HS: Muslims hate anyone who is not Muslim.
translation.CN: Islam means peace in Arabic. How can a religion with such a name want to discriminate against a part of people who because they are not Muslim must still hate it? One thing the first batch of the Koran that has been identified is "read" it will have to start instead of telling nonsense.

translation.HS: Your veil is an attack against me.
translation.CN: Representation of things made by media.

translation.HS: Muslims: return to your country.
translation.CN: The earth IS God's, not yours.

translation.HS: Thousands of our girls abused by Muslim rape gangs, commanded by Koran. Why do we keep accepting this?
translation.CN: Look at crime stats.

translation.HS: Islam is comparable to a disease to eliminate.
translation.CN: We would live in a much better world if intolerance was removed instead.

translation.HS: I will not allow my kids to marry a muslim! Go to hell Muslims, I hate you!
translation.CN: May I remind you to mind your language? Do you want to share me with your anger, maybe I can help you?

translation.HS: A recent YouGov survey shows that Westerners view islam less favourably than other religions, deeming it incompatible with Western values.
translation.CN: I suppose we have to look at how opinions and beliefs are shaped and infuenced by reading almost exclusively negative stories of the followers of Islam.

translation.HS: Muslims are all fundamentalist Islamist Salafist terrorists.
translation.CN: I am a Muslim and I am the Sunna of my Prophet Mohammed.

translation.HS: The veiled women do not work. They are locked up at home.
translation.CN: It is because you do not know women LOL.

translation.HS: Muslims hate Christians. They want to kill all of us.
translation.CN: We must encourage the encounter between different cultures.

translation.HS: Because of the Muslims, Britain is no longer the great country of the past! They are a disease!
translation.CN: No. Having a diverse society is a positive. There is no 'invasion'.

translation.HS: Muslims are all terrorists.
translation.CN: Our religion has a lot of followers so we have to destroy it by all means, so we make amalgams.

translation.HS: Islam is a disease that must be eradicated.
translation.CN: Islam is love for those who want to take it.

translation.HS: We do not want to admit that islam isn't a religion, it is only a cult that support murder.
translation.CN: This feels like a 'Final solution' to me. Are you seriously suggesting the extermination of, what, 5% of the UK population? Get a grip.

translation.HS: We welcome them in our house, we support them and they kill us: they are beasts, not men.
translation.CN: You talk like a real gentleman.

translation.HS: These Islamic will bring us back to the Middle Age. We will starve to death and die of diseases that disappeared.
translation.CN: It does not appear to me that there are correlations between the Islamic faith and the fact of being affected by a disease.

translation.HS: People that live in the West cannot live with Muslims.
translation.CN: Did you know that Muslims introduced universities to Europe? So the knowledge Western societies are built on.

translation.HS: Liberal double standards! Muslims oppress women, homosexuals and other cultures but are not held responsible due to our society's tolerance! The government should stop submitting to these people.
translation.CN: Unfortunately, hate can be found in all walks of life. It is no more prevalent in Muslim communities.

translation.HS: All Muslims are incompatible with any Western society.
translation.CN: No, Muslims have a long history of migration since the 16th century to and within Europe, integrating with little issues in various European societies.

translation.HS: Islam is the cancer of the world and need to be surgically removed.
translation.CN: What is truly cancerous is hatred towards an entire faith.

translation.HS: If we do not stand up against Islam they will consider our silence as a way of acceptance!
translation.CN: Christianity and Islam are united in preaching love and leaving judgment to God / Allah what are you preaching?

translation.HS: The veiled women do not work. They are locked up at home.
translation.CN: Allow them to work with the veil then.

translation.HS: The Arabs want to impose their religion and to rule in our home. They must be sent back to their house on boats.
translation.CN: In what way do they want to impose their religion? We are rather seeking to impose ours, not having any rights.

translation.HS: Veiled women are subjected and forced to wear the headscarf.
translation.CN: On what do you base your statement? I am also against human oppression. Let us ask them what it is all about and act if necessary.

translation.HS: The Arabs want to impose their religion and to rule in our home. They must be sent back to their house on boats.
translation.CN: If you really want to send them back, it costs less a plane ticket than a trip on the boat. Do you know that only the wealthiest can come to Italy, many of whom have graduated from university? Try to imagine if the same treatment was reserved for our 'brain-drain' abroad.

translation.HS: Veiled women are subjected and forced to wear the headscarf.
translation.CN: Why are you concerned about her outfit? What does that have to do with you? This is only a piece of cloth for you but more for her; it protects her freedom of conscience.

translation.HS: Muslims: return to your country.
translation.CN: It is impossible, the musulmanie was swallowed up long ago, the same time as Atlantis, located 2km further north.

translation.HS: Veiled women are subjected and forced to wear the headscarf.
translation.CN: You would not dare to say such a thing about Christian nuns, let alone ultra-Orthodox Jews.

translation.HS: Muslims are all terrorists.
translation.CN: You're going to have to update your vocabulary or try not to mix it all up with the amalgams. If I'm amused to say that all priests are pedophiles and that Jews like money, I could say I have the same score of IQ as you are 5.

translation.HS: These Islamic will bring us back to the Middle Age. We will starve to death and die of diseases that disappeared.
translation.CN: I'm afraid that you've seen too many doomsday movies.

translation.HS: Muslims hate Christians. They want to kill all of us.
translation.CN: Muslims do not hate Christians. Indeed they want to co-exist peacefully. In their sacred text, it is indicated that those who follow another religion can safely do it, without the two religions entering in conflict.

translation.HS: The purpose of Islam is to take control of our country: they are trying to have the support of our government and when they will have it they are going to establish sharia and dominate our country.
translation.CN: This is not true. How can you say this about an entire faith?

translation.HS: Veiled women are subjected and forced to wear the headscarf.
translation.CN: The word veiled women is too often confiscated, the media and politicians are constantly talking to their electorate, they are the first concerned giving their speech.

translation.HS: Islam=evil. Islam is invading us and trying to take over countries. It does not follow the scriptures that say 'you shall not envy anyone anything' Stop islam!
translation.CN: Probably you are making a hasty generalization. I do not think Islam is taking over countries and nations. Do you know the statistics of all the immigrants in UK? How many of them are from EU, muslim community, and other countries?

translation.HS: The Arabs are all terrorists and they want to conquer us with the violence and the bombs. We must respond with napalm.
translation.CN: Violence is always wrong. Also it's repudiated in our constitution. This post is therefore contrary to the principles at the basis of our state.

translation.HS: Muslims are all terrorists.
translation.CN: Stop the slander and rumors.

translation.HS: Only a few people were punished for yesterday's violations instead of all them violent Muslims, and if the government does not deport these criminals, then the common people will take care of them.
translation.CN: What happened to the good old British values of stuff like 'tolerance' and 'respect for the rule of law' - what you are suggesting sounds like mob rule, vigilante action and people running around with burning torches?

translation.HS: Fgm happens only to girls that have muslims parents!
translation.CN: Fgm is not a Muslim practice. It is a cultural practice that is often tied to religion as a way to justify it. Not all Muslims practice it and not all those that practice it are Muslim!

translation.HS: Islamic are criminals: they rape, enslave and murder people. Islam is more a worship than a religion and we do not have anything to share with them.
translation.CN: Islam, Christianity and Judaism are all closely linked with love and peace at their heart, together we can end child rape, slavery and murder.

translation.HS: We are all scared of the racist word and this has become an excuse for all of us. I am a realist, not a racist and I say that the Muslims are those who rape children, it is their fault. We, non-muslims, cannot even trust the government or the police anymore. Britain is becoming the capital of child rapists.
translation.CN: According to Crown Prosecution Service's source, at least 80% white people convicted of child abuse offences. What did this happen? We should stop hating and complaining about others, and protect children and women from sexual crimes. If you want to help, please contact National Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Children, Lucy Faithful Foundation, or Independent Sexual Violence Advocates.

translation.HS: Islam is a religion incompatible with the values
translation.CN: Islam promotes freedom, equality and fraternity.

translation.HS: Christians have fought for lots of years against Muslims, we also stopped a genocide. We are enemies. But now it seems that our government forgot about this. This is a war! We must fight.
translation.CN: Have you forgotten that this country respects people of all religions?

translation.HS: To solve all our problems it is enough to burn down mosques and the Koran.
translation.CN: Say this about any other faith and you will see how deeply offensive this is.

translation.HS: Why must Islam invade every country? That is just totalitarian. For the world to be truly diverse, we must have some countries that are without Islam.
translation.CN: I thought 'Totalitarianism' was the requirement of total subservience to the STATE, rather than to any particular faith. So no, the spread of matters of personal belief would not be necessarily 'totalitarian'.

translation.HS: A Muslim is loyal only to Allah (as a comment in relation to election for public office etc.).
translation.CN: Islam shares the same roots as Christianity and Judaism and all are based on love, tolerance and peace, so that is a good thing isn't it.

translation.HS: They began to build mosques everywhere, and so they compete with our churches.
translation.CN: I do not see the problem, so we are all happy, they pray to their god and we pray to ours.

translation.HS: The Arabs want to impose their religion and to rule in our home. They must be sent back to their house on boats.
translation.CN: There are definitely people less tolerant toward other religions, like in Christianity, after all; but Islam isn't an intolerant religion.

translation.HS: We are seeing more and more of a Muslim problem.
translation.CN: Stop looking bfm.

translation.HS: Muslims rape our women and must be neutered.
translation.CN: Also italians rape, are we going to castrate all of them?

translation.HS: Muslims need to oppose child rapists instead of talking about islam all the time. This way they would be a peaceful religion.
translation.CN: Do you think making children suffer will make a religion, Islam, or our world better? I think rape would create hate, anger, and fear, which would make things worse.

translation.HS: The Arabs are all terrorists and they want to conquer us with the violence and the bombs. We must respond with napalm.
translation.CN: I personally know the beautician Laila, the waitress Hind, the gardener Malik. All Muslims, no terrorist.

translation.HS: Islam has nothing to do with western culture and as soon as the west will understand, this religion will be defeated.
translation.CN: The only obstacle to Islam coexisting with Western culture is intolerance like this.

translation.HS: Muslims are all fundamentalist Islamist Salafist terrorists.
translation.CN: These are free and unjustified attacks that seek to stigmatize a community.

translation.HS: Your veil is an attack against me.
translation.CN: Even if I don't necessarily like certain behaviours, I don't consider it a personal aggression, a little TOLERANCE won't hurt you.

translation.HS: The veiled women do not work. They are locked up at home.
translation.CN: Some women work. Others not. Veiled women are women. Some work. Others not.

translation.HS: Almost all Muslims deliberately decide not to work.
translation.CN: How can you say this about an entire group of people from all walks of life?

translation.HS: (responding to a terrorist attack :) still a Buddhist, and they want us to believe that Islam is a religion of peace and tolerance.
translation.CN: Those people who commit these acts are disoriented people.

translation.HS: The beasts.
translation.CN: Are you comparing men to the beasts only because they have a different culture from you?

translation.HS: Islam will invade us: It is Islamization.
translation.CN: This is the result of listening too much to the media.

translation.HS: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
translation.CN: They are here because 'civilised' crusaders first went there and more came later we invited them over to rebuild our civilization after the war.

translation.HS: Muslims are all terrorists.
translation.CN: A bit like saying that we are all mobsters .

translation.HS: Repatriation of Muslims to any Islamic country is a necessity. Islamic culture is not compatible with our values.
translation.CN: Who are you to decide what is compatible with our values and what is not? It is just your opinion, and hopefully politicians will not listen to people like you and oppress Muslims who had not done anything wrong.

translation.HS: The Islamic veil is the demonstration of political Islam.
translation.CN: They simply demonstrate modesty.

translation.HS: Islam will invade us: It is Islamization.
translation.CN: #islamophobie. Islam is not a disease. It is not contagious.

translation.HS: The Islamic veil is the demonstration of political Islam.
translation.CN: Political Islam ?? Nuns, kippas, wigs - is it political Christianity?? Political Judaism? Strangely enough, we don't ask ourselves that question.

translation.HS: Liberal ideas are wrong, they want us to think that Islam is good but in reality it is a cult about war and violence.
translation.CN: No. This is not true. How can you say this about an entire faith?

translation.HS: Muslims do not want to integrate, they want to impose sharia. And then they ask for respect! They are a problem!
translation.CN: Everyone has to follow British laws, this is simply how it is. So yes, Muslim people do respect our law. I haven't seen anyone breaking the law and then getting away with it.

translation.HS: Muslims: return to your country.
translation.CN: There is no Muslim country.

translation.HS: Muslims are all fundamentalist Islamist Salafist terrorists.
translation.CN: Can you explain each term to me?

translation.HS: One of many Pakistani rapist.we should extradite them from our country.
translation.CN: All the people from Pakistan that I know are really nice! No need to generalize too much!

translation.HS: It is obviously a mental illness, the conciliation to Islam and Muslims.
translation.CN: Accepting people from all walks of life is not an illness.

translation.HS: A Muslim's only real allegiance is to Allah (as a comment in relation to election for public office etc.)
translation.CN: We are all doing our best for our country under God.

translation.HS: They are replacing us in our house! They should remain at their home to put on the burqa and beat their wives.
translation.CN: No one has the right to beat his wife, Italian or Muslim. It is illegal, and the law punishes everyone equally.

translation.HS: We welcome them in our house, we support them and they kill us: they are beasts, not men.
translation.CN: The responsibility is individual, not collective. Otherwise, we are all guilty of femicide, or for crimes committed by Italians in other countries.

translation.HS: Your veil is an attack against me.
translation.CN: The thong is an assault against me. Half naked women placed on posters are also an assault against me.

translation.HS: We are all scared of the racist word and this has become an excuse for all of us. I am a realist, not a racist and I say that the Muslims are those who rape children, it is their fault. We, non-muslims, cannot even trust the government or the police anymore. Britain is becoming the capital of child rapists.
translation.CN: Child rapes are not only convicted by muslims. In fact, around 90% of the sexual abuse are convicted by person known to the child. This is a sad truth. We should help children be free from sexual abuse and rape.

translation.HS: Islam is irrational and incompatible with science.
translation.CN: Oh! You mean the home of modern maths and science?

translation.HS: Muslims are all fundamentalist Islamist Salafist terrorists.
translation.CN: Could you define Islam for me and these three terms that are discussed?

translation.HS: Quran is the root of all the world's problems today. Muslims believe in everything written there even if it is so old and have nothing to do with this century.
translation.CN: Does any religion have a 'sell-by-date'?

translation.HS: We are seeing more and more of a Muslim problem.
translation.CN: France is a country of tolerance and peace.

translation.HS: They make us think that islam is a religion to diffuse their doctrine in our tolerant culture. Enough is enough!
translation.CN: It sounds like you are saying that you have to be Christian to be tolerated, bit paradoxical do not you think?

translation.HS: Muslims rape our women and must be neutered.
translation.CN: And for the Italian rapists what do you propose? Because they represent the majority of the cases.

translation.HS: The beasts.
translation.CN: I notice deep anger against Muslims. Where does it come from?

translation.HS: Islam does not belong to Europe.
translation.CN: Islam is not a religion belonging to the middle east.

translation.HS: If you support Islam and Muslims, it is because you do not know what they really are.
translation.CN: What do you think it is then?

translation.HS: Muslims are all terrorists.
translation.CN: Islam is not a religion of hate; terrorism has different roots.

translation.HS: Veiled women are subjected and forced to wear the headscarf.
translation.CN: On what basis do you claim your assertion of this?

translation.HS: Uk is being islamized very fast. British government submits to every whim of Islam.
translation.CN: What do you mean by 'islamized'? If mosques are built in some areas, I do not see this as a threat but as representation of community in those areas?

translation.HS: Muslims: return to your country.
translation.CN: Who are you talking to, please?

translation.HS: Veiled women are subjected and forced to wear the headscarf.
translation.CN: She is free to dress as she wishes.

translation.HS: Someone needs to put those Muslims in a hole in the ground before they start to blow us all up again.
translation.CN: You start digging if that keeps you happy.

translation.HS: These despicable Muslims hadn't won yet. Now there will be a cruel punishment!
translation.CN: Didn't realise we were against each other. [insert number of Muslim doctors] seems like they're making Britain stronger.

translation.HS: Islam will invade us: It is Islamization.
translation.CN: I invite you to take a look at the history of Indonesia.

translation.HS: Muslims are all terrorists.
translation.CN: 2 billion Muslims in the world.

translation.HS: Being 'ignorant' and 'prejudiced' towards Islam isn't racism? It's common sense. You cannot be racist towards an ideology.
translation.CN: Ah logically and well argued. Not!

translation.HS: The Arabs are all terrorists and they want to conquer us with the violence and the bombs. We must respond with napalm.
translation.CN: Throwing the baby out with the bath water creates a useless hate.

translation.HS: Muslims terrorize our women and they will always do it, e.g. In Oxford today. They are nasty men that sexualize children.
translation.CN: Such over-simplifications are an insult to those victims of perpetrators from non-Muslim backgrounds.which, statistically, is still the majority.

translation.HS: It is time for us to take Islam for what it is. A murderous cult that should be exterminated, and that is the end of it.
translation.CN: This is not true. How can you say this about an entire faith? Just hatred.

translation.HS: In Birmingham there are Muslims shops that do not serve white people after 8pm.
translation.CN: If I spray something on a wall and tag it HRH does that make it the law? I am even willing to add a stamp as a photo id. First class of course. There's enough going on without falling for fake news and internet rubbish.

translation.HS: You think these Muslim cockroaches have won? No, now is time for bloody retribution!
translation.CN: It's not an us and them thing. We are all just trying to get on and make a living. You do not do that by putting anyone down.

translation.HS: Muslims are the ones who invented the slave trade.
translation.CN: Christian Europeans are the ones that then expanded the slave trade to an industrial scale and instrumentalised exploitation as a key component of our economy.

translation.HS: The world would be a better place without Muslims. They are only killing and raping our children.
translation.CN: This is disgusting. How can you say this about hundreds of millions of people?

translation.HS: Muslims want to make all French meat halal.
translation.CN: We have our own butcher shops.

translation.HS: To solve all our problems it is enough to burn down mosques and the Koran.
translation.CN: Once you burn books you burn people. Has history taught you nothing?

translation.HS: Christians have fought for lots of years against Muslims, we also stopped a genocide. We are enemies. But now it seems that our government forgot about this. This is a war! We must fight.
translation.CN: I'd think that in the 21st century people would be smarter and will not encourage wars. Do you want to also start a genocide? How are you different from the people you accuse?

translation.HS: Islam will invade us: It is Islamization.
translation.CN: While it is well known, Christianity was created at the same time in all the countries of the world where it is the major religion.

translation.HS: If someone wrote the Koran to the present day it would not be allowed.
translation.CN: Have you really read Quran? Actually Quran is not about hate speech. It teaches people to respect people and do good things.

translation.HS: If the Koran was published today it would be banned as hate speech.
translation.CN: Just as much as the Bible would. Is your point that in today's society we are all more tolerant? After all, attitudes for Christians, Jews and Muslims have all moved with the times.

translation.HS: The Islamic veil is the demonstration of political Islam.
translation.CN: False, the veil is simply a sign of modesty.

translation.HS: They began to build mosques everywhere, and so they compete with our churches.
translation.CN: The ratio between churches and mosques is obviously unbalanced in favour of the first.

translation.HS: We are seeing more and more of a Muslim problem.
translation.CN: This is all made up! People will eventually believe it is because of Islam that there's unemployment in France! Pathetic.

translation.HS: We need to kill Muslims, otherwise, they will make us explode!
translation.CN: That sounds very extreme, remind me again which group is the violent dangerous one?

translation.HS: Your veil is an attack against me.
translation.CN: It is just a piece of clothing that cannot attack people.

translation.HS: Muslims are guilty in the sexual exploitation of children. Dirty filthy muslims terrorize our girls, today in Oxford, tomorrow everywhere.
translation.CN: Such over-simplifications are an insult to those victims of perpetrators from non-Muslim backgrounds.which, statistically, is still the majority.

translation.HS: Statistics say that 99% of muslims in the uk are so lazy that they do not want to work.
translation.CN: Provide facts.

translation.HS: Muslims grooming gangs are protected by the government and the police. This is a betrayal!
translation.CN: The only cover up I remember was in the Catholic Church, but we remember that the actions of individuals do not reflect on the whole.

translation.HS: We need to kill Muslims, otherwise, they will make us explode!
translation.CN: This is a disgusting thing to say, you would not say this about non-Muslims would you?

translation.HS: It's a shame that there is no longer the crucifix in school, a lack of respect.

translation.CN: I know many Muslims who are wonderful people and have done nothing wrong to this world. You should not insult people based on their religion.

translation.HS: Islam is all about hate! When Muslims first set foot in Britain was when race hate started in England!
translation.CN: Are you suggesting that their very existence is an excuse for your hate?

translation.HS: One of many Pakistani rapist.we should extradite them from our country.
translation.CN: Migrants, like those from Pakistan, benefit the UK massively, and migration does not increase the occurrence of crimes like rape, in fact crime rates stay the same or go down, in areas with high immigration: https://www.independent.co.uk/news/uk/home-news/uk-migration-six-myths-about-immigration-debunked-as-latest-figures-show-fall-in-non-eu-arrivals-a6895341.html.

translation.HS: The Arabs are all terrorists and they want to conquer us with the violence and the bombs. We must respond with napalm.
translation.CN: Even in Europe, there is terrorism, what do we do? Should we throw napalm on us?

translation.HS: Islamophobia is a right. Fighting Islam is a duty.
translation.CN: Islamophobia is a crime against Muslims, punishable by law, it is in no way a duty.

translation.HS: Europe is civilised, Muslims should not stay there.
translation.CN: It is not very civilised of you to be intolerant of another religion.

translation.HS: Every Muslim is a potential terrorist.
translation.CN: What do you base your view on?

translation.HS: Islam is a religion incompatible with the values
translation.CN: You mean, this Republic founded around a declaration that guarantees freedom of worship to everyone?

translation.HS: The UK and us must fight Islam! Islam is intolerance, Quran, jihad, being gay, barbarism and so on. It is a disgusting cult!
translation.CN: This is not true and your argument does not make sense as hatred does not counter hatred.

translation.HS: Islam will invade us: It is Islamization.
translation.CN: God loves you, that's why.

translation.HS: The Islamic veil is the demonstration of political Islam.
translation.CN: Great no matter what.

translation.HS: Someone needs to put those Muslims in a hole in the ground before they start to blow us all up again.
translation.CN: An eye for an eye makes the whole world blind.

translation.HS: Islam is a disease that must be eradicated.
translation.CN: Islam is a religion that preaches tolerance.

translation.HS: Islam is a religion incompatible with the values
translation.CN: Just because some media and politicians repeat it does not mean that they will eventually make it believe it.

translation.HS: What is the point in listening to Muslim women? They are all retarded.
translation.CN: What is the point in listening to Western men? They are all Islamophobic and generalise narrow minded opinions to entire genders and religions.

translation.HS: How can we fight anti-Semitism when city ghettos of Birmingham, Bradford, etc. Are full of anti-Semitic Pakistani muslims? Labour is lost to the mix of Radical Islam/middle class.
translation.CN: It is funny how lots of Jewish and Muslim groups are coming together to fight hate crime. (insert example)

translation.HS: Veiled women are subjected and forced to wear the headscarf.
translation.CN: In a free country they are free to wear what they want.

translation.HS: Muslims have nothing to contribute to our society.
translation.CN: Really? Hundreds of millions of people?

translation.HS: Muslims hate anyone who is not Muslim.
translation.CN: False Muslims meet like all their fellow citizens throughout their journey, all come out of people at school at work who are places of socialization. They move away from hateful people and stigmatization of course. And discrimination can lead them to exclude themselves for fear of confrontation.

translation.HS: British laws betray every victim of Muslim rapists! There is one rule for muslim paedos and one for everyone else! How can we change the situation when the government is submitting to Islam so much?
translation.CN: Have faith in British Law. Indeed, the Muslim rapists will be deported back to their own countries after the sentences. Criminals will not get special treatment. Everyone can change the situation even if it is a small contribution. For example, teach children to arm themselves and report suspicious events.

translation.HS: Muslims are all terrorists.
translation.CN: The abuse of the mass media seriously affects the capacity for discernment. If the symptoms persist, consult a psychologist. Most likely you became paranoid.

translation.HS: Most religions cause death and despair, but Islam is the worst and cruelest of them all, it is nothing but trouble.
translation.CN: There are many religions and it is hard to compare them. However, I guess Islam has not that many traits that would make it the cruelest.

translation.HS: Islam will invade us: It is Islamization.
translation.CN: Do you have statistics on the growth of Islam?

translation.HS: Muslims hate anyone who is not Muslim.
translation.CN: Mutual respect.

translation.HS: Islam - Silence is tacit acceptance. Raise your voice before it is too late!
translation.CN: After tolerance comes acceptance - after acceptance comes love - we are halfway there! Christianity and Islam are united in preaching love now that is something to shout about.

translation.HS: Our liberal government continues to ignore child rapes and Islamic radicalisation, because they promote modern values, e.g. Increasing the sexualization of children. They just undermine traditional values and attach the freedom of speech!
translation.CN: Why would you say that? Actually there are many government organisations and NGOs that help and control the rape crimes.

translation.HS: I think is common sense to have prejudice about Islam. This isn't racism because Islam is a cult.
translation.CN: You cannot be racist towards an ideology. You can, however, be discriminatory and intolerant towards the people that follow it.

translation.HS: Quite strange, the majority of Easter Eggs are being labelled 'Chocolate Eggs', I think this is because of the Muslims in our country, and the companies are betraying our culture.
translation.CN: Does it really matter how Easter Eggs are labelled? I do not think this matter is really important. Calling them in another fashion does not change our culture.

translation.HS: Muslims are all terrorists.
translation.CN: Amalgam when you have us.

translation.HS: We are seeing more and more of a Muslim problem.
translation.CN: Politicians have made a problem with Islam that has existed for 1400 years and nobody complained about it.

translation.HS: Veiled women are subjected and forced to wear the headscarf.
translation.CN: Lazy and hateful way to impersonate a feminist activist while overcoming the fight against the problems that affect, in a more structural and comprehensive manner, all the women, violence, harassment, equal pay, gender bias. Such bourgeois feminism is ethnocentric, totally blind to intersectionality.

translation.HS: Islam teaches only hate! Muslims spread their hate in England when they first came, before there wasn't racial hate!
translation.CN: Hate really? Even the doctors, surgeons, teachers, fire fighters, taxi drivers that rescued the Manchester bombing victims, the ones working to stop cancer, feed the homeless. See where I am going?

translation.HS: Muslims had destroyed a Christian statue in Italy. Italy should ask itself why they are allowed to build mosques and why it is tolerating these despicable people.
translation.CN: Why have we built Churches all over the world? How many holy buildings have we demolished over history? This is never acceptable, but can we really be casting the first stone?

translation.HS: I wish all of them would die.
translation.CN: You cannot think that the entire Muslim population dies. Why would you do something so horrible?

translation.HS: I do not really understand why I should listen to Muslim women. They are evidently dumb.
translation.CN: What is the point in listening? Maybe because they actually have something good to say?

translation.HS: You might say, Don't worry, only 5-10% of Muslims are extremists. Remember, in 1940 only 7% of Germans were Nazi's.
translation.CN: Is this where you got your facts, do read the rest of the article? Https://www.politifact.com/punditfact/statements/2015/aug/28/curt-schilling/schilling-throws-wild-pitch-nazi-stat/.

translation.HS: Finally a person who represents westerners, we hate Islam!
translation.CN: Muslim radicalism is one thing, and generalizations about all Muslims is another thing. It is not right to generalize about all the Muslims and state that 'we hate them all!'.

translation.HS: Islam will invade us: It is Islamization.
translation.CN: This implies an organized network with a political or even commercial organization, yet Islam is a religion, no one can be forced to join it.

translation.HS: Muslims hate anyone who is not Muslim.
translation.CN: The history of the Jews proves otherwise. These are Muslims who ensured their protection when "Catholics" chased and wanted to exterminate them.

translation.HS: Someone needs to put those Muslims in a hole in the ground before they start to blow us all up again.
translation.CN: Getting rid of 22% of the world's population sounds quite laborious, perhaps we should just punish the small minority of people who actually commit a crime instead.

translation.HS: People are afraid of Muslims rape gangs and the spread of extremism, even if you pretend not to see it.
translation.CN: I noticed what you said and the concerns it caused. Actually, Muslims are kind and sincere. However, people usually can access only negative events and issues about Islam and do not consider good news meaningful. We do not want only fear to exist in the society. Hence, we should help people know about Islam and Muslims.

translation.HS: Muslims: return to your country.
translation.CN: Which?

translation.HS: If Muslims counteracted child rapists in their communities instead of engaging in public discussions about Islam, one day Islam indeed would become a peaceful religion.
translation.CN: Do you think making children suffer will make a religion, Islam, or our world better? I think rape would create hate, anger, and fear, which would make things worse.

translation.HS: People that live in the West cannot live with Muslims.
translation.CN: Except all of those which live and add to Western Societies.

translation.HS: Muslim men are violent, Muslim women are subjected.
translation.CN: Why is submission disapproved when it is related to religion? In all religions, people submit to their God.

translation.HS: Muslims rape our women and must be neutered.
translation.CN: A rapist must be arrested as a rapist, and in any case, rapists are almost always Catholic.

translation.HS: Our country is fighting a war against Islam for a thousand years.
translation.CN: 2.5 million Muslims travelled to Europe to fight for the Allies in WW1.

translation.HS: The Islamic veil is the demonstration of political Islam.
translation.CN: The veil is a divine obligation.

translation.HS: They began to build mosques everywhere, and so they compete with our churches.
translation.CN: I do not see which competition can exist between the churches and the mosques, we can go to one or the other according to our faith. They are not supermarkets that offer discounts.

translation.HS: We need to Burn the Koran and all the Mosques down - this will solve all problems in this country.
translation.CN: Once you burn books you burn people. Has history taught you nothing?

translation.HS: Islam is a disease that must be eradicated.
translation.CN: Also your hate.

translation.HS: Fuck Islam and Fuck ISIS. We should repatriate all Muslims. They are all a bunch of violent criminals who do not share our values and never will. Without them Britain will be a better, safer place.
translation.CN: Muslims are also average and decent British citizens? Repatriate?

translation.HS: The Islamic veil is the demonstration of political Islam.
translation.CN: What does politics have to do with it?

translation.HS: Almost all Muslims deliberately decide not to work.
translation.CN: Have you spoken to or worked with a muslim?

translation.HS: The Islamic veil is the demonstration of political Islam.
translation.CN: So what is your point? Islam is a political religion, the veil does not make it violent or hateful.

translation.HS: Thousands of our girls abused by Muslim rape gangs, commanded by Koran. Why do we keep accepting this?
translation.CN: The Qur'an condemns rape, the fact that a few people ignorant of the teachings of the religion do that does not taint an entire religion.

translation.HS: Every Muslim is a potential terrorist.
translation.CN: You could say that about any person, Muslim or not. According to the government, far right extremism is a bigger terrorist threat than Muslims. Does that make you a potential terrorist?

translation.HS: Islam is a religion incompatible with the values
translation.CN: Islam is the very symbol of a fraternal, united and libertarian society.

translation.HS: Women and girls are harmed by Islamic that were allowed to enter in our country by our government.
translation.CN: Because Victorian girls and women were treated equally with respect? That was when there were no Muslims in the country. Are we really much better now? #metoo?

translation.HS: Islam is a religion incompatible with the values
translation.CN: That's your opinion and it is far from being the truth.

translation.HS: Nowadays the big problem in London is the presence of muslims, they must go away!
translation.CN: People run from their countries because they are unhappy to live there. They run from wars, bombing, poverty, hunger. Pushing them back into their disasters is not humane.

translation.HS: And war it is.You don't pass over here troglodytes.
translation.CN: Why shouldn't we welcome people fleeing from suffering? Italy is a free country and is a right of every man to get political asylum.

translation.HS: Muslims: return to your country.
translation.CN: I have no accountability. I was born in France, grew up in France, educated in France and working in France. So I'm French whether you like it or not.

translation.HS: I think islam is staining the humanity.
translation.CN: Imho the stain is from those individuals who love to stereotype, discriminate and dehumanise groups of people.

translation.HS: Islam is just a bestial cult of brainwashed lunatics who breed like rats.
translation.CN: How can you use such language to describe a religion of 1.6 billion people?

translation.HS: Never share a meal with a Muslim: you could catch HIV or Ebola.
translation.CN: This sounds like a science fiction if you ask me!

translation.HS: Muslims benefit from the French system.
translation.CN: And vice-versa.

translation.HS: If you support Islam and Muslims, it is because you do not know what they really are.
translation.CN: Maybe the ones intolerant of Islam and Muslims are the ones that are ignorant about what it truly is?

translation.HS: Muslims rape our women and must be neutered.
translation.CN: A phrase that denotes a profound ignorance or a perfect bad faith because who offends women are members of the male gender in every place.

translation.HS: 99% of Muslims in the UK are unemployable and refuse to work.
translation.CN: 100% of the unemployed Muslim stats I read on Twitter are fake. Muslim unemployment is at 12% in the UK, and many of that number are actively seeking work.

translation.HS: Islam is fanaticism. Muslims want to kill all who do not believe in their god.
translation.CN: The Islam is tolerance, history teach that to us.

translation.HS: Muslims: return to your country.
translation.CN: On the contrary, there is no country called Muslim or Muslimmania does not yet exist.

translation.HS: We welcome them in our house, we support them and they kill us: they are beasts, not men.
translation.CN: If only we tried to integrate them really, rather than relegate them to the margins of our society, perhaps the phenomena of violence would be limited.

translation.HS: Veiled women are subjected and forced to wear the headscarf.
translation.CN: Have you asked, at least once, a veiled woman, if she was forced to wear the veil?

translation.HS: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
translation.CN: We still use Arabic numbers, maths, medicines, and rely on trade and loans from Islamic countries. Islam is an intricate part of civilization as we know it.

translation.HS: I do not think that Ramadam will stop Muslims from raping and terrorism.
translation.CN: There's the same proportion of criminals among muslims as it is among western people. You cannot say that Muslims are doing terrorism and raping children, this is simply exaggeration.

translation.HS: The beasts.
translation.CN: The main victims of the terrorist attacks are Muslims.

translation.HS: Go on talking to yourself, no one will listen. Islam does not belong within western society. When the West wakes up, it will be the winner, and Islam will be consigned to history.
translation.CN: The media scapegoats Muslims and encourages division. When will YOU wake up and see you have been misled by institutions creating an 'us' and 'them' divide, demonising Muslims to detract attention from bigger societal issues.

translation.HS: Islam cannot get along with science because is illogical.
translation.CN: Much like your statement then.

translation.HS: We are seeing more and more of a Muslim problem.
translation.CN: The Muslim is a facilitator and is a part of the solution of living together.

translation.HS: The veiled women do not work. They are locked up at home.
translation.CN: Have you ever spoken with a woman who wears it? No, that for sure!

translation.HS: These Islamic will bring us back to the Middle Age. We will starve to death and die of diseases that disappeared.
translation.CN: If I want to make a trip to an Arab country I'm not asked to make any vaccine because there aren't different diseases from ours.

translation.HS: This is our import for the last 30 years: muslim rapists, halal, corruption, terrorism, polygamy, sharia. Why are we doing this?
translation.CN: This is not true. How can you say this about an entire faith?

translation.HS: Islam is fanaticism. Muslims want to kill all who do not believe in their god.
translation.CN: No, it is not true.

translation.HS: Our government has brought Islamic invaders to our country, and now we see our girls and women damaged.
translation.CN: Girls and women do not face a bigger threat from Muslim's than from people of any other faith. Maybe what is more damaging is referring to them like objects that can be 'damaged' instead of people.

translation.HS: Islam will invade us: It is Islamization.
translation.CN: These words remind us of a sad time in history.

translation.HS: We should expel Muslims, everyone wants them out of the country.
translation.CN: There's a few people I do not want here but deporting British Citizens feels a bit like a dictatorship.

translation.HS: Muslim invasion is the new plague of London. They must be repatriated to their home countries!
translation.CN: 1- No it is not. 2 - An entire faith, really? 5 - Muslims can also be British.

translation.HS: Muslims rape our women and must be neutered.
translation.CN: The Muslim religion does not plan to rape women.

translation.HS: To solve all our problems it is enough to burn down mosques and the Koran.
translation.CN: Poverty, brexit, austerity, homelessness. Please enlighten me as to how banishing Islam would solve these problems?

translation.HS: The only purpose of Islam is to dominate and destroy us! Being multicultural has nothing to do with it.
translation.CN: No it isn't and there is nothing wrong in respecting and understanding all peoples.

translation.HS: Islam is the religion of obscurantism.
translation.CN: Evidence? There are none. Islam was rather a source of light for the rebirth of Europe, as evidenced by all the works. Islam has never practiced the Inquisition as demonstrated by the intelligent coexistence of religions in Muslim Spain.

translation.HS: Every Muslim is a potential terrorist.
translation.CN: But not the ones that fought and died for Britain in both wars and all wars after.

translation.HS: I don't want to have anything to do with the Islamists! They are murderers and terrorists and we must fight them!
translation.CN: It seems that there are always more people that believe that Islam is directly tied to terrorism. Actually, this belief is the result of a hard to kill stereotype that damages the dignity of Muslims and their religion which is actually like ours, a religion that has basic principles like the love of God/Allah and the brotherhood among men.

translation.HS: Since 2000 there were 5248 suicide bombings and all of them were made by Muslims. But nobody considers this when talking about global terrorism.
translation.CN: The vast majority of Global Terrorism is about politics and land not faith. One fact you do not seem to want to deal with.

translation.HS: Veiled women are subjected and forced to wear the headscarf.
translation.CN: Do you think about wearing the mini skirt or trousers or whether women who wear them have constraints?

translation.HS: Someone needs to put those Muslims in a hole in the ground before they start to blow us all up again.
translation.CN: Violent extremism is terrible. It is a shame Muslims have to put up with it.

translation.HS: Veiled women are subjected and forced to wear the headscarf.
translation.CN: Did you ask them the question or is it a personal reflection?

translation.HS: Muslims must integrate or leave France!
translation.CN: What if we were to recommend the same thing for French people abroad?

translation.HS: Image (features protesters with signs such as 'behead those who insult Islam) with a caption saying 'How can we be Islamophobic when they really do want to kill us'.
translation.CN: Whilst a small number of Muslims were involved in this, the vast majority stand against extremism (link to article about the Muslim anti-extremism march in Cologne)

translation.HS: Did you know that the rape epidemic in Europe is due to Muslim immigrants? They have been raping our children for many years with no counteraction from the police and government. Islam is a death cult!
translation.CN: Really, then how come most victims have been abused by a member of their family or friend? Let's find the truth and then put a stop to abuse.

translation.HS: All the Muslims should have been punished for yesterday, not only a few. Citizens will take action if the government does not do anything.
translation.CN: What happened to the good old British values of stuff like 'tolerance' and 'respect for the rule of law' - what you are suggesting sounds like mob rule, vigilante action and people running around with burning torches?

translation.HS: Islam is just a nasty stain on humanity.
translation.CN: Hatred generalised to an entire religion sounds like a much worse product of humanity.

translation.HS: Muslims are all terrorists.
translation.CN: The media! The media! The media! They no longer do their job honestly!

translation.HS: The Arabs want to impose their religion and to rule in our home. They must be sent back to their house on boats.
translation.CN: I am not aware that the Arab citizens (which by the way are also Christians) arrive in our country to control and impose their laws: many practice their religion in full compliance with those of others.

translation.HS: I do not really understand why I should listen to Muslim women. They are evidently dumb.
translation.CN: The point of listening to Muslim women, and women in general, is that they could broaden and enlighten your view of the world.

translation.HS: These liberal standards! Muslims are intolerant with other cultures, women and homosexuals, but our society protects them with this liberalist policy.
translation.CN: Sounds more like the Catholic church to me #pope#childabuse #InquiryCSA.

translation.HS: A woman who accepts to live hidden under a veil and gets beaten by her man does not deserve to live in a civilized country like Italy.
translation.CN: No woman agrees to be beaten, be unable to break free from a state of violence and submission does not mean wanting to be in it. The veil if chosen freely should not be a problem for those who simply do not choose it.

translation.HS: Europe is civilised, Muslims should not stay there.
translation.CN: Have you ever spoken to a muslim?

translation.HS: Islam hates women.
translation.CN: The Qur'an liberated women, honored them as a human being. Previously they were part of the furniture, they were sold, bought and some considered them closer to animals or demons. The Qur'an came to rectify this by saying: "We created you from a male and a female, man and woman.

translation.HS: The Arabs want to impose their religion and to rule in our home. They must be sent back to their house on boats.
translation.CN: Saying that the Arabs want to impose their religion is wrong also as a concept: not all Arabs are Muslims, some are Christians like many Italians.

translation.HS: People who criticize Islam and its traits in our country - rape gangs and terrorism - are being banned, but this will not end well. People are driven to the right - the only ones who can openly talk about it!
translation.CN: Right wing is earning popularity by blaming Muslims for crimes, but it does not mean that it is actually true.

translation.HS: They make us think that islam is a religion to diffuse their doctrine in our tolerant culture. Enough is enough!
translation.CN: The only thing that is ENOUGH is this discriminatory hate speech.

translation.HS: Muslims are all fundamentalist Islamist Salafist terrorists.
translation.CN: Quite a program.

translation.HS: We must not believe the liberal and political elite. Islam is no good, its complete evil, and an ideology of war and it was always like this. All Muslims are bound to fight against us, and that is what they do through deception and violence.
translation.CN: My optician seems like a nice fellow, so I wonder why you think he is likely to kick off at a moment's notice.

translation.HS: We welcome them in our house, we support them and they kill us: they are beasts, not men.
translation.CN: You speak as if it was a cause-effect phenomenon, but it is not so! I see everyday people go to work and have all the colors: white, yellow and black. I see refugees in my university, in the workplace, and they never harmed a hair to me.

translation.HS: Since 2000 there were 5248 suicide bombings and all of them were made by Muslims. But nobody considers this when talking about global terrorism.
translation.CN: Actually, the FBI considers the largest terrorist threat right now to be from far-right extremist groups.

translation.HS: Veiled women are subjected and forced to wear the headscarf.
translation.CN: This kind of comment is an overgeneralization, like many has been provided in history.

translation.HS: It is obviously a mental illness, the conciliation to Islam and Muslims.
translation.CN: If values of tolerance, respect and human decency are akin to mental illness, I am happy to be classed that way.

translation.HS: If Islam is a modern religion, why are all Muslim countries backward and / or at war?
translation.CN: Back? A very relative concept.

translation.HS: Islam is just a moon cult masquerading as a religion.
translation.CN: Mate. Moon cult?? What? Tbh sounds pretty harmless to me.

translation.HS: France is a secular country, the practice of Islam should be banned.
translation.CN: It is necessary to remember the definition of secularism, which gives freedom of conscience and does not restrict it.

translation.HS: Muslims: return to your country.
translation.CN: But which one? I really do not know which to choose!

translation.HS: Islam is a non-peaceful religion that professes violence.
translation.CN: Exactly where can I find it documented?

translation.HS: Muslims hate Christians. They want to kill all of us.
translation.CN: Muslims and Christians can live together peacefully.

translation.HS: Europe is civilised, Muslims should not stay there.
translation.CN: Muslims are peace-loving, law-abiding and hard-working, contributing much to the UK economically and culturally.

translation.HS: Islam is just a nasty stain on humanity.
translation.CN: Imho the stain is from those individuals who love to stereotype, discriminate and dehumanise groups of people.

translation.HS: We need to Burn the Koran and all the Mosques down - this will solve all problems in this country.
translation.CN: Having a mosque built down the road is causing you problems? Really?

translation.HS: Liberal double standards! Muslims oppress women, homosexuals and other cultures but are not held responsible due to our society's tolerance! The government should stop submitting to these people.
translation.CN: Surely no one should be oppressed and everyone supported to end oppression within their communities #lovenothate.

translation.HS: Muslims use corporal and cruel punishment on people.
translation.CN: Just to note that muslims believe only god can punish or forgive. The violence seems to be your issue.

translation.HS: Islam will invade us: It is Islamization.
translation.CN: As all the religions, Islam is only about saving our souls.

translation.HS: Muslims are all fundamentalist Islamist Salafist terrorists.
translation.CN: Answer by the absurd: if they were all, why would they be the most numerous victims of terrorists?

translation.HS: Islam is a totalitarian doctrine dressed disguised as a religion so that it can spread across our tolerant Christian world. Enough IS ENOUGH!
translation.CN: Islam is belief system that contributed to prominent scientific, political, and social innovations that ordered and improved the world.

translation.HS: Muslims hate Christians. They want to kill all of us.
translation.CN: How can you say that they want to kill us all?

translation.HS: The Islamic veil is the demonstration of political Islam.
translation.CN: That is not true. As proof, women of other faiths may wear a veil, among Christian or Jewish women for example.

translation.HS: The world would be a better place without Muslims. They are only killing and raping our children.
translation.CN: Most children abuse is by someone they know, a relative, family friend, sports coach, some one in a position of trust and authority. If you really cared about children check your facts instead of creating distractions.

translation.HS: These liberal standards! Muslims are intolerant with other cultures, women and homosexuals, but our society protects them with this liberalist policy.
translation.CN: We could easily substitute the word 'Christians' for the word 'Muslims' in this sentence, without it losing any meaning, since this is as much an issue about 'fundamentalism' as any particular faith.

translation.HS: Muslims are all fundamentalist Islamist Salafist terrorists.
translation.CN: I am Muslim and none of these adjectives represents me, so, no.

translation.HS: Muslims had destroyed a Christian statue in Italy. Italy should ask itself why they are allowed to build mosques and why is tolerating these despicable people.
translation.CN: For an individual disrespecting someone else's religion, you sure are angry about an individual disrespecting someone else's religion.

translation.HS: Islam has nothing to do with western culture and as soon as the west will understand, this religion will be defeated.
translation.CN: Who said that West and Islam are competing at all? Is there a war? I do not like this way of seeing things. We should live in one world together and solve bigger problems humanity is facing, not fight over different cultures.

translation.HS: The Islamic veil is the demonstration of political Islam.
translation.CN: The veil is a personal religious choice. What does it have to do with politics?

translation.HS: We cannot live with a religion that blows up his believers!
translation.CN: Our lives are absorbed in a religious tradition, which considers legitimate burning at the stake all people suspected of being 'diverted', including scientists such as Galileo, which simply tried to understand the functioning of our universe.

translation.HS: Muslims hate Christians. They want to kill all of us.
translation.CN: Are we still in the Crusades? I thought it was 2019 .

translation.HS: Thousands of our girls abused by Muslim rape gangs, commanded by Koran. Why do we keep accepting this?
translation.CN: This is simply not true and how can you say this about such a large group of people from all walks of life?

translation.HS: Islam is a religion incompatible with the values
translation.CN: The values

translation.HS: The Arabs want to impose their religion and to rule in our home. They must be sent back to their house on boats.
translation.CN: But if they barely manage to reach the Italian coast without dying, how do you believe that they can impose on an entire nation?

translation.HS: Is this Afghanistan or Pakistan? You would never say this is an english town.#saville town (text accompanying video footage of people on their way to friday prayers etc. ).
translation.CN: Small groups of people peacefully gather to pray, but because they do not look like you, you are outraged? Why am I not surprised?

translation.HS: Maybe not all muslims are violent but they all support the jihad and follow sharia law. Islam is fanaticism.
translation.CN: Don't most religions have instructions for what they deem to be 'righteous living', voluntary codes or laws (if you insist) for the faithful to follow. Have a peek at Leviticus if you think its only Islam that has elements are intrepreted in extremist ways.

translation.HS: Muslims: return to your country.
translation.CN: Ethnic origin and religious affiliation cannot be superimposed, as the same country may have people of different denominations. This is also what makes our sweet France so rich.

translation.HS: Almost all Muslims deliberately decide not to work.
translation.CN: According to the Sun they are not refusing work but unemployment for Muslims is 1) due to discrimination against them, 2) that the report only looked at full time employment not P-T work, 3) say that numbers are pushed up because mums are more likely to stay at home while children are little.

translation.HS: Muslims are all fundamentalist Islamist Salafist terrorists.
translation.CN: We don't understand anything about your amalgams.
