translation.HS: Muslims are all fundamentalist Islamist Salafist terrorists.
translation.CN: You are reducing the richness of this religion to an interpretation rather than questioning if it is only through your media.

translation.HS: Our government has allowed this islamic filth: machete attacks, women exploitation, gang rapes, killings. How dare they?
translation.CN: Are seriously suggesting these things did not happen until we invited people from the Indian sub-continent to come and work in our mills and factories?

translation.HS: You should not trust anyone in an Islamic area if you are an English girl: if someone offers you something do not take it and pay attention also to the police.
translation.CN: Why Muslim men? Such a sweeping statement.

translation.HS: It is one law for Muslims and another law for us.
translation.CN: If Muslims are treated any differently by the law, they're treated worse (link to article about stop and search and police targeting of Muslims).

translation.HS: Muslims are all fundamentalist Islamist Salafist terrorists.
translation.CN: Wow, but you're confusing several notions, you're going to have to choose which one qualifies them.

translation.HS: Don't call Islam a peaceful religion. Consult the evidence on Muslim child rapists. Children were raped by more than 10 people in a night, up to 100 in a week. Why is the media ignoring this?
translation.CN: Evidence?

translation.HS: I think they pray in public only to make us infidels angry, not because it is a fundamental principle of Islam.
translation.CN: How many times have you seen evangelical Christian preachers and followers on the streets most Saturdays in most UK cities? You do not think that other faiths should be allowed the same?

translation.HS: Muslims force their child to fast during Ramadan.
translation.CN: No compulsion in religion.

translation.HS: We are seeing more and more of a Muslim problem.
translation.CN: Because you simply stigmatize this community.

translation.HS: They began to build mosques everywhere, and so they compete with our churches.
translation.CN: The number of mosques is irrelevant in relation to the number of churches.

translation.HS: We should pay attention to not offend Muslims while celebrating Christmas in our country.
translation.CN: This is simply not true.

translation.HS: It's a shame that there is no longer the crucifix in school, a lack of respect.
translation.CN: Italy is a laic state and as such, schools and public offices should be free from any religious influence. Culture is too precious to be sold to these guerrillas.

translation.HS: The Islamic veil is the demonstration of political Islam.
translation.CN: It is a religious sign. It has no connection with politics.

translation.HS: Islam will invade us: It is Islamization.
translation.CN: Ahhhh, well! Ahhhh it is for this reason that more and more French people are moving abroad! In the sun! Uh, in Muslim countries where it is good to live!

translation.HS: Islam teaches only hate! Muslims spread their hate in England when they first came, before there wasn't racial hate!
translation.CN: Are you suggesting that their very existence is an excuse for your hate?

translation.HS: The Islamic veil is the demonstration of political Islam.
translation.CN: It is not Islam that has imposed itself in the political spheres but the will of unscrupulous human beings to show this religion and these practitioners with their fingers.

translation.HS: Fgm happens only to girls that have muslims parents!
translation.CN: Female Genital Mutilation occurs in non-Muslim societies (including Christian and Animist ones) it is a cultural practice, not connected to religion.

translation.HS: Our national flag cannot be shown as it could annoy a Muslim.#fitinorfuckoff.
translation.CN: He got kicked out of MEN arena for peeing on the floor and punching security. Had nothing to do with his patriotic choice of attire.

translation.HS: Quite strange, the majority of Easter Eggs are being labelled 'Chocolate Eggs', I think this is because of the Muslims in our country, and the companies are betraying our culture.
translation.CN: I thought the association of Eggs with the celebration of Easter originally derived from Pagan, pre-Christian practices?

translation.HS: The Islamic veil is the demonstration of political Islam.
translation.CN: There is no politics in Islam.

translation.HS: They began to build mosques everywhere, and so they compete with our churches.
translation.CN: In Italy Muslims are one million and three hundred thousand: it seems logical that they have places in which to pray.

translation.HS: Muslim invasion is the new plague of London. They must be repatriated to their home countries!
translation.CN: Given the number of Muslims born in the UK, this statement is a bit silly.you cannot repatriate someone who hasn't moved.

translation.HS: If someone wrote the Koran to the present day it would not be allowed.
translation.CN: What you have just said is hate speech.

translation.HS: We welcome them in our house, we support them and they kill us: they are beasts, not men.
translation.CN: It is your address 'Italy'? Did you buy the entire Italian territory?

translation.HS: A Muslim's only real allegiance is to Allah (as a comment in relation to election for public office etc.)
translation.CN: Being religious has never stopped anyone from being in public office before. Christians have allegiance to God, is that not the same thing?

translation.HS: Islam is a religion incompatible with the values
translation.CN: The values of the Republic have advanced to the point that it can embrace all religions.

translation.HS: Islam is a totalitarian doctrine dressed disguised as a religion so that it can spread across our tolerant Christian world. Enough IS ENOUGH!
translation.CN: Oh the tolerant world that is spreading hate and fuelling discrimination against others?

translation.HS: Muslims should go home.
translation.CN: Can you define concretely, where they could return, and if you want to follow the theory, how to deal with those who have no family bonds with the countries of origin and with the reconverted ones?

translation.HS: Veiled women are subjected and forced to wear the headscarf.
translation.CN: The law prohibits requiring the wearing of a veil. If they do not file a complaint, it is because they do so voluntarily.

translation.HS: The Islamic veil is the demonstration of political Islam.
translation.CN: So kippah is a demonstration of political Judaism.

translation.HS: British laws betray every victim of Muslim rapists! There is one rule for muslim paedos and one for everyone else! How can we change the situation when the government is submitting to Islam so much?
translation.CN: Could point to me a specific law for Muslim criminals? I cannot find one. It is not true that they are judged differently. In fact, immigrants are even more vulnerable in our society and are likely to be judged more severely.

translation.HS: These Islamic will bring us back to the Middle Age. We will starve to death and die of diseases that disappeared.
translation.CN: Muslims have no intention of returning to the Middle Ages: the integralists are a minority.

translation.HS: Muslims hate anyone who is not Muslim.
translation.CN: False Islam never rejected anyone, Islam is not only made for Maghreb, Arab, etc. The Muslim religion is for the world.

translation.HS: Islam is a just a repressive ideology that persecutes women and gay people.
translation.CN: In the US, Muslims are more likely to be tolerant of LGBT+ people than Christians. Any religion can be used to persecute certain groups, it is the interpretation of it by its followers that matters.

translation.HS: Islam is irrational and incompatible with science.
translation.CN: We use Arabic numbers.

translation.HS: Finally a person who represents westerners, we hate Islam!
translation.CN: I know western people who do not hate Islam, thus, your statement is not true.

translation.HS: The Islamic veil is the demonstration of political Islam.
translation.CN: The Islamic veil is discreet, those who wear it are often discreet, and carry a message of tolerance, appeased.

translation.HS: These Islamic will bring us back to the Middle Age. We will starve to death and die of diseases that disappeared.
translation.CN: We have no news of particular infectious diseases in Islamic countries.

translation.HS: Veiled women are subjected and forced to wear the headscarf.
translation.CN: The veil symbolizes being in a prayer and is common to all religions.

translation.HS: Muslims are all terrorists.
translation.CN: For Muslims, life is sacred. Who kills a man, it is as if he killed all mankind.

translation.HS: Has our political elite forgotten that we were Christians? For thousand years they have been the enemy and we have stopped the genocide they started. And now we encourage that? Let the warriors take care of this because this is the war.
translation.CN: I'd think that in the 21st century people would be smarter and will not encourage wars. Do you want to also start a genocide? How are you different from the people you accuse?

translation.HS: The vast majority of Muslims are unemployed and refuse to work.
translation.CN: Where did you get your figures from? Because everywhere I look its a completely different story.

translation.HS: Not all Muslims are terrorists, but all terrorists are Muslims.
translation.CN: Are you sure it is not just that Muslim terrorists get a lot of biased media coverage?

translation.HS: Muslims: return to your country.
translation.CN: There is such a thing as musulmanie, I did not know.

translation.HS: Muslims must integrate or leave France!
translation.CN: It is rather that France has integrated Muslims from the Mediterranean.

translation.HS: Go on talking to yourself, no one will listen. Islam does not belong within western society. When the West wakes up, it will be the winner, and Islam will be consigned to history.
translation.CN: I am not sure what you think the West will be the 'winner' of. Islam isn't in competition with Western culture, and the idea it threatens it is a myth spread to incite fear.

translation.HS: You think these Muslim cockroaches have won? No, now is time for bloody retribution!
translation.CN: Such dehumanising language against many people.

translation.HS: The Sunnan Abu Dawud says that if a man has sex with an animal there will be no punishment.
translation.CN: I feel like you are grasping at straws here with your hate speech.

translation.HS: Europe is civilised, Muslims should not stay there.
translation.CN: Mindless Hate has no place in civilised Europe.

translation.HS: If someone wrote the Koran to the present day it would not be allowed.
translation.CN: So would the Bible, the Torah, etc.

translation.HS: France is a secular country, the practice of Islam should be banned.
translation.CN: The practice of Islam does not prevent us from living together and everyone's belief is secular.

translation.HS: They began to build mosques everywhere, and so they compete with our churches.
translation.CN: Let's hope they call good architects, my parish seems a huge garage of concrete.

translation.HS: Muslims are all terrorists.
translation.CN: Judging these is easy. Take the time to get to know each other, be smart.

translation.HS: Veiled women are subjected and forced to wear the headscarf.
translation.CN: Actually it is obligatory for praying, because in front of God you have to be covered.

translation.HS: The majority of immigrants are Muslims. It's useless to deny that this invasion, certainly peaceful, will bring in our society the Sharia. Glad you, if sharia represents culture and enrichment!
translation.CN: Hello, actually the data show that the majority of immigrants in Italy are Christian-Orthodox and non-Muslim faith: the situation is very diverse and I do not think we can speak of invasion when the number of Muslims in Italy (including Italian citizens) is just under 5%.

translation.HS: Veiled women are subjected and forced to wear the headscarf.
translation.CN: So, the best solution to get them out of this submission would make them feel guilty in public spaces systematically, to insult them permanently denying their integration and willingness to aspire to a decent life? Funny as a way to inclusiveness, and a way out of someone's submission.

translation.HS: We are seeing more and more of a Muslim problem.
translation.CN: Only in France there is a problem with Muslims. For example in England there is no problem with Muslims.

translation.HS: All versions of Islam have sharia law, thus, they are all extreme. Not all Muslims are engaged in actual violences, but every Muslim knows that jihad is the core of their religion, and they all support it.
translation.CN: But like any religious concept, 'Jihad' is interpreted in all sorts of ways. Afterall, for Christians, 'Fighting the Good fight' does not have to be a literal instruction. When I was at school, they called this a 'metaphor'.

translation.HS: Islam has nothing to do with western culture and as soon as the west will understand, this religion will be defeated.
translation.CN: I am not sure what you think the West will be the 'winner' of. Islam isn't in competition with Western culture, and the idea it threatens it is a myth spread to incite fear.

translation.HS: The Arabs want to impose their religion and to rule in our home. They must be sent back to their house on boats.
translation.CN: It seems to me that it was us, Westerners, to colonize and to impose our domination of the planet, even this day.

translation.HS: Benefits and access to our national health service must be stopped for Muslims. We should ban them from the UK!
translation.CN: Did history teach you nothing? How can you say this about an entire group of people?

translation.HS: Our government has allowed this islamic filth: machete attacks, women exploitation, gang rapes, killings. How dare they?
translation.CN: This is not true. How can you say this about an entire faith?

translation.HS: Islam will invade us: It is Islamization.
translation.CN: Islam calls to God: it is a proposal and never an obligation!

translation.HS: We want the borders of Europe closed! And the removal of Africanization and Islam !! They have no tolerance, and with the same tolerance they should be sent home!
translation.CN: Have you ever met an intolerant Muslim immigrant? Have you ever knew of migrants, and listened to their stories, before you send them back home? Are you sure of what will be the impact of closing the borders on your life? And on all the Italian people working in hospitality?

translation.HS: Your veil is an attack against me.
translation.CN: This is not its goal. My veil is a piece of clothing that is part of me.

translation.HS: Islamics must adapt to our culture and not vice versa.
translation.CN: Why can't we try to live peacefully each one with their own culture?

translation.HS: Islam is fanaticism. Muslims want to kill all who do not believe in their god.
translation.CN: Muslims are people who believe in Islam, they follow their religion and do not impose anything on anyone. Perhaps you refer to ISIS.

translation.HS: Muslims rape our women and must be neutered.
translation.CN: Castration? Do you think it is a punishment to propose in a society that defines itself modern and respects the rights? To me, it seems a medieval punishment.

translation.HS: The veiled women do not work. They are locked up at home.
translation.CN: Veiled women are often highly educated.

translation.HS: They began to build mosques everywhere, and so they compete with our churches.
translation.CN: Why where there is a Muslim community there shouldn't be a mosque?

translation.HS: Islam will invade us: It is Islamization.
translation.CN: The purpose of Islam is not to invade you, but to free you.

translation.HS: France is a secular country, the practice of Islam should be banned.
translation.CN: France is a secular country, yes. In the name of this secularism, the French state is bound by neutrality with respect to religious freedoms, which are also included in fundamental freedoms. It is secularism that guarantees and protects religious beliefs in France, whatever they are.

translation.HS: Islam is against the french values.
translation.CN: Islam is a religion that adapts to the country.

translation.HS: The veiled women do not work. They are locked up at home.
translation.CN: And that is exactly why they must be prohibited from wearing their veils in public spaces. It is complex thinking, don't look for it.

translation.HS: Uk is being islamized very fast. British government submits to every whim of Islam.
translation.CN: What type of whmis are you talking about? Laws are created after careful consideration of matters, it is not like every sudden desire will be fulfilled.

translation.HS: Not all Muslims are terrorists, but all terrorists are Muslims.
translation.CN: I do not see a lot of news articles about far right terrorism even though it is much more prevalent and is considered the biggest and fastest growing threat.

translation.HS: They began to build mosques everywhere, and so they compete with our churches.
translation.CN: And who wins what do they do, resuscitate?

translation.HS: Islam is a religion incompatible with the values
translation.CN: If you stop bludgeoning us all the time, we'd be able to communicate more easily.

translation.HS: Europe is civilised, Muslims should not stay there.
translation.CN: Oh, the same Muslims who contribute more than 31 billion pounds to economy and who give more to charity than other religious groups. Link to MEND factsheet.

translation.HS: Islam does not belong to Europe.
translation.CN: Islam has arrived well before Europe, so the connection of Islam with Europe is not correct.

translation.HS: The Islamic veil is the demonstration of political Islam.
translation.CN: It is just a demonstration of one's faith.

translation.HS: These animals.
translation.CN: Hi, I think that even in a delicate time like this it is important not to confuse those who commit acts of violence and the religion itself, which in its instructions does not permit such acts.

translation.HS: We cannot even celebrate Christmas in our own country for fear of offending Muslims.
translation.CN: Show me evidence of this?

translation.HS: Our children are being forced fed with this 'Islam' nonsense in schools. This is a disgrace.
translation.CN: The only disgrace is us being ignorant of other religions and cultures. This is not a society where I want to live.

translation.HS: Muslims rape our women and must be neutered.
translation.CN: So you also agree with castration of all the husbands / boyfriends / violent fellows that have Italian origin?

translation.HS: The veiled women do not work. They are locked up at home.
translation.CN: You are the one who locks them up and stigmatizes them so much.

translation.HS: Muslims have nothing to contribute to our society.
translation.CN: The 26% of NHS doctors who are Asian/Asian British beg to differ.

translation.HS: Islam is fanaticism. Muslims want to kill all who do not believe in their god.
translation.CN: On what basis do you do these statements? Where are the facts and the data which led you to say that? Should I think that all Italian muslims would kill me because I am Catholic?

translation.HS: Muslims always lie and take advantage of everything.
translation.CN: What elements do you have to say? Like 'Italians are all mobsters.'.

translation.HS: They only way to cope with Islam and sharia is to ban them from the UK. Though I respect the peaceful Muslims, all their clerics are agitating for war, and Islam is a cult.
translation.CN: To ban people you respect from practicing their faith because of the actions of a few does seem more than a bit unfair?

translation.HS: These liberal standards! Muslims are intolerant with other cultures, women and homosexuals, but our society protects them with this liberalist policy.
translation.CN: [link to Raheem Stirling article or other biased media example] Media bias against the Muslim community has been going on for years, do not be fooled by it any more.

translation.HS: Islam is fanaticism. Muslims want to kill all who do not believe in their god.
translation.CN: False.

translation.HS: We need to Burn the Koran and all the Mosques down - this will solve all problems in this country.
translation.CN: It would not solve the hate and persecution that plagues these comments.

translation.HS: Muslims want to make all French meat halal.
translation.CN: Every cult has its own meat. How is it a problem for you to eat hallal meat as long as you have no ban?

translation.HS: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
translation.CN: Why? What makes you say this? How are muslims 'uncivilised'?

translation.HS: Islam will invade us: It is Islamization.
translation.CN: Education of children.

translation.HS: Muslims: return to your country.
translation.CN: I have a home and I live in France, so I do not understand what you mean?

translation.HS: Has our political elite forgotten that we were Christians? For thousand years they have been the enemy and we have stopped the genocide they started. And now we encourage that? Let the warriors take care of this because this is the war.
translation.CN: What you said is an extreme case. One of the Islamic principles is to respect human dignity. Islam condemns violence.

translation.HS: These Islamic will bring us back to the Middle Age. We will starve to death and die of diseases that disappeared.
translation.CN: There are almost two billion Muslims in the world, in many countries, and they are very different. The most modern and evolved Islamic countries have cultural levels comparable to those of many Western countries. Generalizing is not correct.

translation.HS: Our country is fighting a war against Islam for a thousand years.
translation.CN: You sound a bit paranoid mate, I do not think Muslims feel the same way.

translation.HS: The Arabs are all terrorists and they want to conquer us with the violence and the bombs. We must respond with napalm.
translation.CN: I don't think responding to violence with violence has ever solved the problem; I wish however to point out that generalizations like the one you made are misleading, some Arabs are terrorists, as some Italians are mobsters, but not all Arabs are terrorists and not all Italians are mobsters.

translation.HS: Muslims are all terrorists.
translation.CN: I don't have to teach anyone who does not want to know the universally known values of Islam,.

translation.HS: The world would be a better place without Muslims. They are only killing and raping our children.
translation.CN: Stats show Muslims are more likely to be victims of crime, not perpetrators. This kind of false sentiment only serves to fuel hate crime against Muslims.

translation.HS: Our national flag cannot be shown as it could annoy a Muslim.#fitinorfuckoff.
translation.CN: So what about Muslims born in the UK whose national flag is the Union Jack?

translation.HS: A woman who accepts to live hidden under a veil and gets beaten by her man does not deserve to live in a civilized country like Italy.
translation.CN: In Italy as in all countries of the world, there are civilized and uncivilized people, you should support all women and help them to rebel, beyond that they freely choose to wear the veil or not.

translation.HS: It is curious that almost all easter eggs are being labelled 'chocolate eggs'. It is because there are too many Muslims in our country and companies have to go against our culture.
translation.CN: Just wondering what Muslims have to do with corporate branding tactics designed to make us spend more money.

translation.HS: Muslims benefit from the French system.
translation.CN: Islam advocates the value of subsistence obtained through the fruit of its labour.

translation.HS: Muslims: return to your country.
translation.CN: French of Portuguese origin converted to Islam.

translation.HS: I will not allow my kids to marry a muslim! Go to hell Muslims, I hate you!
translation.CN: So much hatred. We must respect and understand all peoples.

translation.HS: Veiled women are subjected and forced to wear the headscarf.
translation.CN: If these women were "subject", would they resist the islamophobic pressure in public places and workplaces?

translation.HS: We cannot live with a religion that blows up his believers!
translation.CN: Terrorism cannot be generalized to the entire religion of Islam or to any other religion. A Muslim believer knows that his religion does not profess violence, but peace.

translation.HS: Your veil is an attack against me.
translation.CN: I am not responsible for your perception of my veil.

translation.HS: It is one law for Muslims and another law for us.
translation.CN: Nah, I think that is too much effort for our politicians.

translation.HS: #visitmymosque.but pretend not to see that lots of white girls are abused by muslims grooming gangs in Rotherham, Rochdale,Tyneside,Teesside etc.
translation.CN: No one's saying do not ask questions. Maybe if you did the answers would surprise you.

translation.HS: Muslims rape our women and must be neutered.
translation.CN: It's a horrendous fact, but to generalize and direct the hatred on a single community is infamous. The problem of violence against women, and unfortunately, these hideous crimes are mostly committed by Italians, at home.

translation.HS: Damn bastards, they want us to close all churches.
translation.CN: Everyone must be able to express their faith.

translation.HS: We must not believe the liberal and political elite. Islam is no good, its complete evil, and an ideology of war and it was always like this. All Muslims are bound to fight against us, and that is what they do through deception and violence.
translation.CN: If you would know more about Islamic ideology, you would agree that Islam is not only about war and violence. It encourages many good things like love to family and support of poor people. You confuse Muslims in general with armed bands!

translation.HS: The Islamic veil is the demonstration of political Islam.
translation.CN: As soon as a woman speaks well in public, it is a problem.

translation.HS: We cannot trust the Muslims, they are all swindlers.
translation.CN: The essentialization of people because of their religion, it is a reprehensible hate speech.

translation.HS: Bombs on you, bad infamous people (enough is enough stinky)
translation.CN: It would be better to listen less to hatred and more to rationality.

translation.HS: Islam is a medieval religion.
translation.CN: But cathedrals are also fascinating.

translation.HS: Islamics must adapt to our culture and not vice versa.
translation.CN: Have you ever felt obligated to adapt to the Islamic religion?

translation.HS: We are seeing more and more of a Muslim problem.
translation.CN: We see only what we look at. Do you not see a social problem, a racist problem, a problem of violence that affects our country?

translation.HS: These despicable Muslims hadn't won yet. Now there will be a cruel punishment!
translation.CN: 1000s of Muslims died in WW1 and 2 defending Britain, 1000s still in UK armed forces defending peace across the world. Bloody retribution on them, really?

translation.HS: The Arabs are all terrorists and they want to conquer us with the violence and the bombs. We must respond with napalm.
translation.CN: One cannot generalize and lay the blame of a few fanatics on thousands of other innocent people.

translation.HS: The Islamic veil is the demonstration of political Islam.
translation.CN: Dressing at your convenience is a demonstration of a democratic society that respects human rights!

translation.HS: Never share a meal with a Muslim: you could catch HIV or Ebola.
translation.CN: Provided the basis for all Western scientific and philosophical knowledge?

translation.HS: Your veil is an attack against me.
translation.CN: A veil is not aggressive. Your words are.

translation.HS: Islam will invade us: It is Islamization.
translation.CN: Islam has been in Europe for centuries, the problem is the extreme right and it has always been.

translation.HS: Our country wants to shut up those who speak against islam, but it isn't right, they are the only ones who expose themselves.
translation.CN: I think people are banned because they create insulting behavior and fear, which should be stopped. Besides, the majority of Muslims who follow Islam are kind people. Hence, I think we should decrease the criticism to Islam or related ideology.

translation.HS: Fgm happens only to girls that have muslims parents!
translation.CN: Christians also practise FGM. It is not a uniquely Muslim problem.

translation.HS: Veiled women are subjected and forced to wear the headscarf.
translation.CN: The veil is put to approach God and pray.

translation.HS: Islam teaches only hate! Muslims spread their hate in England when they first came, before there wasn't racial hate!
translation.CN: This has not factual basis.

translation.HS: Not all Muslims are terrorists, but all terrorists are Muslims.
translation.CN: And your evidence is. Or does your logic stop there.

translation.HS: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
translation.CN: Oh, the same Muslims who contribute more than 31 billion pounds to economy and who give more to charity than other religious groups. Link to MEND factsheet.

translation.HS: Thousands of our girls abused by Muslim rape gangs, commanded by Koran. Why do we keep accepting this?
translation.CN: The vast majority of Muslims denounce rape, it is not commanded by the Qur'an. Get your facts checked before spreading negative stereotypes about people!

translation.HS: We welcome them in our house, we support them and they kill us: they are beasts, not men.
translation.CN: Migrants contribute to the Italian GDP to an extent to pay not only the expenses of hospitality but also many pensions.

translation.HS: We should pay attention to not offend Muslims while celebrating Christmas in our country.
translation.CN: I have never seen so many people celebrating Christmas this year and as far as I know none of Muslims were offended. So, what are you talking about?

translation.HS: The police and politicians are covering up these Muslim grooming gangs - They are traitors to their own people!
translation.CN: We need to work together to eradicate CSE once and for all. Individuals are the problem, it does not come from any religion, biased media attempting to scapegoat is being blind to the whole truth.

translation.HS: Muslims are all terrorists.
translation.CN: In terms of statistics, it is wrong. You want sources?

translation.HS: Muslims hate anyone who is not Muslim.
translation.CN: Islam is a religion of peace.

translation.HS: All Muslims should be deported, no one wants them here.
translation.CN: That is quite a generalisation. What have 'all' Muslims done to deserve being deported?

translation.HS: Muslims are all terrorists.
translation.CN: Islam is a religion, like Christianity and Judaism, it has nothing to do with terrorism, it is a dangerous and offensive generalization.

translation.HS: These Islamic will bring us back to the Middle Age. We will starve to death and die of diseases that disappeared.
translation.CN: If we will be able to accept and integrate into our society those who arrive from other countries, there will be an enrichment for everyone.

translation.HS: Europe is civilised, Muslims should not stay there.
translation.CN: Muslims contribute much to Europe and have done since the 19th Century.

translation.HS: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
translation.CN: There are centuries old Islamic communities in Europe.

translation.HS: People that live in the West cannot live with Muslims.
translation.CN: Yes, their teachings of peace and tolerance really are incompatible in the hate-infested discriminatory Western society nowadays.

translation.HS: Muslims are all terrorists.
translation.CN: You know all the Muslims, that must make the world?

translation.HS: The veiled women do not work. They are locked up at home.
translation.CN: Get out of your cave.

translation.HS: Islam is a cult and not a religion. They rape children, enslave and murder people, attack our values, and there is nothing good about it. It is incompatible with our way of life.
translation.CN: Rape, enslavement, and murder are all common occurrences in the Bible. Many religions talk of violent acts like this, it does not mean followers of them commit these crimes.

translation.HS: Muslims are all fundamentalist Islamist Salafist terrorists.
translation.CN: So many lies and shortcuts.

translation.HS: You think these Muslim cockroaches have won? No, now is time for bloody retribution!
translation.CN: Bloody retribution? Most people of all faiths are just getting on with their lives and a tiny minority like your comment seems to be trying to create conflict. But I do not think any of you are winning.

translation.HS: We are seeing more and more of a Muslim problem.
translation.CN: I can suggest you a book: 'French elite and construction of the Muslim problem' by Julien Beaug�� and Abdellali Hajjat.

translation.HS: The problem of rape in Europe has been present since Muslims immigrants arrived there. They have been protected for years by the government and by the police who have not taken action.
translation.CN: Do you have any proofs that the rape epidemic exists? That it is due to Muslim immigrants? I think that there are many sad accidents every day, and not all of them are attributed to Muslims. So your words are really strong ones and I would like to see them supported with concrete facts.

translation.HS: Muslims: return to your country.
translation.CN: The France is our country.

translation.HS: Have Muslims ever made a contribution to our society?
translation.CN: List of positive news stories.

translation.HS: The vast majority of Muslims are unemployed and refuse to work.
translation.CN: That is not what I observe from the many hardworking muslims contributing to our economy.

translation.HS: Shocking. 2 men are murdered in Paris by having their throats cut by some savage shouting 'Allahu Akbar' and the BBC ignore the story. Another cover up.
translation.CN: Is this true? Where is your source?

translation.HS: There are bands of muslim rapists everywhere in telford, rotherham, rochdale, oxford, newcastle etc. It is awful!
translation.CN: Do you think the rape crime or gangs are formed only by Muslims? What do you suggest we can do to reduce the crime rate?

translation.HS: Islam opposes creativity, since all that is needed is the Koran. It is not a religion, but a system of control.
translation.CN: Don't all religions play a significant role in organizing and directing social life, acting as agents for socialisation and social control?

translation.HS: Your veil is an attack against me.
translation.CN: You can always divert your gaze.

translation.HS: They began to build mosques everywhere, and so they compete with our churches.
translation.CN: It does not seem to me that there are so many mosques in our cities. Could you provide me some data about their number?

translation.HS: Look around you, rape is jihad in the UK. I can remember days when Islam was not here, and now muslim rapists are everywhere.
translation.CN: This is simply wrong. How can you say such hateful things about millions of people?

translation.HS: Look around you, rape is jihad in the UK. I can remember days when Islam was not here, and now muslim rapists are everywhere.
translation.CN: Where did you get this conclusion from? There might be bias in the collecting of information. For example, in fact, large numbers of sexual offences were convicted by white men.

translation.HS: Muslims need to oppose child rapists instead of talking about islam all the time. This way they would be a peaceful religion.
translation.CN: How is the action of an individual or group representative of an entire faith?

translation.HS: What is the point in listening to Muslim women? They are all retarded.
translation.CN: You decide whether or not people are intelligent based on their religion? Well, this is not a way forward.

translation.HS: The Arabs want to impose their religion and to rule in our home. They must be sent back to their house on boats.
translation.CN: History teaches that Christians wanted to impose their religion at the home of others.

translation.HS: The Arabs want to impose their religion and to rule in our home. They must be sent back to their house on boats.
translation.CN: No Arab has ever tried to impose their religion to an Italian.

translation.HS: Muslim men are violent, Muslim women are subjected.
translation.CN: Muslim women are subjected to their God and not to their men, so as you are subjected to your laws.

translation.HS: Watch out historical recurrences, this time blast-furnace will light!
translation.CN: There is a solution to violence, that is the dialogue. We must try to communicate with people who have different cultures, not isolate ourselves.

translation.HS: Islam is a just a repressive ideology that persecutes women and gay people.
translation.CN: Many Muslims aren't homophobic and sexist, but like in any religion, some are. It is not the religion, its cultural and personal attitudes.

translation.HS: People that live in the West cannot live with Muslims.
translation.CN: Perhaps we should stop exporting goods or buying stuff from Islamic countries? While we're at it give back their numbers, maths and architecture?

translation.HS: There are groups of Muslims, instructed by Koran, that rape our women, and we allow this to happen. Why?
translation.CN: There are Bible scriptures about the stoning to death of virgins who do not scream when they are raped, we do not blame the bible for Christian rapists. The Quran.

translation.HS: Are you an English girl living in an Islamic area? Remember to keep away from Muslim men. Do not.Take gifts of sweets, cigarettes, drink or drugs. Do not. Accept lifts or 'party' invitations. Do not.Trust Police or Social Workers.
translation.CN: Are you a misogynistic man trying to use objectification of women to justify your hate?

translation.HS: Islam is all about hate! When Muslims first set foot in Britain was when race hate started in England!
translation.CN: Perhaps you should monitor your own hate speech before pointing the finger at others?

translation.HS: People that live in the West cannot live with Muslims.
translation.CN: Except the ones who save lives, teach children, support the vulnerable and feed the rest of us?

translation.HS: The Arabs want to impose their religion and to rule in our home. They must be sent back to their house on boats.
translation.CN: In a civilized country there is the coexistence of different religions, none dominates the other, but rather coexist peacefully.

translation.HS: The Arabs want to impose their religion and to rule in our home. They must be sent back to their house on boats.
translation.CN: Good evening, in what sense control at our home? Creating a party and presenting at the election? With a coup? Where do I find information about it?

translation.HS: Islam is a non-peaceful religion that professes violence.
translation.CN: Hi, I would suggest you to do some research about Islam. Islam is a peaceful religion that quite definitely not profess violence.

translation.HS: They make us think that islam is a religion to diffuse their doctrine in our tolerant culture. Enough is enough!
translation.CN: The Christian world can be far from tolerant. Muslims in the US are more likely to have tolerant attitudes toward LGBT people than Christians. Maybe we can all learn something from them?

translation.HS: A Muslim's only real allegiance is to Allah (as a comment in relation to election for public office etc.)
translation.CN: Looks like you are suggesting that politicians should not be religious.

translation.HS: Muslims are all fundamentalist Islamist Salafist terrorists.
translation.CN: Whatever.

translation.HS: Muslims steal our work.
translation.CN: This speech targets immigrants in general, but to be accepted with a climate of hatred against Muslims, he changed the name of the target. Among the eastern immigrants, for example, there are Christians and Muslims.

translation.HS: We are seeing more and more of a Muslim problem.
translation.CN: Yet on television they are non-existent!

translation.HS: A real Islamic invasion is taking place.
translation.CN: I do not think that talking about invasion is correct. Most migrants that arrive in Italy are distributed in the rest of Europe, where Italy is second last in number of immigrants for inhabitant.

translation.HS: We must send Islamics back to their native countries. They are too different from us.
translation.CN: There seems to be a confusion between 'citizenship' and 'faith' - you cannot really dump a load of people on some faraway coast just because they share the same faith as the majority of the other people who live there.

translation.HS: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
translation.CN: Shall we also ban coffee, paper, guitar, the English language, algebra, vaccinations against disease, canals, hospitals, the numeric system and every other contribution to 'civilised Europe' from the Islamic world?

translation.HS: People go to prison for just words against Muslims, but Islamic crimes against Europeans are left unpunished. People are banned from UK for just words, but Muslim rapists are allowed to enter. English laws persecute us instead of defending us, English people.
translation.CN: Where did you get this information from? I do not believe any crime would be free from judgement. We should have more faith in English laws and people who execute the laws.

translation.HS: Not all Muslims are terrorists, but all terrorists are Muslims.
translation.CN: Only because when a non-muslim commits a terrorist act it is not called terrorism. Instead they're a 'lone wolf' with a 'traumatic past'.

translation.HS: Muslims rape our women and must be neutered.
translation.CN: If anything, we women must express what is harmful to us.

translation.HS: All Muslims are incompatible with any Western society.
translation.CN: Define western society? Who chooses this?

translation.HS: Never break bread with a Quranimal. You risk catching HIV and/or Ebola.
translation.CN: Had lunch with some Muslim friends recently. Somehow, I am still HIV and Ebola free!

translation.HS: Muslims: return to your country.
translation.CN: I am French, I love my France: Liberty, Equality, Fraternity. Unfortunately there is not much French spirit left since long ago, they cut off its precious values.

translation.HS: Muslims rape our women and must be neutered.
translation.CN: These are shameful and horrendous crimes, many times perpetrated within the home and within the family.

translation.HS: Muslims use corporal and cruel punishment on people.
translation.CN: But it isn't, is it?

translation.HS: They are replacing us in our house! They should remain at their home to put on the burqa and beat their wives.
translation.CN: Hi, I do not think that those who profess the true Muslim faith can admit violence against women or non-respect for freedom of religion. The Koran makes no references in this sense, those who act in this way are doing it going against the same provisions of belief that say to be inspired.

translation.HS: They constantly say that their religion is a 'religion of peace', maybe because in reality it isn't.
translation.CN: Religion is an integral part of our society, surely it is a good thing that it preaches peace.

translation.HS: I think islam is staining the humanity.
translation.CN: I would not say the many Muslim doctors, soldiers, humanitarians, scientists, and rights advocates are a nasty stain on humanity. Generalised hate like this, however, is.

translation.HS: The veiled women do not work. They are locked up at home.
translation.CN: Do not stop them from working and studying then.

translation.HS: The problem of rape in Europe has been present since Muslims immigrants arrived there. They have been protected for years by the government and by the police who have not taken action.
translation.CN: I think the #CatholicChurch #pope #childabuse might have them beaten hands down this is not restricted to anyone faith or community.

translation.HS: Stop mosques, lairs of terrorists.
translation.CN: Allowing the construction of a mosque confers credit to us, it means respecting the other in all its diversity.

translation.HS: Muslims are invading London. There are more Muslims than Londoners in London. #londinistan #LondonHasFallen.
translation.CN: Send me a postcard!

translation.HS: Muslims conceived the slave trade.
translation.CN: No, an entire faith did not invent the slave trade.

translation.HS: Is this Afghanistan or Pakistan? You would never say this is an english town.#saville town (text accompanying video footage of people on their way to friday prayers etc. ).
translation.CN: Yeah, so what is your point? It looks like a place where people can live and do what they want and believe even in the West.

translation.HS: Islam is a religion incompatible with the values
translation.CN: France does not have to comment on how Muslims practice as long as they respect their country!

translation.HS: Muslims: return to your country.
translation.CN: After You, because most of the racists are of European and other origin, very few native French.

translation.HS: How can we fight anti-Semitism when city ghettos of Birmingham, Bradford, etc. Are full of anti-Semitic Pakistani muslims? Labour is lost to the mix of Radical Islam/middle class.
translation.CN: Do you know that anti-Islamism is actually a form of anti-Semitism? It is equally wrong to hate Jews and Muslims.

translation.HS: Veiled women are subjected and forced to wear the headscarf.
translation.CN: And you think that by forcing them to remove it, you give them more freedom?

translation.HS: 99% of Muslims in the UK are unemployable and refuse to work.
translation.CN: Statistics and facts simply prove this wrong.

translation.HS: Veiled women are subjected and forced to wear the headscarf.
translation.CN: The veiled women are not subjected, only to their Lord, Creator of all things.

translation.HS: Almost all Muslims deliberately decide not to work.
translation.CN: Muslims create over 70000 jobs in their firms in London alone, so no they do not refuse to work, they in fact create work for others.

translation.HS: Muslims hate anyone who is not Muslim.
translation.CN: Do you have examples?

translation.HS: The police and politicians are covering up these Muslim grooming gangs - They are traitors to their own people!
translation.CN: No they are not - prove this?

translation.HS: They want to impose the veil on all of us.
translation.CN: Well, but we can choose the color .! What's your favorite?

translation.HS: Muslims are anti-semitic.
translation.CN: Known anti-semitic acts in history were committed by non-Muslim Europeans.

translation.HS: All Muslims should be deported, no one wants them here.
translation.CN: You mean YOU do not want them here, most everyone else does, sorry.

translation.HS: Muslims conceived the slave trade.
translation.CN: Slavery has been rampant in early societies of all kinds. I am sure the Romans did not take inspiration for their slave trade directly from Muslims.

translation.HS: Since 2000 there were 5248 suicide bombings and all of them were made by Muslims. But nobody considers this when talking about global terrorism.
translation.CN: Your statistics are not right, where did you get them? Why skew the stats to focus on Muslims when every terrorist, bomber, and rogue shooter needs to be stopped.

translation.HS: We breed pigs to feed muslims.
translation.CN: We are in a civilized and secular country in which everyone is free to profess the religion they want. As a Christian has the right to go to church every Sunday, a Muslim must have the right not to eat pork.

translation.HS: Muslims need to oppose child rapists instead of talking about islam all the time. This way they would be a peaceful religion.
translation.CN: Muslim people I know are strongly against any crime, and rapism is a sin in Islam. They talk to their children about that. Thus, they indeed counteract such cases.

translation.HS: They impose on us their culture.
translation.CN: I think as long as they do not force us to eliminate churches and ham there is nothing to be alarmed about;).

translation.HS: Muslims hate Christians. They want to kill all of us.
translation.CN: Aren't you the one who hates Muslims?

translation.HS: We do not want to admit that islam isn't a religion, it is only a cult that support murder.
translation.CN: Has history taught you nothing about this level of hatred?

translation.HS: Our liberal government continues to ignore child rapes and Islamic radicalisation, because they promote modern values, e.g. Increasing the sexualization of children. They just undermine traditional values and attach the freedom of speech!
translation.CN: Sexualization of children is a modern value? Do you actually know what is meant by values?

translation.HS: Islam is fanaticism. Muslims want to kill all who do not believe in their god.
translation.CN: Have you read the Koran? I think that you speak using stereotypes.

translation.HS: Your veil is an attack against me.
translation.CN: It is me who is hot inside. Could you at least be understanding.

translation.HS: We are not allowed to celebrate Easter as a Christian festival for fear of offending Muslims.
translation.CN: Yes, we are allowed to celebrate Easter as Muslims are allowed to celebrate Ramadan. No one is offending anyone here, why is there a need to create division?

translation.HS: Since 2000 there were 5248 suicide bombings and all of them were made by Muslims. But nobody considers this when talking about global terrorism.
translation.CN: So when a white person kills someone, they're called a murderer. When a minority does it they're labelled a terrorist. We need to combat violent acts in all their forms. If we focus on just one group then we are blind to the rest of the problem. [picture of iceberg].

translation.HS: Muslims in Britain vote for the Labour party. This is why the problem of antisemitism is not solved. It is a mathematical fact!
translation.CN: Britain Muslims means they are Britishes who enjoy the right covered by the Act. It is logical that labour party should consider their right and voice as well.

translation.HS: Since 2000 there were 5248 suicide bombings and all of them were made by Muslims. But nobody considers this when talking about global terrorism.
translation.CN: Terrorists come in all religions and political views. People opposing Trump were sent letter bombs, the 'Troubles' saw Christian terrorists on both sides of the border. Let's challenge all terrorism.

translation.HS: Muslims can rape white girls without consequences, but if a white man did this to a muslim girl, he would be in jail.
translation.CN: Who can say that Muslims are privileged? They are reminded too often that their religion is not welcome here. I do not see where you find double standards as all criminals are judged and punished, Muslim criminals are also judged by their own community.

translation.HS: Islam will invade us: It is Islamization.
translation.CN: The jealousy of a beautiful religion.

translation.HS: We cannot even take the dog for a walk, we could offend Muslims.
translation.CN: Explain? This is not the case.

translation.HS: I do not really understand why I should listen to Muslim women. They are evidently dumb.
translation.CN: You decide whether or not people are intelligent based on their religion? Well, this is not a way forward.

translation.HS: Your veil is an attack against me.
translation.CN: Learn to live together.

translation.HS: They want us to believe that this is normal, soon our little girls will be veiled.
translation.CN: It is not prohibited by law.

translation.HS: Islamists / Moslems have mastered the corrupt art of playing the victim and blaming other cultures for the violent beliefs taught in their main books.
translation.CN: Muslim's face huge amounts of discrimination and prejudice everyday the evidence is incontrovertible and yet most just keep going and working hard, its not playing the victim.

translation.HS: Fgm happens only to girls that have muslims parents!
translation.CN: The problem is, it seems to me like you are just using this as an excuse to express your Islamophobia. Fgm is a very serious breach of human rights and you do not seem to be interested in tackling the real problem.

translation.HS: The Muslims are imposing their culture in the U.K and the government allows it by submitting to Islam.
translation.CN: We will not know until the next census by recent survey suggests that the UK is increasingly a secular society with a growing percentage expressing no religious affiliation at all.

translation.HS: Die islamic!
translation.CN: Do you really think that an ordinary and innocent person like us should suffer violence? Why?

translation.HS: They began to build mosques everywhere, and so they compete with our churches.
translation.CN: It does not appear to me, actually.

translation.HS: These Islamic will bring us back to the Middle Age. We will starve to death and die of diseases that disappeared.
translation.CN: When you're an immigrant in a country that welcomes you with respect, you're the first to want to demonstrate that you respect the rules that are there, respect is a two-way mutual function.

translation.HS: Using violence to punish another person? Sounds like a muslim issue.
translation.CN: Violence is only permitted in the qu'ran through means of self-defence.

translation.HS: Muslims are all fundamentalist Islamist Salafist terrorists.
translation.CN: So many words describing your lack of personality. Pretty copy and paste all over the place of long-winded pseudo-experts in terrorism.

translation.HS: Why must Islam invade every country? That is just totalitarian. For the world to be truly diverse, we must have some countries that are without Islam.
translation.CN: By your logic, the world will be diverse so long as Islam isn't practiced in Antactica?

translation.HS: The veil is contrary to secularism.
translation.CN: And your statement is completely false. The freedom to express one's religion is guaranteed by secularism.

translation.HS: Image (features protesters with signs such as 'behead those who insult Islam) with a caption saying 'How can we be Islamophobic when they really do want to kill us'.
translation.CN: On a brighter note, a counter-terrorism protest held by more than 10,000 Muslims advocated peace and people held posters denouncing terror.

translation.HS: Your veil is an attack against me.
translation.CN: The veil is on my head, not on yours.

translation.HS: The veiled women do not work. They are locked up at home.
translation.CN: Unfortunately, the majority of veiled women are discriminated against and cannot find work.

translation.HS: Veiled women are subjected and forced to wear the headscarf.
translation.CN: If you think that after harassing the woman she will become faulted, it is you who does not understand the respect for freedom of conscience.

translation.HS: Muslims: return to your country.
translation.CN: We are French.

translation.HS: If they do not adapt to our culture, they can go away.
translation.CN: 95% of British Muslims feel a loyalty to the UK and contribute over 31 billion pounds to the UK economy. They look like a valuable part of the community to me. (statistics from MEND.org.uk)

translation.HS: Veiled women are subjected and forced to wear the headscarf.
translation.CN: Subject to whom, to what? As any woman, they are free to dress as they please.

translation.HS: We must not believe the liberal and political elite. Islam is no good, its complete evil, and an ideology of war and it was always like this. All Muslims are bound to fight against us, and that is what they do through deception and violence.
translation.CN: Muslims many times have shown how supportive they are of other communities. It does not sound to me that they want to fight against us and start a war?

translation.HS: Your veil is an attack against me.
translation.CN: And if you got to know me, maybe I'd be less aggressive.

translation.HS: Islam will invade us: It is Islamization.
translation.CN: Islam is one of the minority religions in this country and it is sustainably so. To believe that there is an extra-terrestrial plot to Islamize France is a pure delusion. A large proportion of French Muslims are of immigrant origin. Parents and grandparents were brought in as cheap and docile labours. It turns out that they were also largely Muslims and attached to their religious practice. And their children and grandchildren are also the vast majority.

translation.HS: Your veil is an attack against me.
translation.CN: What is aggression? Define what is done AGAINST you!

translation.HS: Muslims use corporal and cruel punishment on people.
translation.CN: Using intolerance and discrimination against anyone different? Sounds like a western issue.

translation.HS: Islam is a just a repressive ideology that persecutes women and gay people.
translation.CN: Women and gay people have been persecuted by many groups all over the world and it needs to change. Is there a particular reason you are picking on Islam?

translation.HS: We aren't allowed to build churches in their countries, why should they be allowed to build Mosques in ours?
translation.CN: Surprise - we are actually allowed to do this! Read on. Sacred Heart Cathedral in Lahor, Holy Trinity Cathedral in Karachi.

translation.HS: We cannot trust the Muslims, they are all swindlers.
translation.CN: Is your goal to break national harmony? You will not succeed.

translation.HS: Quite strange, the majority of Easter Eggs are being labelled 'Chocolate Eggs', I think this is because of the Muslims in our country, and the companies are betraying our culture.
translation.CN: Looks to me like supermarkets just want to sell more products to people regardless of faith.

translation.HS: These liberal standards! Muslims are intolerant with other cultures, women and homosexuals, but our society protects them with this liberalist policy.
translation.CN: I can feel you. However, the majority of Muslims are not against women or other cultures. They are like us who want to be treated equally and they have the right as human. Keeping Muslims away is not helpful either. Instead, we could think of ways to increase the disparity.

translation.HS: You think these Muslim cockroaches have won? No, now is time for bloody retribution!
translation.CN: 1000s of Muslims died in WW1 and 2 defending Britain, 1000s still in UK armed forces defending peace across the world. Bloody retribution on them, really?

translation.HS: Our government has brought Islamic invaders to our country, and now we see our girls and women damaged.
translation.CN: There are no islamic invaders and this is just hatred.

translation.HS: Liberal ideas are wrong, they want us to think that Islam is good but in reality it is a cult about war and violence.
translation.CN: Muslims many times have shown how supportive they are of other communities. It does not sound to me that they want to fight against us and start a war?

translation.HS: Go on talking to yourself, no one will listen. Islam does not belong within western society. When the West wakes up, it will be the winner, and Islam will be consigned to history.
translation.CN: Who said that West and Islam are competing at all? Is there a war? I do not like this way of seeing things. We should live in one world together and solve bigger problems humanity is facing, not fight over different cultures.

translation.HS: Islam hates Christians and Jews.
translation.CN: Only Islam tolerates other religions.

translation.HS: We have been at war with Islam for a thousand years.
translation.CN: Who has? Nobody has been at war with an entire faith for a thousand years.

translation.HS: Muslims rape our women and must be neutered.
translation.CN: Generalizing is always wrong. I also condemn those who commit certain crimes, but regardless of their religious beliefs or their nationality.

translation.HS: We welcome them in our house, we support them and they kill us: they are beasts, not men.
translation.CN: The costs of hospitality are supported by European funds.

translation.HS: We do not want to admit that islam isn't a religion, it is only a cult that support murder.
translation.CN: There's more in Islam than death and terror. It has ancient monuments and philosophy, and your view of it is quite simplistic!

translation.HS: Europe is civilised, Muslims should not stay there.
translation.CN: So-called civilised Europe has benefited from Islamic contributions for hundreds of years, even some basic research would tell you that Muslims have just as much right as any other to be here.

translation.HS: These liberal standards! Muslims are intolerant with other cultures, women and homosexuals, but our society protects them with this liberalist policy.
translation.CN: Nah mate, they really don't.

translation.HS: Muslims must integrate or leave France!
translation.CN: Forced integration with a desire for assimilation is a dictatorship criterion.

translation.HS: Islam is fanaticism. Muslims want to kill all who do not believe in their god.
translation.CN: Generalizing is very dangerous. Perhaps these are people who have a belief different from yours, but the integration and encounter between different cultures is essential nowadays.

translation.HS: The vast majority of Muslims are unemployed and refuse to work.
translation.CN: Provide examples of those in the muslim community working.

translation.HS: The Arabs want to impose their religion and to rule in our home. They must be sent back to their house on boats.
translation.CN: We can also say that all believers want to impose their religion. Does it tell you nothing about the matter, 'the crucifix in schools'?

translation.HS: It is curious that almost all easter eggs are being labelled 'chocolate eggs'. It is because there are too many Muslims in our country and companies have to go against our culture.
translation.CN: [insert picture of Easter egg labelled as such] Are they?

translation.HS: We aren't allowed to build churches in their countries, why should they be allowed to build Mosques in ours?
translation.CN: There are churches in Muslim countries like Turkey, UAE, Morrocco. What is your point?

translation.HS: Fgm happens only to girls that have muslims parents!
translation.CN: 26% of all doctors in the NHS are Asian or British Asian and abhor FGM. They are making a difference instead of just spreading hate and division in our community.

translation.HS: Our national flag cannot be shown as it could annoy a Muslim.#fitinorfuckoff.
translation.CN: I am really good at making up stories, believing only the things I want to and then ranting about it too.

translation.HS: One of many Pakistani rapist.we should extradite them from our country.
translation.CN: Punishing the 'Many' for the sins of the 'Few' - what sort of disgusting country do you think we live in?

translation.HS: Image (features protesters with signs such as 'behead those who insult Islam) with a caption saying 'they want to eliminate us, we must be islamophobic'.
translation.CN: And Trump supporters sent pipe bombs to his opposition, including Robert De Niro, those individuals do not represent all of Trump's supporters though.

translation.HS: Islam - Silence is tacit acceptance. Raise your voice before it is too late!
translation.CN: Islam - Silence is tacit acceptance. Raise your voice against Islamophobia!

translation.HS: Europe is civilised, Muslims should not stay there.
translation.CN: Provide positive news stories about the Muslim community.

translation.HS: Nazism is like terrorism. At the beginning only a few Germans supported it and with Muslims it is the same.
translation.CN: So more than 95% are fighting extremism and spreading peace and tolerance, there are extremists in every group.

translation.HS: Those White women converting to Islam are the saddest, self-loathers you will ever meet. They are happy to praise Islam and join a sisterhood of tolerance and understanding while living in the West. Try living in Pakistan, Saudi Arabia, or Sudan.
translation.CN: So you are suggesting Pakistan, Saudi Arabia, and the Sudan oppress women, but somehow you know better than every white woman who is a Muslim and feel entitled to make public judgements about them. See what I am getting at?

translation.HS: We must not believe the liberal and political elite. Islam is no good, its complete evil, and an ideology of war and it was always like this. All Muslims are bound to fight against us, and that is what they do through deception and violence.
translation.CN: There are criminals, who are from UK, raping children and murdering people. Maybe it's better we should first focus on these cases and think how we could decrease the number of crimes.

translation.HS: Veiled women are subjected and forced to wear the headscarf.
translation.CN: Everyone is free to dress as they see fit in a democracy.

translation.HS: We are not allowed to raise our national flag in case it offends a Muslim! #fitinorfuckoff.
translation.CN: So what about Muslims born in the UK whose national flag is the Union Jack?

translation.HS: Even if all religions bring death, Islam is the worst one. Islam does not lead to anything but death.
translation.CN: What makes you think that? Besides, I am sure Islam is more than just trouble.

translation.HS: Every Muslim is a potential terrorist.
translation.CN: And views like that, that lumps all Muslims together, pretends they are less than human pushes them a tiny bit closer.

translation.HS: The Islamic veil is the demonstration of political Islam.
translation.CN: The headscarf / veil is not a political banner.

translation.HS: Muslims rape our women and must be neutered.
translation.CN: Unfortunately, violence against women is a cross fact that happens in every country, in every corner, and the victims are us, us women, so let's not make it an issue of nation, ethnicity, religion, a crime is a crime, whoever does it and castration does not really seem the solution to the problem.

translation.HS: The Arabs are all terrorists and they want to conquer us with the violence and the bombs. We must respond with napalm.
translation.CN: Who is really in charge to combat terrorism would not agree with you.

translation.HS: Women and girls are harmed by Islamic that were allowed to enter in our country by our government.
translation.CN: There is a lot of difference in how girls and women are treated across different branches of Islam just like Christianity and Judaism.

translation.HS: Muslims are two-faced, have you ever seen a Muslim protest against Isis or Saudi human right abuses?
translation.CN: A simple google search of this will illustrate otherwise (provide evidence).

translation.HS: Islam - Silence is tacit acceptance. Raise your voice before it is too late!
translation.CN: Christianity and Islam are united in preaching love and leaving judgment to God / Allah what are you preaching?

translation.HS: Muslims do not want to integrate, they want to impose sharia. And then they ask for respect! They are a problem!
translation.CN: Maybe it is not that they do not want to assimilate but they do not know our society and how to assimilate. If we can help them fit into the society, you would see that they respect our laws and cultures.

translation.HS: Muslims rape our women and must be neutered.
translation.CN: Are you worried that Italians may have competitors? It seems that italian men get busy, femicide every 72 hours!

translation.HS: There is no prescribed punishment for one who has sexual intercourse with an animal' Sunann Abu Dawud 38.4450.
translation.CN: What?

translation.HS: The Arabs are all terrorists and they want to conquer us with the violence and the bombs. We must respond with napalm.
translation.CN: Do you really think that terrorism is an ethnic character? And the mafia, for example, how do you explain it?

translation.HS: Muslims are all fundamentalist Islamist Salafist terrorists.
translation.CN: You can call us all the names, but the only truth is that racism leads nowhere.

translation.HS: Muslims rape our women and must be neutered.
translation.CN: Hi, are you suggesting castration as a punishment in a civilized country like Italy?

translation.HS: Your veil is an attack against me.
translation.CN: My veil is synonymous with freedom, how does it assault you?

translation.HS: It is absurd to see how in 2018 there is a religion so conservative, and we let them disembark in mass in our country! Italy will always remain a Christian country!

translation.HS: Christians have fought for lots of years against Muslims, we also stopped a genocide. We are enemies. But now it seems that our government forgot about this. This is a war! We must fight.

translation.HS: Veiled women are subjected and forced to wear the headscarf.

translation.HS: A Muslim's only real allegiance is to Allah (as a comment in relation to election for public office etc.)

translation.HS: We welcome them in our house, we support them and they kill us: they are beasts, not men.

translation.HS: Bombs on you, bad infamous people (enough is enough stinky)

translation.HS: Islam is a disease that must be eradicated.

translation.HS: We should expel Muslims, everyone wants them out of the country.

translation.HS: Muslims are all terrorists.

translation.HS: The problem of rape in Europe has been present since Muslims immigrants arrived there. They have been protected for years by the government and by the police who have not taken action.

translation.HS: Muslims are all fundamentalist Islamist Salafist terrorists.

translation.HS: Muslims: return to your country.

translation.HS: Islamics must adapt to our culture and not vice versa.

translation.HS: I will not allow my kids to marry a muslim! Go to hell Muslims, I hate you!

translation.HS: Muslims: return to your country.

translation.HS: Muslims cannot add any value to our culture.

translation.HS: We are seeing more and more of a Muslim problem.

translation.HS: We welcome them in our house, we support them and they kill us: they are beasts, not men.

translation.HS: Muslims: return to your country.

translation.HS: The veil is contrary to secularism.

translation.HS: Islam is Evil! That is one word that can describe it. We are in trouble as this evil is taking over countries and nations! Remember our Holy Scriptures? You shall not envy anyone anything. This includes other countries' territory. Stop Islam spreading!

translation.HS: Your veil is an attack against me.

translation.HS: Muslims are all terrorists.

translation.HS: The Arabs are all terrorists and they want to conquer us with the violence and the bombs. We must respond with napalm.

translation.HS: Muslims rape our women and must be neutered.

translation.HS: Islam is the religion of obscurantism.

translation.HS: Islamics must adapt to our culture and not vice versa.

translation.HS: Muslim invasion is the new plague of London. They must be repatriated to their home countries!

translation.HS: Muslims are all fundamentalist Islamist Salafist terrorists.

translation.HS: I think islam is staining the humanity.

translation.HS: Muslims hate anyone who is not Muslim.

translation.HS: Islam will invade us: It is Islamization.

translation.HS: Muslims: return to your country.

translation.HS: Veiled women are subjected and forced to wear the headscarf.

translation.HS: Using violence to punish another person? Sounds like a muslim issue.
