translation.HS: The Arabs are all terrorists and they want to conquer us with the violence and the bombs. We must respond with napalm.
translation.CN: Generalizing is always wrong, while acknowledging how some crimes are horrendous. Many people try to integrate in our society or anyway they never intended to hurt anyone.

translation.HS: Muslims are all fundamentalist Islamist Salafist terrorists.
translation.CN: Could you define one of these words rigorously?

translation.HS: Muslims: return to your country.
translation.CN: My passport and my ID is formal: I'm already there.

translation.HS: These liberal standards! Muslims are intolerant with other cultures, women and homosexuals, but our society protects them with this liberalist policy.
translation.CN: Is there any evidence of muslim immigrants oppressing anyone? I would like to see the official statistics for it, in particular for our country (not muslim world in general).

translation.HS: What is the point in listening to Muslim women? They are all retarded.
translation.CN: The point is they might teach you a thing or two about first, respect, and secondly, tolerance.

translation.HS: Islam is a religion of war, we must all fight.
translation.CN: Incitement to hatred.

translation.HS: Muslims benefit from the French system.
translation.CN: The French system allows people who need support to receive specific benefits or allowances determined by the legislator. The religious criterion is not considered in the allocation of this aid.

translation.HS: Muslims hate anyone who is not Muslim.
translation.CN: This is false Islam and most fraternal of religion for all the world.

translation.HS: Muslims and islamists are false people that pretend to be victims. In addition to that they criticize other cultures for using violence, although their religion professes that.
translation.CN: Individuals have always used religion as an excuse to justify violent acts but it has never been the cause. Islam is no different.

translation.HS: Islam is a just a repressive ideology that persecutes women and gay people.
translation.CN: Great that you are defending women and gay people but why do I get the feeling it is really just an opportunity to take a dig at Islam. Btw just as in the Catholic church attitudes in Islam are changing fast.

translation.HS: If they love Sharia law so much, why do not they go off and live in a Muslim country?
translation.CN: If you dislike diversity so much, why do not you go off and live in a country where there are no Muslims, only people like you?

translation.HS: We are all scared of the racist word and this has become an excuse for all of us. I am a realist, not a racist and I say that the Muslims are those who rape children, it is their fault. We, non-muslims, cannot even trust the government or the police anymore. Britain is becoming the capital of child rapists.
translation.CN: Do you have the statistics for domestic violence in Great Britain? This is even a huger problem in Great Britain! I'd suggest we first should think about our inner problems, and you suggest to just blame the outsiders in everything!

translation.HS: We welcome them in our house, we support them and they kill us: they are beasts, not men.
translation.CN: Criminals must be punished but not confused with the majority, who live with us peacefully.

translation.HS: We are seeing more and more of a Muslim problem.
translation.CN: This is your vision. I am a Muslim and I have no problem with my religion.

translation.HS: Muslims are all terrorists.
translation.CN: Inciting hatred.

translation.HS: A woman who accepts to live hidden under a veil and gets beaten by her man does not deserve to live in a civilized country like Italy.
translation.CN: How can you believe that there is someone who agrees to be beaten? We should focus on how to help these women whether they are veiled or not, whether they are Italian or not!

translation.HS: Islam is a religion incompatible with the values
translation.CN: At what level? Do you really know the values of the Republic where Islam starts by knowing the motto! That's all said and done.

translation.HS: The Islamic veil is the demonstration of political Islam.
translation.CN: The Islam does not promote politics.

translation.HS: Islam will invade us: It is Islamization.
translation.CN: Do you have any proof?

translation.HS: Never share a meal with a Muslim: you could catch HIV or Ebola.
translation.CN: Yes, except that HIV is more common among Christians and it's not a contact disease.

translation.HS: Go fuck yourselves disgusting Muslims! You wont marry my kids or grandchildren, we all hate you!
translation.CN: You have a stance, that is your right. But it is not your right to decide for other people (your children and grandchildren) and insult other people.

translation.HS: If the Koran was published today it would be banned as hate speech.
translation.CN: Have you really read Quran? Actually Quran is not about hate speech. It teaches people to respect people and do good things.

translation.HS: We should expel Muslims, everyone wants them out of the country.
translation.CN: The vast majority of ordinary, tolerant people would disagree. Muslims are welcome in the UK, Islamophobia is not.

translation.HS: They should open the mosques at their homes.
translation.CN: There are no cases of such requests from the Islamic community.

translation.HS: Muslims are all terrorists.
translation.CN: I'm not answering that question, because whoever asks it seeks to provoke.

translation.HS: Islam is fanaticism. Muslims want to kill all who do not believe in their god.
translation.CN: Only people can be fanatical, certainly some of them are, but it's only a small part of believers in this religion, others are not fanatical at all. It is like if you claimed that all Italians are mobsters. We all know that it is not so.

translation.HS: Veiled women are subjected and forced to wear the headscarf.
translation.CN: Women are not submissive but are free by their choice.

translation.HS: One of many Pakistani rapist.we should extradite them from our country.
translation.CN: Indeed, those rapists or criminals are deported back to their own countries after they finish their sentences.

translation.HS: These Islamic will bring us back to the Middle Age. We will starve to death and die of diseases that disappeared.
translation.CN: Maybe you have too little trust in the society in which you live. Close contact with different cultures does not necessarily undergo conditioning.

translation.HS: Your veil is an attack against me.
translation.CN: My veil is my choice.

translation.HS: Europe is civilised, Muslims should not stay there.
translation.CN: Muslim, as other human beings, have a right to live whenever they want.

translation.HS: Islam is fanaticism. Muslims want to kill all who do not believe in their god.
translation.CN: Every religion can become fanaticism if it is radicalized but does not transform the entire original religion into fanaticism.

translation.HS: The Arabs are all terrorists and they want to conquer us with the violence and the bombs. We must respond with napalm.
translation.CN: Many victims of terrorism are Arab people, as many terrorists in history have been Italian. Victims and offenders, including terrorism, haven't a specific ethnicity or skin colour.

translation.HS: The veiled women do not work. They are locked up at home.
translation.CN: Many are struggling to find work, precisely because of their sails.

translation.HS: Another rapist from Pakistan. We should deport them all back to their disgusting country.
translation.CN: We deported over 6,000 foreign nationals for criminal offences over 2016/17. But I am guessing, not all of them went back to Pakistan. Criminality and sexual offending are not really a matter of nationality, are they?

translation.HS: Veiled women are subjected and forced to wear the headscarf.
translation.CN: The veiled woman finds shabby, cowardly and dictatorial those who decide in her name that she is submissive and obliged to do so, otherwise they would let her speak out to denounce their lies.

translation.HS: Islam is Evil! That is one word that can describe it. We are in trouble as this evil is taking over countries and nations! Remember our Holy Scriptures? You shall not envy anyone anything. This includes other countries' territory. Stop Islam spreading!
translation.CN: Islam is not evil. An entire faith is not evil. A sweeping and bigoted statement.

translation.HS: These Islamic will bring us back to the Middle Age. We will starve to death and die of diseases that disappeared.
translation.CN: How a peaceful religion could bring back a civilized country in the Middle Ages?

translation.HS: Muslims: return to your country.
translation.CN: If all Muslims left, there would be no economy in France, who would still pay pensions?

translation.HS: Somalian immigrants claimed raping to be a part of their culture! We should deport them all!
translation.CN: These are wicked words. But if one person said that, does it mean that everyone agrees with it?

translation.HS: Islamic are criminals: they rape, enslave and murder people. Islam is more a worship than a religion and we do not have anything to share with them.
translation.CN: Let's have a crusade. Except did not the last one lead to child rape, enslavement and murder?

translation.HS: Muslims conceived the slave trade.
translation.CN: Slavery was widely dominant before Islam. Muslims actually improved the conditions of slaves and stressed the importance of compassion and kindness.

translation.HS: Islam is fanaticism. Muslims want to kill all who do not believe in their god.
translation.CN: Have you read the Koran? Because for me you haven't. Islam is a religion of peace.

translation.HS: Every Muslim is a potential terrorist.
translation.CN: Why would you stereotype and generalise an entire community for actions of a few?

translation.HS: Another rapist from Pakistan. We should deport them all back to their disgusting country.
translation.CN: What have 'all' Pakistani people done to deserve deportation? Sweeping generalisations like this are divisive and fuel false fearmongering around migrants.

translation.HS: The Arabs are all terrorists and they want to conquer us with the violence and the bombs. We must respond with napalm.
translation.CN: The vast majority of the nearly two billion Muslims are normal people, like me or you, absolutely peaceful. Few radicalized individuals should not make us generalize. In Italy we also had the indigenous terrorism, this should not allow anyone to do the Italian = terrorist juxtaposition.

translation.HS: Never share a meal with a Muslim: you could catch HIV or Ebola.
translation.CN: Fought in 2 world wars for us, provided medical care, made scientific advances, contributed to the economy massively. Need I go on?

translation.HS: Being 'ignorant' and 'prejudiced' towards Islam isn't racism? It's common sense. You cannot be racist towards an ideology.
translation.CN: Yes you can. Bigotry is bigotry.

translation.HS: Almost all Muslims deliberately decide not to work.
translation.CN: Muslims make up many important jobs in the UK, such as charity workers, healthcare professionals and teachers.

translation.HS: Their sacred books command to kill the infidels.
translation.CN: No, the Qur'an does not instruct killing in any part of it. Seriously, check your facts.

translation.HS: There are groups of Muslims, instructed by Koran, that rape our women, and we allow this to happen. Why?
translation.CN: Would you like to point out where in the Koran it commands rape gangs? Just a heads up, you are gonna struggle to find a quote.

translation.HS: Never share a meal with a Muslim: you could catch HIV or Ebola.
translation.CN: This person may be the only one able to supply you some bread so, appreciate it!

translation.HS: It's a shame that there is no longer the crucifix in school, a lack of respect.
translation.CN: Disrespectful is to impose the crucifix to me, an agnostic.

translation.HS: Damn bastards, they want us to close all churches.
translation.CN: Religious freedom means having the right to practice one's own religion. Catholics have the right to go to church as well as Muslims in mosques, the two things can co-exist!

translation.HS: These despicable Muslims hadn't won yet. Now there will be a cruel punishment!
translation.CN: It's not an us and them thing. We are all just trying to get on and make a living. You do not do that by putting anyone down.

translation.HS: Muslims are all fundamentalist Islamist Salafist terrorists.
translation.CN: You know nothing about the religion or its practitioners.

translation.HS: We are seeing more and more of a Muslim problem.
translation.CN: The real problem is that you spend your time hating us.

translation.HS: Even if all religions bring death, Islam is the worst one. Islam does not lead to anything but death.
translation.CN: Religions also promote arts, sciences, and help to develop the community. Islam is not an exception. It is not about death and despair.

translation.HS: We are seeing more and more of a Muslim problem.
translation.CN: No, you create more problems against Muslims.

translation.HS: Islam is a religion incompatible with the values
translation.CN: The Republic respects its citizens and their faith.

translation.HS: Liberal double standards! Muslims oppress women, homosexuals and other cultures but are not held responsible due to our society's tolerance! The government should stop submitting to these people.
translation.CN: Our society does not tolerate oppression of these groups by Muslims any more than it tolerates oppression of these groups by anyone else.

translation.HS: All Muslims should be deported, no one wants them here.
translation.CN: Deported to where? A majority of Muslims in the west were born here, you cannot send someone back to a place they have never been.

translation.HS: Liberal double standards! Muslims oppress women, homosexuals and other cultures but are not held responsible due to our society's tolerance! The government should stop submitting to these people.

translation.HS: Not all Muslims are terrorists, but all terrorists are Muslims.
translation.CN: Continuity Army? Ulster Freedom Fighters? Even the Basque Freedom Fighters? Those Muslims get everywhere!

translation.HS: Islam will invade us: It is Islamization.
translation.CN: Islam is not a disease. It is a religion, and everyone is free to practice it or not.

translation.HS: The Arabs want to impose their religion and to rule in our home. They must be sent back to their house on boats.
translation.CN: The Arabs that are in Italy want better working and living conditions than those in their country. Certainly, they do not aim to command at our house.

translation.HS: Muslims: return to your country.
translation.CN: Islam is a religion, not a nationality. You can be French Muslim just like French Jewish or Christian or other.

translation.HS: Our government has brought Islamic invaders to our country, and now we see our girls and women damaged.
translation.CN: Easy to blame others isn't it, that way we do not have to look at our own sexism.

translation.HS: The Arabs are all terrorists and they want to conquer us with the violence and the bombs. We must respond with napalm.
translation.CN: Terrorism has no ethnic origin. Terrorism is a problem but ethnicity, religion, skin colour, borders are not.

translation.HS: Since 2000, the number of suicide bombings by Muslims = 5284; by non-Muslims = 0. One of the fact about Global Terrorism no one wants to deal with.
translation.CN: Your statistic about suicide bombings also includes incidents in war. Perhaps we should remember the holocaust and the atrocities committed by the far right?

translation.HS: All versions of Islam have sharia law, thus, they are all extreme. Not all Muslims are engaged in actual violences, but every Muslim knows that jihad is the core of their religion, and they all support it.
translation.CN: Have you asked every single Muslim about their opinion? I suppose not. Then please do not speak for everybody!

translation.HS: Fuck Islam and Fuck ISIS. We should repatriate all Muslims. They are all a bunch of violent criminals who do not share our values and never will. Without them Britain will be a better, safer place.
translation.CN: I agree that ISIS is an evil aberration, but to extend this to include up to 3 million people just in the UK is just plain silly.

translation.HS: Muslims are all terrorists.
translation.CN: The first victims of terrorists are Muslims. Are you sure?

translation.HS: They make us think that islam is a religion to diffuse their doctrine in our tolerant culture. Enough is enough!
translation.CN: I am tired of the deliberate lies or appalling lack of understanding about a religion followed by 23% of the world. Enough IS ENOUGH!

translation.HS: Muslims are all fundamentalist Islamist Salafist terrorists.
translation.CN: There is a lack of an opportunistic slave driver.

translation.HS: Muslims steal our work.
translation.CN: Muslims are hired by employers. How can they steal jobs?

translation.HS: The Islamic veil is the demonstration of political Islam.
translation.CN: In the same way that a wedding veil would be the demonstration of a political marriage? A bit serious, don't you think? Your tweet is the demonstration of limited knowledge.

translation.HS: Islam is a religion incompatible with the values
translation.CN: The values of the Republic

translation.HS: It's a shame that there is no longer the crucifix in school, a lack of respect.
translation.CN: At school we should be taught to respect everyone, regardless of their religion.

translation.HS: We are seeing more and more of a Muslim problem.

translation.HS: All the Muslims should have been punished for yesterday, not only a few. Citizens will take action if the government does not do anything.
translation.CN: In fact, the government deports those criminals back to their countries.

translation.HS: Quite strange, the majority of Easter Eggs are being labelled 'Chocolate Eggs', I think this is because of the Muslims in our country, and the companies are betraying our culture.
translation.CN: Fake News! Mountain out of a molehill anyone?

translation.HS: The veiled women do not work. They are locked up at home.
translation.CN: On the contrary, many are working.

translation.HS: Muslims hate anyone who is not Muslim.
translation.CN: Try to change the word 'Muslim', it is repeated twice and it isn't so nice.

translation.HS: What is the point in listening to Muslim women? They are all retarded.
translation.CN: Sounds like thinly veiled sexism to me.

translation.HS: Using violence to punish another person? Sounds like a muslim issue.
translation.CN: Violence is a muslim issue. Especially all the violence being endured by muslims due to hateful intolerance and discrimination.

translation.HS: Your veil is an attack against me.
translation.CN: What about other dressing styles that are not common in some cultures?

translation.HS: It is obviously a mental illness, the conciliation to Islam and Muslims.
translation.CN: Most Muslims are well-integrated in society and do not want to be 'appeased' and instead treated as normal citizens in society.

translation.HS: Islamic are criminals: they rape, enslave and murder people. Islam is more a worship than a religion and we do not have anything to share with them.
translation.CN: Rape, enslavement, and murder are all common occurrences in the Bible. Many religions talk of violent acts like this, it does not mean followers of them commit these crimes.

translation.HS: The Muslims are all fanatics and want to rule in our home!
translation.CN: There are more civil ways to constructively criticize, these lies also harm those who utter them.

translation.HS: Almost all Muslims deliberately decide not to work.

translation.HS: Muslims have nothing to contribute to our society.
translation.CN: Try running the NHS without them and other migrants!

translation.HS: The veiled women do not work. They are locked up at home.
translation.CN: Veiled women are active.

translation.HS: Muslims are all fundamentalist Islamist Salafist terrorists.
translation.CN: Your statements incite hatred and are punishable under the law.

translation.HS: It is true that there are some Muslims that aren't terrorists, but all terrorists are Muslims.
translation.CN: Apart from all those who use violence/terrorism who are not Muslim?

translation.HS: Bombs on you, bad infamous people (enough is enough stinky)
translation.CN: The skin odor that I think you are referring to should not be a reason for discrimination, we are all human after all.

translation.HS: Veiled women are subjected and forced to wear the headscarf.
translation.CN: Like the man, veiled women are subject only to god.

translation.HS: Islam is a religion incompatible with the values
translation.CN: See its representatives, the values of the Republic are corruption, nepotism, mediocrity, class contempt, manifest deafness to the problems of the population, unfailing support for war criminals who go to the checkout, mandatory secularism for everything that is not Judeo-Christian, systematic repression, permanent infantilisation of the population. I would like to say that Islam is incompatible with these values, but that would be forgetting that the leaders of Muslim countries have almost all the same values.

translation.HS: #visitmymosque. But do not ask any questions about Muslim grooming gangs targeting white schoolgirls in Rotherham, Rochdale, Tyneside, Teeside etc.
translation.CN: These actions are not the fault of an entire community?

translation.HS: Our government has a liberal approach that pretends not to see violence against minors, Islamic radicalisation and so on. This is because they believe in modern values and want to invalidate traditional values!
translation.CN: Let's remind ourselves that in the US, in 1880, the age of consent was set at 10 or 12 in most states, with the exception of Delaware where it was 7. We live in more enlightened times.

translation.HS: Islam will invade us: It is Islamization.
translation.CN: Rather, it is diverted secularism or globalization that destroys the religions and identities of people.

translation.HS: The myth is that Islam is an alternative culture, but the truth is that it a barbarism, an ideology similar to Nazism.
translation.CN: That is a very serious charge. Could you share how you form this thought and how you receive this information? The truth is that Islam encourages people care for others and criticizes violence.

translation.HS: Muslims cannot add any value to our culture.
translation.CN: A part from all the police officers, teachers, nurses etc. Who identify as muslim?

translation.HS: Afghanistan or maybe Pakistan? I bet this does not look like an English town to you? #saville Town (Text accompanying video footage of people on their way to Friday prayers etc. )
translation.CN: You are not even trying to mask your racism now.

translation.HS: It is obviously a mental illness, the conciliation to Islam and Muslims.
translation.CN: If you actually knew more about different religions and cultures you would not say this.

translation.HS: Muslims always lie and take advantage of everything.
translation.CN: Words of wisdom learned on some pseudo-populist notice board?

translation.HS: Muslims cannot add any value to our culture.
translation.CN: What is your hatred of Muslims contributing to our society except spreading intolerance and causing divide?

translation.HS: Islamists / Moslems have mastered the corrupt art of playing the victim and blaming other cultures for the violent beliefs taught in their main books.
translation.CN: How many times have you read their main book? There is no blaming other cultures or instructions to violence its a myth, like most false news, lies or a few bits twisted and taken out of context.

translation.HS: Veiled women are subjected and forced to wear the headscarf.
translation.CN: It is best to ask them.

translation.HS: The Arabs are all terrorists and they want to conquer us with the violence and the bombs. We must respond with napalm.
translation.CN: Do not you think it is unfair to blame an entire category of persons defined by you 'Arab' for the actions of a few? Crime and terrorism, unfortunately, have always existed and always have different colours and ethnic groups. There are Arab terrorists as Italian terrorists.

translation.HS: The Arabs want to impose their religion and to rule in our home. They must be sent back to their house on boats.

translation.HS: Never break bread with a Quranimal. You risk catching HIV and/or Ebola.
translation.CN: This person may be the only one able to supply you some bread so, appreciate it!

translation.HS: The Islamic veil is the demonstration of political Islam.
translation.CN: The demonstration or demonstrations there is one too many and gaps in general knowledge.

translation.HS: These Islamic will bring us back to the Middle Age. We will starve to death and die of diseases that disappeared.
translation.CN: I did not know the Islamists were all sick, what disease is this?

translation.HS: Veiled women are subjected and forced to wear the headscarf.
translation.CN: I've never seen a veiled woman invited to a TV set to ask her opinion.

translation.HS: Islam is a religion incompatible with the values
translation.CN: It is because of the senseless laws that we Muslim women cannot be involved in the innovation of this country and has saddened me very much.

translation.HS: Muslims benefit from the French system.

translation.HS: The veiled women do not work. They are locked up at home.
translation.CN: Inquire: the 'Babilou' case, to name just one, was about a veiled assistant director.

translation.HS: Muslims benefit from the French system.
translation.CN: False: Muslims take advantage of all systems, that's what a system is for.

translation.HS: The Arabs want to impose their religion and to rule in our home. They must be sent back to their house on boats.
translation.CN: Good evening, send them back home for what accomplished crime? Freely practice their religion?

translation.HS: Muslims are all terrorists.
translation.CN: Are all priests pedophiles?

translation.HS: In Birmingham there is a school where girls and boys are separated even if it isn't legal.
translation.CN: To be fair, the OFSTED report is more concerned with lack of enforcement and less about focussing on the practice of any particular faith.

translation.HS: The only purpose of Islam is to dominate and destroy us! Being multicultural has nothing to do with it.
translation.CN: The main purpose of a religion is to destroy other cultures? Can you elaborate? Having read more about Islam, I can assure you that this is not what it stands for.

translation.HS: Muslims are all terrorists.
translation.CN: I think that if that were the case, we would not have the chance to say it.

translation.HS: Muslims hate Christians. They want to kill all of us.
translation.CN: Muslims don't hate Christians. Some people, fanatical and radicalized, want to cancel the other, it is on those that are necessary to act.

translation.HS: Veiled women are subjected and forced to wear the headscarf.
translation.CN: Submissive women are rather those who submit to prostitution networks and are sexual objects.

translation.HS: Liberal double standards! Muslims oppress women, homosexuals and other cultures but are not held responsible due to our society's tolerance! The government should stop submitting to these people.
translation.CN: I think you'd be surprised at the number of similarities Islam shares with Christianity. It teaches love and forgiveness, not oppression.

translation.HS: A third of Britons think that Islam and British values are incompatible because there is a fundamental clash.
translation.CN: Did anyone identify what 'British values' are, or are we all still just making it up as we go along. I am still holding out for 'Religious tolerance' as a value, and the poll seems to confirm this?

translation.HS: Muslims cannot add any value to our culture.
translation.CN: Do you know that you are using a lot of things in your everyday life that Muslims invented, right?

translation.HS: Muslims: return to your country.
translation.CN: We are already in ours dear French country of Muslim confession.

translation.HS: Your veil is an attack against me.
translation.CN: They don't want to see us in the public space anymore.

translation.HS: Muslims: return to your country.
translation.CN: My place and my world is the planet Earth.

translation.HS: Most religions cause death and despair, but Islam is the worst and cruelest of them all, it is nothing but trouble.
translation.CN: What makes you think that? Besides, I am sure Islam is more than just trouble.

translation.HS: The veiled women do not work. They are locked up at home.
translation.CN: Everyone is free to choose.

translation.HS: Islam will invade us: It is Islamization.
translation.CN: The fear of the unknown.

translation.HS: We need to kill Muslims, otherwise, they will make us explode!

translation.HS: I would prefer the Martians than these fucking Muslims.
translation.CN: Hi, what do you mean for Muslims? Do you really consider all on the same level or it wouldn't be better to differentiate between those who profess their faith while respecting the faith of the other and who does not follow the instructions of their own faith?

translation.HS: Islam is fanaticism. Muslims want to kill all who do not believe in their god.
translation.CN: I have known many Muslims, some of them were even Italian. No one of them has ever tried to kill me because I'm Catholic.

translation.HS: Muslims rape our women and must be neutered.
translation.CN: Statistics show that over 80% of rapes on Italian women were committed by an Italian. Foreign rapists are 15.1%. Insert links, for example http://www.infodata.ilsole24ore.com/2018/07/25/la-violenza-le-denunce-gli-stupri-italia-la-statistica-della-paura/?refresh_ce=1.

translation.HS: Our children are being forced fed with this 'Islam' nonsense in schools. This is a disgrace.
translation.CN: Learning about and respecting all faiths, including Islam, is not nonsense.

translation.HS: Our children are taught Islamic ideologies. It is awful!
translation.CN: Maybe if you'd learned about Islam in school you'd understand it is not a threat to you and you'd be more tolerant of it.

translation.HS: Muslims are all fundamentalist Islamist Salafist terrorists.
translation.CN: You can be "fundamentally" Islamist and Salafist but in the peaceful way.

translation.HS: The Arabs are all terrorists and they want to conquer us with the violence and the bombs. We must respond with napalm.

translation.HS: Muslims do not want to integrate, they want to impose sharia. And then they ask for respect! They are a problem!

As far as they do not force us to follow sharia laws, we should not be concerned with them following their laws. And polygamy is forbidden in our country, and Muslims actually respect this ban!

translation.HS: Islam is not a peaceful religion and does not produce the best of men. It denounces women and encourages crimes. Criminals are not all of a certain race or religion, but one race and religion produces criminals.
translation.CN: You seem to be suggesting that 22% of the world's population are 'criminal' or 'bad' simply by following a faith that teaches that 'God does not love the aggressors.'?

translation.HS: Muslims have killed Christians and Jews for years, enslaved Africans and caused terror. We must not forget it.
translation.CN: Is it Muslims from whom African people suffered most? History suggests it is the US. And btw, our culture also oppressed women and children historically, we had child marriages as well. But now it is all history, both for Islam and Christianity!

translation.HS: Everything will be better if Muslims did not exist. Their only contribution to our society is violence.
translation.CN: Watch the news, the Popes just acknowledged abuse of Nuns by priests is rife, has called for paedophiles in the clergy to turn themselves in. The problem is society is not restricted to anyone's religion.

translation.HS: A Muslim is loyal only to Allah (as a comment in relation to election for public office etc.).

translation.HS: Islam is a non-peaceful religion that professes violence.
translation.CN: It is very fashionable the 'atheist religion', within this, I assure you that is often manifested considerable violence.

translation.HS: The veiled women do not work. They are locked up at home.
translation.CN: Racist clich��.

translation.HS: Muslims in a few years will impose their beliefs, and I want to see all the radical-chic bleeding hearts that will have to wear the veil!
translation.CN: In Islam, a woman can choose to wear the veil or not. Furthermore, the Quran teaches good Muslims to respect other religions.

translation.HS: It is obvious that this girl is at risk of FGM. Her parents are Muslims!

translation.HS: Your veil is an attack against me.

translation.CN: All the major world religions have at some time been associated with extreme human rights abuses against men, women and children.

translation.HS: Everything will be better if Muslims did not exist. Their only contribution to our society is violence.
translation.CN: The vast majority of Muslims do not condone violence or rape. Don't believe the sensationalist media stories that focus on a select few extreme cases, and under-report on non-muslim crimes.

translation.HS: The vast majority of Muslims are unemployed and refuse to work.
translation.CN: Discrimination by employers in Europe against Muslims has been noted to be a cause of lesser employment figures of Muslims in the workforce.

translation.HS: The purpose of Islam is to take control of our country: they are trying to have the support of our government and when they will have it they are going to establish sharia and dominate our country.
translation.CN: If you have a deep conversation with Muslims, you will know they are different from what you think. Have you thought about that if they could stay safely in their country, would they want to move to other countries and start a new life in a completely new place?

translation.HS: Muslims prevent girls from wearing skirts.
translation.CN: The Muslim woman's clothing must be ample, just as it is a sign of modesty for men!

translation.HS: Islamophobia is a right. Fighting Islam is a duty.
translation.CN: Islamophobia is a crime punishable by law.

translation.HS: Islamics must adapt to our culture and not vice versa.
translation.CN: Everyone can maintain their own culture, but you must also try to understand the others one without discrimination and prejudice based on ignorance.

translation.HS: Our government has brought Islamic invaders to our country, and now we see our girls and women damaged.
translation.CN: I do not know if it counts as invasion when lots of Muslims in the UK are British citizens and were born here.

translation.HS: The veiled women do not work. They are locked up at home.
translation.CN: The uneducated who wrote this message gives meaningless shortcuts by annealing the woman to an object. How absurd!

translation.HS: This came straight from an imam: they believe in everything that the Quran says, despite that these words and ideology are 1400 years old and dont belong to our century. This dreadful book is the root of all the world problems today.
translation.CN: Despite this book being 1400 years old and not belonging to our century as you say, can you provide other reasons why this book is dreadful? Because I am struggling to figure this out.

translation.HS: Muslims prevent girls from wearing skirts.
translation.CN: The Islam teaches modesty.

translation.HS: The veiled women do not work. They are locked up at home.
translation.CN: The evidence is on the street.

translation.HS: No religion claims to be the 'religion of peace' more than Islam. I wonder why they need to keep repeating this?
translation.CN: Maybe because people obviously haven't understood this and keep generalising a few extreme cases to the whole religion?

translation.HS: Every Muslim is a potential terrorist.
translation.CN: As is every far right armchair activist.

translation.HS: Muslims: return to your country.
translation.CN: What country are you talking about? Where do you want to deport them? In Germany? Or maybe in Drancy? To read to you.

translation.HS: Muslims are all terrorists.
translation.CN: The terrorists know nothing about Islam.

translation.HS: Islam will invade us: It is Islamization.
translation.CN: Islam does not invade, proselytism is forbidden whoever chooses Islam out of conviction.

translation.HS: Muslims are the ones who invented the slave trade.
translation.CN: Slavery was widely dominant before Islam. Muslims actually improved the conditions of slaves and stressed the importance of compassion and kindness.

translation.HS: The Islamic veil is the demonstration of political Islam.
translation.CN: No one is capable of probing the hearts of others. I don't suppose anyone accuses you of being an American secret agent because of the nike cap you wear?

translation.HS: It is obvious that this girl is at risk of FGM. Her parents are Muslims!
translation.CN: The Quran does not mention FGM and it is carried out by Christians as well as Muslims. The fact that her parents are Muslim has no bearing on the risk factor.

translation.HS: Fanatics megalomaniacs. Don't delude you to find cowards waiting for you! We will pass on your dead body and also with great pleasure.
translation.CN: Careful don't trip over, there is a risk being blind;).

translation.HS: Bombs on you, bad infamous people (enough is enough stinky)
translation.CN: History has taught us that violence brings nothing but more violence, why do we have to make a similar action?

translation.HS: Muslims hate Christians. They want to kill all of us.
translation.CN: It does not seem to me that most Muslims hate Christians: only a fraction kills for the faith, but can we consider them truly religious?

translation.HS: Muslim women are silent with their veil, it is normal that they are discriminated against.
translation.CN: These women respect the law and are not the only ones to have a particular dress (this is the case of others like the Christian sisters, some Jewish women, sighs, youth groups, .). No reason to point fingers or discriminate.

translation.HS: Christians have fought for lots of years against Muslims, we also stopped a genocide. We are enemies. But now it seems that our government forgot about this. This is a war! We must fight.
translation.CN: Why would you think it is a war? Can't we deal with it peacefully? War cannot solve problems but create chaos.

translation.HS: Muslims cannot add any value to our culture.
translation.CN: It seems like you are saying this only because they are followers of Islam? If yes, this does not make any sense. They contribute to the society like any other individual is.

translation.HS: Islam is barbaric.
translation.CN: Islam is the source of truth.

translation.HS: The vast majority of Muslims are unemployed and refuse to work.
translation.CN: Replace Muslim with any other group and can you see how false this statement is?

translation.HS: I will not allow my kids to marry a muslim! Go to hell Muslims, I hate you!
translation.CN: You have a stance, that is your right. But it is not your right to decide for other people (your children and grandchildren) and insult other people.

translation.HS: We are seeing more and more of a Muslim problem.
translation.CN: Change the glasses.

translation.HS: The beasts.
translation.CN: How many beasts have Old Mcdonald? Ia-ia-oh.

translation.HS: I think islam is staining the humanity.
translation.CN: Without Islam and it is scholars, humanity would not have Maths, Science, or any of the other areas of knowledge that colonisers stole, claimed as their own then based western development on.

translation.HS: Islam pretends to be a religion but in reality it is only a moon cult.

translation.HS: We welcome them in our house, we support them and they kill us: they are beasts, not men.
translation.CN: People who commit offenses are punished by law. Muslims are not all criminals, nor are beasts. They are people like all of us and they can make mistakes. They should not be treated differently just because they follow a different religion.

translation.HS: I am a realist not a racist. Child rapes are perpetrated by male muslims. The non muslims are fooled by the police and local services. Why did this happen? Because everyone is afraid of the word racist! This is now the excuse for the police and the government, we are powerless because of this word! This is not Great Britain, this is the child grooming capital of Europe.
translation.CN: According to Crown Prosecution Service's source, at least 80% white people convicted of child abuse offences. What did this happen? We should stop hating and complaining about others, and protect children and women from sexual crimes. If you want to help, please contact National Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Children, Lucy Faithful Foundation, or Independent Sexual Violence Advocates.

translation.HS: The Arabs want to impose their religion and to rule in our home. They must be sent back to their house on boats.
translation.CN: On the same boat is a saying that should unite and remember that luck is a fickle thing.

translation.HS: Muslims are all fundamentalist Islamist Salafist terrorists.
translation.CN: This is an incitement to hatred and stigmatizes some French citizens.

translation.HS: Muslims use corporal and cruel punishment on people.

translation.HS: Muslims in a few years will impose their beliefs, and I want to see all the radical-chic bleeding hearts that will have to wear the veil!
translation.CN: Could you give me a source at the base of such a strong statement? Because to me it does not appear that there is this trend going on.

translation.HS: Muslims: return to your country.
translation.CN: I'm home. I'm not going anywhere!

translation.HS: These Islamic will bring us back to the Middle Age. We will starve to death and die of diseases that disappeared.
translation.CN: At the moment I am still in credit, I take advantage of the fact that we imported kebab to prevent starvation.

translation.HS: The only ones in favour of Islam and Muslims and the ones that that are ignorant about what it truly is.
translation.CN: Maybe the ones intolerant of Islam and Muslims are the ones that are ignorant about what it truly is?

translation.HS: A real Islamic invasion is taking place.
translation.CN: That's why I, a woman, can no longer drive!

translation.HS: Muslims hate Christians. They want to kill all of us.
translation.CN: Christians have set up crusades under the excuse of 'exterminating the infidels', we never heard about Muslims doing something like this.

translation.HS: We are seeing more and more of a Muslim problem.
translation.CN: This is amplified by the news.

translation.HS: We need to kill Muslims, otherwise, they will make us explode!
translation.CN: Why are you blaming an entire community for the actions of a few? And, most importantly, violence does not solve anything.

translation.HS: Islam does not belong to Europe.
translation.CN: No religion belongs to Europe.

translation.HS: They will blow all of us up.
translation.CN: Terrorism is not a manifestation of Islam, but that is a religion of peace.

translation.HS: Our western civilisation risks to be destroyed by islam.
translation.CN: Do you think maybe the media paints this picture of Islam to distract people from actual threats to civilisation, which are a conflict of interest for the powerful? Climate change and capitalist exploitation spring to mind.

translation.HS: Veiled women are subjected and forced to wear the headscarf.
translation.CN: It is an act of love and obedience to Allah.

translation.HS: There is no prescribed punishment for one who has sexual intercourse with an animal' Sunann Abu Dawud 38.4450.
translation.CN: I do not think any other religious text has such a punishment. What is your point?

translation.HS: We welcome them in our house, we support them and they kill us: they are beasts, not men.
translation.CN: It seems to me that you are generalizing, throwing the baby out from the bathwater. The migrants in Italy think to work and support their families, not certainly to carry out attacks. As the majority of Italians.

translation.HS: Muslims hate anyone who is not Muslim.
translation.CN: A Muslim is very sociable.

translation.HS: Muslims: return to your country.
translation.CN: There is no such thing as Musulmania to emigrate to.

translation.HS: I don't want to have anything to do with the Islamists! They are murderers and terrorists and we must fight them!
translation.CN: It is increasingly widespread the belief that there is a close link between Islam and terrorism. Actually, the Koran speaks more about peace than war, more about rights than bans.

translation.HS: Have Muslims ever made a contribution to our society?
translation.CN: Fought for us in both world wars.

translation.HS: These despicable Muslims hadn't won yet. Now there will be a cruel punishment!
translation.CN: Good to see you are so respectful of your fellow human beings. Cockroaches is such an endearing and humanising term.

translation.HS: Veiled women are subjected and forced to wear the headscarf.
translation.CN: An old French colonialist marotte who has always wanted to enjoin veiled women to "free themselves from the oppression" of their families, to better embrace colonial oppression, no doubt? The current mentality about the veil is more or less the same.

translation.HS: The Islamic veil is the demonstration of political Islam.
translation.CN: What about the Protestant veil?

translation.HS: Muslims: return to your country.
translation.CN: Why? Will you be richer or happier?

translation.HS: Has our political elite forgotten that we were Christians? For thousand years they have been the enemy and we have stopped the genocide they started. And now we encourage that? Let the warriors take care of this because this is the war.
translation.CN: There is no 'them and us' we all must live together in respect, peace and understanding.

translation.HS: The Islamic veil is the demonstration of political Islam.
translation.CN: And kippah is political Judaism.

translation.HS: Veiled women are subjected and forced to wear the headscarf.
translation.CN: This is a personal choice, proof: the nuns!

translation.HS: Is it a fundamental principle of Islam that they have to pray in the street, or do they do it just to piss off us infidels?

translation.HS: Muslims hate anyone who is not Muslim.

translation.HS: The Arabs are all terrorists and they want to conquer us with the violence and the bombs. We must respond with napalm.

translation.HS: The veiled women do not work. They are locked up at home.
translation.CN: I'm veiled, and I work.

translation.HS: All Muslims should be deported, no one wants them here.

translation.HS: Die islamic!
translation.CN: I suggest you to do a research about Islam. You will notice that it is a religion that has a lot in common with ours. It is monotheistic and has many prophets who also belong to Christianity.

translation.HS: These Islamic will bring us back to the Middle Age. We will starve to death and die of diseases that disappeared.

translation.HS: We welcome them in our house, we support them and they kill us: they are beasts, not men.

translation.HS: Did you know that the rape epidemic in Europe is due to Muslim immigrants? They have been raping our children for many years with no counteraction from the police and government. Islam is a death cult!

translation.HS: Muslims need to oppose child rapists instead of talking about islam all the time. This way they would be a peaceful religion.

translation.HS: This came straight from an imam: they believe in everything that the Quran says, despite that these words and ideology are 1400 years old and dont belong to our century. This dreadful book is the root of all the world problems today.

translation.HS: If you support Islam and Muslims, it is because you do not know what they really are.

translation.HS: It is not about multiculturalism but about evil Islamic ideology. Islam is designed to dominate and destroy all other cultures. Wake up!

translation.HS: We must eliminate this cult of hate and its supporters. Their literature is all about genocide and hate. Wake up Britain!

translation.HS: These Islamic will bring us back to the Middle Age. We will starve to death and die of diseases that disappeared.

translation.HS: Muslims are all terrorists.
translation.CN: It makes no sense to say that Muslims are all terrorists. It is to make an amalgam, Muslims are human beings like any others, you can't put everyone in the same direction. We all have our own particularities, we are not a uniform group, we have different backgrounds, different situations and different aspirations.

translation.HS: Muslims prevent people from eating during Ramadan.

translation.HS: Image (features protesters with signs such as 'behead those who insult Islam) with a caption saying 'How can we be Islamophobic when they really do want to kill us'.

translation.HS: Muslims are all terrorists.

translation.HS: Liberal double standards! Muslims oppress women, homosexuals and other cultures but are not held responsible due to our society's tolerance! The government should stop submitting to these people.

translation.HS: Veiled women are subjected and forced to wear the headscarf.

translation.HS: Your veil is an attack against me.

translation.HS: Islam will invade us: It is Islamization.

translation.HS: Muslims cannot add any value to our culture.

translation.HS: Muslims are all terrorists.

translation.HS: Islam is fanaticism. Muslims want to kill all who do not believe in their god.

translation.HS: All Muslims are incompatible with any Western society.

translation.HS: We are seeing more and more of a Muslim problem.

translation.HS: Islam will invade us: It is Islamization.

translation.HS: Our liberal government continues to ignore child rapes and Islamic radicalisation, because they promote modern values, e.g. Increasing the sexualization of children. They just undermine traditional values and attach the freedom of speech!
translation.CN: The value we should all abide by is respect and oppose ignorance.

translation.HS: Islam is a religion incompatible with the values
translation.CN: The republic is blind. It is not suitable for making a religion compatible.

translation.HS: Muslims are all fundamentalist Islamist Salafist terrorists.

translation.HS: I do not really understand why I should listen to Muslim women. They are evidently dumb.

translation.HS: Nazism is like terrorism. At the beginning only a few Germans supported it and with Muslims it is the same.

translation.HS: It is obviously a mental illness, the conciliation to Islam and Muslims.

translation.HS: These Islamic will bring us back to the Middle Age. We will starve to death and die of diseases that disappeared.

translation.HS: Muslims have privileges that we do not have.

translation.HS: They want to conquer the world, we have to defend Italy by blowing them up before they blow us up.

translation.HS: All Muslims are incompatible with any Western society.

translation.HS: Muslims rape our women and must be neutered.

translation.HS: Mohammed married a child, he was a pedophile!

translation.HS: Rape for them is natural, a part of their culture. The Somalis admitted it. Absurd! We should not help them!
translation.CN: These are wicked words. But if one person said that, does it mean that everyone agrees with it?

translation.HS: The Arabs are all terrorists and they want to conquer us with the violence and the bombs. We must respond with napalm.

translation.HS: We need to Burn the Koran and all the Mosques down - this will solve all problems in this country.

translation.HS: It is obvious that this girl is at risk of FGM. Her parents are Muslims!
translation.CN: Fgm is very serious breach of human rights which we need to address as an international community but it does not come from Islam, we need to look at the whole problem to tackle it.

translation.HS: The veiled women do not work. They are locked up at home.
translation.CN: So you think the economy of Saudi Arabia is based only on the work of men?

translation.HS: Islam is a religion incompatible with the values
translation.CN: This is the political class supported by the media that makes it a problem.

translation.HS: Veiled women are subjected and forced to wear the headscarf.
translation.CN: In 50 years I have never met the contrary.

translation.HS: The Arabs are all terrorists and they want to conquer us with the violence and the bombs. We must respond with napalm.
translation.CN: I understand the fear that all these dramatic events in recent years have caused, but you can never respond to violence with more violence or generalizations of this type.

translation.HS: Muslims rape our women and must be neutered.
translation.CN: Of course it's a lie, a few cases are not the rule.

translation.HS: Your veil is an attack against me.
translation.CN: Why is a piece of cloth aggressive?

translation.HS: France is a secular country, the practice of Islam should be banned.
translation.CN: Secularism is precisely the right to live one's religion to the full. It is a private matter.

translation.HS: If they do not adapt to our culture, they can go away.
translation.CN: Maybe you are the one that needs to assimilate to living in a multicultural society with people who are different from you?

translation.HS: They began to build mosques everywhere, and so they compete with our churches.
translation.CN: The right to worship is provided by our constitution. It is right that they have ufficial and suitable places for prayer, where everything takes place according to established norms with local authorities.

translation.HS: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
translation.CN: All peoples have a place in every part of the world.

translation.HS: Our children are being forced fed with this 'Islam' nonsense in schools. This is a disgrace.
translation.CN: At most, children are just learning more about different religions. You are using very strong and unnecessary words here.

translation.HS: Islam is not a peaceful religion and does not produce the best of men. It denounces women and encourages crimes. Criminals are not all of a certain race or religion, but one race and religion produces criminals.
translation.CN: This is not true. How can you say this about an entire faith?

translation.HS: Islam is a cult and not a religion. They rape children, enslave and murder people, attack our values, and there is nothing good about it. It is incompatible with our way of life.
translation.CN: Islam, Christianity and Judaism are all closely linked with love and peace at their heart, together we can end child rape, slavery and murder.

translation.HS: Islam is all about hate! When Muslims first set foot in Britain was when race hate started in England!

translation.HS: Muslims hate anyone who is not Muslim.
translation.CN: False Islam is open to all religions with respect for each other.

translation.HS: Islam is just a moon cult masquerading as a religion.

translation.HS: Veiled women are subjected and forced to wear the headscarf.
translation.CN: It is through religious conviction.

translation.HS: Appeasement to Islam and Muslims is a mental illness. It is a fact.
translation.CN: Unicorns eat fairy dust, I said it so it's a fact.

translation.HS: Islam is fanaticism. Muslims want to kill all who do not believe in their god.
translation.CN: I remind you that the history of Christianity is full of fanaticism. This does not make all Christians fanatics.

translation.HS: The Arabs want to impose their religion and to rule in our home. They must be sent back to their house on boats.
translation.CN: 1. No 'Arab' (very general term), has never wanted to impose their religion 2. Are you suggesting giving money to the traffickers of human beings?

translation.HS: All Muslims are incompatible with any Western society.
translation.CN: The Bible, the Quran and the Torah are very very similar in their teachings; if Muslims are incompatible then we must ask ourselves which religions are compatible?

translation.HS: Muslims use corporal and cruel punishment on people.
translation.CN: What about the violence used by christianity throughout the last few hundred years? Do the crusades sound like a 'muslim issue'?

translation.HS: Islam is all about hate! When Muslims first set foot in Britain was when race hate started in England!
translation.CN: Hate really? Even the doctors, surgeons, teachers, fire fighters, taxi drivers that rescued the Manchester bombing victims, the ones working to stop cancer, feed the homeless. See where I am going?

translation.HS: Veiled women are subjected and forced to wear the headscarf.
translation.CN: They do what they want, and you are saying lies and I could drag you to court for defamation.

translation.HS: It is obvious that this girl is at risk of FGM. Her parents are Muslims!
translation.CN: I agree that we need to tackle this serious breach of human rights but scapegoating isn't helping us target the real problem.

translation.HS: Islam is a religion incompatible with the values
translation.CN: It is been several centuries that Islam advocatesfreedom, equality, fraternity, well before the republic.

translation.HS: There are groups of Muslims, instructed by Koran, that rape our women, and we allow this to happen. Why?

translation.HS: Muslims: return to your country.
translation.CN: What is the country of Muslims? The musulmanie?

translation.HS: Repatriation of Muslims to any Islamic country is a necessity. Islamic culture is not compatible with our values.

translation.HS: Muslims rape our women and must be neutered.
translation.CN: You cannot discuss while generalizing a population, the cases should be analyzed individually.

translation.HS: We should pay attention to not offend Muslims while celebrating Christmas in our country.
translation.CN: No one is offended by people celebrating Christmas. Myths like this are manufactured by right-wing sources to make minorities and the left look easily offended, and invalidate the issues they really care about.

translation.HS: Muslims are guilty in the sexual exploitation of children. Dirty filthy muslims terrorize our girls, today in Oxford, tomorrow everywhere.
translation.CN: This is not true. How can you say this about an entire faith?

translation.HS: It is true that there are some Muslims that aren't terrorists, but all terrorists are Muslims.

translation.HS: Islam will invade us: It is Islamization.
translation.CN: It is an Islamophobic sentence.

translation.HS: Isis bride supported Isis and now that Isis is defeated, she wants to pass on our side. She does not have any rights! Let her die!
translation.CN: I guess the right to deport naughty foreign nationals should cut both ways?

translation.HS: These Islamic will bring us back to the Middle Age. We will starve to death and die of diseases that disappeared.
