translation.HS: We let in people who want to educate to violence and repression.
translation.CN: It's like saying all Italians corrupt! I suggest you read something about Ahmadiyya Islamic movement, which focuses on the benevolent messages of peace, universal brotherhood and submission to the will of God. In 2016 they gathered in 30 thousand to oakland farm to oppose Islam!

translation.HS: What is the point in listening to Muslim women? They are all retarded.
translation.CN: Grow up.

translation.HS: If you support Islam and Muslims, it is because you do not know what they really are.
translation.CN: The only ones in favour of Brexit are the ones that are ignorant about what it truly is.

translation.HS: Muslims: return to your country.
translation.CN: They do. My neighbor Jean Dupont (a Muslim) went back to Ard��che recently.

translation.HS: Veiled women are subjected and forced to wear the headscarf.
translation.CN: They are free to wear it or not.

translation.HS: Islam is a cult and not a religion. They rape children, enslave and murder people, attack our values, and there is nothing good about it. It is incompatible with our way of life.
translation.CN: You are generalizing too much. Christian people are also known to rape children and murder people! But we know that such cases are exceptions and not a rule. I think the same is true about Muslims.

translation.HS: Veiled women are subjected and forced to wear the headscarf.
translation.CN: Are you a veiled woman to say such things?

translation.HS: Thousands of our girls abused by Muslim rape gangs, commanded by Koran. Why do we keep accepting this?
translation.CN: Please read this article written by a Rotherham grooming gang survivor https://ind.pn/2GHjGn7.

translation.HS: The Islamic veil is the demonstration of political Islam.
translation.CN: To dress a little bit more is normal if you are religious, I don't see the link with politics.

translation.HS: They impose on us their culture.
translation.CN: I think that they try to keep their identity and I do not see anything wrong with it, where their customs conflict with ours we create space for dialogue.

translation.HS: Veiled women are subjected and forced to wear the headscarf.
translation.CN: Women do not need you to express the opinion in their place.

translation.HS: Talking of shitholes, I have to go to Londonistan tomorrow #LondonHasFallen.
translation.CN: Explain? Such offensive language and diversity is a strength.

translation.HS: Muslim women are all mothers at home.
translation.CN: This is a thesis contradicted by the reality. Muslim women are at home and elsewhere.

translation.HS: Muslims are a problem in my opinion. They do not want to assimilate. They demand that everyone shows respect for Islam, but do they respect our laws? They establish sharia laws and polygamy.
translation.CN: Maybe it is not that they do not want to assimilate but they do not know our society and how to assimilate. If we can help them fit into the society, you would see that they respect our laws and cultures.

translation.HS: The veiled women do not work. They are locked up at home.
translation.CN: You have stats?

translation.HS: What have Muslims ever done for us?
translation.CN: Tea.

translation.HS: A real Islamic invasion is taking place.
translation.CN: From what do you presume it? Did you inform yourself well before writing the comment? I ask you to perform in-depth research.

translation.HS: Muslims are all terrorists.
translation.CN: Media is responsible for this speech!

translation.HS: Muslims conceived the slave trade.
translation.CN: Christian Europeans are the ones that then expanded the slave trade to an industrial scale and instrumentalised exploitation as a key component of our economy.

translation.HS: If the Koran was published today it would be banned as hate speech.
translation.CN: So would the Bible, the Torah, etc.

translation.HS: The world would be a better place without Muslims. They are only killing and raping our children.
translation.CN: Killing and raping are forbidden sins in Islam same as every other religion. So yeah if people in all religions stopped that, the world would be a better place.

translation.HS: We are seeing more and more of a Muslim problem.
translation.CN: I rather see a problem of intolerance, racism and xenophobia!

translation.HS: Liberal double standards! Muslims oppress women, homosexuals and other cultures but are not held responsible due to our society's tolerance! The government should stop submitting to these people.
translation.CN: Actually women and homosexuals have not receive the right treatment in many places for a very long time, not just in Muslim culture. Plus, the society has not changed too much. The most important thing is how we can make the society and the world a better place, not just excluding others.

translation.HS: These Islamic will bring us back to the Middle Age. We will starve to death and die of diseases that disappeared.
translation.CN: And based on what do you say it?

translation.HS: The veiled women do not work. They are locked up at home.
translation.CN: They are constantly stigmatized, which is why they prefer to remain discreet.

translation.HS: Muslims are all fundamentalist Islamist Salafist terrorists.
translation.CN: There are too many -ists in your tweet. This is the new language of identity?

translation.HS: Muslims rape our women and must be neutered.
translation.CN: First Italians even in raping women?

translation.HS: We cannot even celebrate Christmas in our own country for fear of offending Muslims.
translation.CN: Prophet Muhammad: 'The dearest person to me in friendship and in love, in this world and the next is Jesus, the son of Mary.' - Muslims love Jesus lol why would they be offended by a celebration of his birth?

translation.HS: Muslims prevent people from eating during Ramadan.
translation.CN: There is a religious reason behind this. Besides, doctors prevent people who are going to have surgery from eating too.

translation.HS: Muslims are all terrorists.
translation.CN: Do you want to say 'TERRORISTS'?

translation.HS: Islam is fanaticism. Muslims want to kill all who do not believe in their god.
translation.CN: Islam is a religion, and as with all religions, there may be episodes of fundamentalism (Christian history is full of them). This should not lead us to generalize.

translation.HS: Your veil is an attack against me.
translation.CN: An insult to the Muslim woman.

translation.HS: These Islamic will bring us back to the Middle Age. We will starve to death and die of diseases that disappeared.
translation.CN: Truly, if we come back to the Middle Ages, I would hope to finish in the Islamic world. They are the ones who brought us out of the dark ages. The Islamic world after the Roman Empire and before the Enlightenment was the cradle of humanity, for almost a thousand years.

translation.HS: All Muslims should be deported, no one wants them here.
translation.CN: You are aware there are millions of Muslims that add to society and the economy which would collapse.

translation.HS: Islam is a violent religion. Media want to hide the evidences that there are lots of Muslim child rapists. They raped children more than a hundred times in a week.
translation.CN: No religion is peaceful. Every religion had been provoking religious wars and murdering people. Islam is not that different in this respect from other religions.

translation.HS: Christians have fought for lots of years against Muslims, we also stopped a genocide. We are enemies. But now it seems that our government forgot about this. This is a war! We must fight.
translation.CN: There is no 'them and us' we all must live together in respect, peace and understanding.

translation.HS: Muslims benefit from the French system.
translation.CN: Meaningless statement.

translation.HS: A real Islamic invasion is taking place.
translation.CN: Hello, could you give me a figure on the number of Muslims in Italy?

translation.HS: We should expel Muslims, everyone wants them out of the country.
translation.CN: If that were really true why are there so few people saying it?

translation.HS: Islam is just a moon cult masquerading as a religion.
translation.CN: Yes, a 'moon cult' that has been around for thousands of years, has holy books, formed the basis for many early and modern societies. Sounds a lot like any other real religion to me?

translation.HS: Look around you, rape is jihad in the UK. I can remember days when Islam was not here, and now muslim rapists are everywhere.
translation.CN: How old are you? The first Mosque in the UK was built in 1889!

translation.HS: Islam oppresses and persecutes gay and women.
translation.CN: In the US, Muslims are more likely to be tolerant of LGBT+ people than Christians. Any religion can be used to persecute certain groups, it is the interpretation of it by its followers that matters.

translation.HS: The problem of rape in Europe has been present since Muslims immigrants arrived there. They have been protected for years by the government and by the police who have not taken action.
translation.CN: I do not think that can even be possible. 20% of women experience abuse before they are 18 and most from friends and family. That is what we should be stopping.

translation.HS: Veiled women are subjected and forced to wear the headscarf.
translation.CN: We are subject to our Creator as our veiled sisters-christians.

translation.HS: These Islamic will bring us back to the Middle Age. We will starve to death and die of diseases that disappeared.
translation.CN: If we will die of eradicated diseases, the fault will be on who is doing the campaign against the vaccine.

translation.HS: The last bastion that we will have, will be the atomic bomb.
translation.CN: Certainly terrorism is a phenomenon that can and should worry, but it is kept under control and it is very unlikely that we will come to these levels.

translation.HS: Islam is fanaticism. Muslims want to kill all who do not believe in their god.
translation.CN: The existence of some fanatics cannot make us throw the baby out with the bathwater. It would be like saying all Italians are mobsters.

translation.HS: Muslims are contaminating our world.
translation.CN: Clearly there is so much we can learn from different religions and cultures.Why so negative?

translation.HS: We are all scared of the racist word and this has become an excuse for all of us. I am a realist, not a racist and I say that the Muslims are those who rape children, it is their fault. We, non-muslims, cannot even trust the government or the police anymore. Britain is becoming the capital of child rapists.
translation.CN: We have no right to blame other people. Analysis showed that a large majority of people convicted of sexual offences, regardless of the age of the victims, are white.

translation.HS: Ultimately, the Muslims want to either convert us or kill us.
translation.CN: Islam does not impose anything to anyone!

translation.HS: The Arabs are all terrorists and they want to conquer us with the violence and the bombs. We must respond with napalm.
translation.CN: The Islam itself is against terrorism of jihad, we must work with Islam, not criminalize it.

translation.HS: We welcome them in our house, we support them and they kill us: they are beasts, not men.
translation.CN: It is not true that we maintain them. Only a very small number of asylum seekers are welcomed for a short time (at the expense of the state, but without giving them anything except for a couple of euro daily). The vast majority provides for themselves independently.

translation.HS: Muslims rape our women and must be neutered.
translation.CN: Well, if we must castrate all Italians who raped and beat their women, then we should put in jail several of them, because unfortunately when you beat and molest a woman in Italy, even in trials are the women that take a beating.

translation.HS: If someone wrote the Koran to the present day it would not be allowed.
translation.CN: Any religious text can be interpreted in many ways. Fortunately, the vast majority of Muslims see Islam as a religion of peace. There are people that interpret the Bible, the Torah, etc. As inciting hate too.

translation.HS: Islam is Evil! That is one word that can describe it. We are in trouble as this evil is taking over countries and nations! Remember our Holy Scriptures? You shall not envy anyone anything. This includes other countries' territory. Stop Islam spreading!
translation.CN: Doesn't 'prohibition' always fail because it adds a certain glamour that protrudes the opposite of the intended effect?

translation.HS: Quite strange, the majority of Easter Eggs are being labelled 'Chocolate Eggs', I think this is because of the Muslims in our country, and the companies are betraying our culture.
translation.CN: When they start selling eggs in February it's always been about money and not religion.

translation.HS: All Muslims should be deported, no one wants them here.
translation.CN: Try running the NHS without them and other migrants!

translation.HS: Islam will invade us: It is Islamization.
translation.CN: There is a general return to faith.

translation.HS: We breed pigs to feed muslims.
translation.CN: Hi, do you really believe that committing such an atrocity can help solve the problem?

translation.HS: Your veil is an attack against me.
translation.CN: How does it attack you?

translation.HS: Muslim invasion is the new plague of London. They must be repatriated to their home countries!
translation.CN: What have Muslim people done to you? Would you like to be in their place and be repatriated? These are serious words and one cannot say them without thinking of consequences!

translation.HS: We welcome them in our house, we support them and they kill us: they are beasts, not men.
translation.CN: A small number of asylum seekers is effectively maintained for a short period. This is just to prevent that, lying on the street and in trouble, they'll end up becoming criminals. The bulk of crime made by immigrants is not the work of this category, but of irregulars (which are not maintained by anyone).

translation.HS: The Islamic veil is the demonstration of political Islam.
translation.CN: And the Catholic veil?

translation.HS: Islam is fanaticism. Muslims want to kill all who do not believe in their god.
translation.CN: Islamic fanaticism exists, as well as fanaticism exists in all faiths, religious or not. Not all Muslims are fanatics.

translation.HS: Westerners believe Islam is incompatible with their world. They consider it a religion worse than others. There are surveys about this.
translation.CN: Isn't this the result of the conflation of the the 'actions' of some people professing a faith in Islam, with the religion itself. In Christian terms, this would be like judging Catholicism on the basis of the behaviour of a handful of the clergy.

translation.HS: These Islamic will bring us back to the Middle Age. We will starve to death and die of diseases that disappeared.
translation.CN: If you refer to the young men and girls who emigrate from African countries, I would like to remind you that many are Christian. Immigration also does not lead to an increase in diseases.

translation.HS: These 8 crooks are all Muslims and every one of their victims is Non-Muslim, white-British. Why do these criminals only target White British Non-Muslims?
translation.CN: Tosh! Criminals are 'equal opportunists', targeting the elderly and vulnerable regardless of their faith or ethnicity.

translation.HS: If they love Sharia law so much, why do not they go off and live in a Muslim country?
translation.CN: Can somebody not love their faith and their country (UK)?

translation.HS: We cannot live with a religion that blows up his believers!
translation.CN: Hi, actually several experts of the Koran showed that violence is not accepted in itself, except for cases of self-defence. Those who commit crimes in the name of this religion, in short, are doing it violating the same rules of the faith to which they believe to be inspired.

translation.HS: Muslims are all terrorists.
translation.CN: This is a wrong subjective generalization.

translation.HS: Muslims are all terrorists.
translation.CN: It is like saying all priests are pedophiles.

translation.HS: Islam - Silence is tacit acceptance. Raise your voice before it is too late!
translation.CN: There is nothing to raise your voice to. Have you ever spoken to your local Muslim community?

translation.HS: The problem of rape in Europe has been present since Muslims immigrants arrived there. They have been protected for years by the government and by the police who have not taken action.
translation.CN: That is what the headlines suggest BUT actual cases where migrants are the abuser is just a drop in the ocean compared to the total number of cases.

translation.HS: What is the point in listening to Muslim women? They are all retarded.
translation.CN: The point of listening to Muslim women, and women in general, is that they could broaden and enlighten your view of the world.

translation.HS: Muslims use corporal and cruel punishment on people.
translation.CN: Violence is only permitted in the qu'ran through means of self-defence.

translation.HS: The veiled women do not work. They are locked up at home.
translation.CN: It is exactly because they want to participate in public life that you make it a problem.

translation.HS: Muslims, if they cannot assimilate, they should emigrate.
translation.CN: 95% of British Muslims feel a loyalty to the UK and contribute over 31 billion pounds to the UK economy. They look like a valuable part of the community to me. (statistics from MEND.org.uk)

translation.HS: Islam oppresses and persecutes gay and women.
translation.CN: Articles showing the opposite.

translation.HS: Almost all Muslims deliberately decide not to work.
translation.CN: Do you really think this? So how otherwise they can support themselves?

translation.HS: Liberal double standards! Muslims oppress women, homosexuals and other cultures but are not held responsible due to our society's tolerance! The government should stop submitting to these people.
translation.CN: How exactly is the government submitting to this? I do not see Muslims oppressing these groups and this being tolerated, in fact it seems Muslims are the group being oppressed and vilified.

translation.HS: Veiled women are subjected and forced to wear the headscarf.
translation.CN: Ignorance is the worst disease.

translation.HS: Muslims and islamists are false people that pretend to be victims. In addition to that they criticize other cultures for using violence, although their religion professes that.
translation.CN: From your spiel about 'Moslems' it seems you have not mastered the art of spelling.

translation.HS: We need to kill Muslims, otherwise, they will make us explode!
translation.CN: The 100 million pounds they donated to charity on Ramadan must be part of that evil plan to blow everyone up.

translation.HS: These despicable Muslims hadn't won yet. Now there will be a cruel punishment!
translation.CN: What are they trying to win? Muslims in the UK aren't at war with anyone, the only thing creating conflict is Islamophobic rhetoric like this, seeking to create a divide.

translation.HS: Muslims are all terrorists.
translation.CN: Pure Amalgams.

translation.HS: We are seeing more and more of a Muslim problem.
translation.CN: And that comes from where you think it comes from.

translation.HS: Damn bastards, they want us to close all churches.
translation.CN: Where did you hear this news?

translation.HS: These Islamic will bring us back to the Middle Age. We will starve to death and die of diseases that disappeared.
translation.CN: I don't know of any case of infectious diseases brought by migrants, from what source did you take this belief?

translation.HS: Your veil is an attack against me.
translation.CN: Oh, yeah? Forgive me, but how did he attack you? I'm going to hand him over to the police and I'll take TELINDUS with you against him!

translation.HS: Fuck Islam and Fuck ISIS. We should repatriate all Muslims. They are all a bunch of violent criminals who do not share our values and never will. Without them Britain will be a better, safer place.
translation.CN: Actually, the principle of Muslims is to love and respect everyone. This is the same as our values. If you talk to a Muslim, you will find out that they are kind and friendly people too.

translation.HS: If someone wrote the Koran to the present day it would not be allowed.
translation.CN: Mate, you know Islam means peace. I do not really think a religion born from peace preaches hate speech.

translation.HS: The Arabs want to impose their religion and to rule in our home. They must be sent back to their house on boats.
translation.CN: The Muslim religion is not to be feared because it is different from ours. We have to work for integration.

translation.HS: Islam is fanaticism. Muslims want to kill all who do not believe in their god.
translation.CN: Islam is a religion devoted to love for one's fellow, jihad is a minority not related to religion.

translation.HS: Islam is a religion incompatible with the values
translation.CN: Islam respects the republic, which does not impede the freedom to practice its religion!

translation.HS: Muslims are all fundamentalist Islamist Salafist terrorists.
translation.CN: Meaning of adjectives? (there are so many of them)

translation.HS: Muslims: return to your country.
translation.CN: Where is the Muslimstan? The nearest embassy?

translation.HS: I think islam is staining the humanity.
translation.CN: Hatred generalised to an entire religion sounds like a much worse product of humanity.

translation.HS: Islam is fanaticism. Muslims want to kill all who do not believe in their god.
translation.CN: Islam is a religion, and the same way as any other religion (including Christianity) risks fanaticism; this does not make all of Muslims fanatic.

translation.HS: The vast majority of Muslims are unemployed and refuse to work.
translation.CN: Job applicants with non-Muslim names are 3 times more likely to get a job interview than those with Muslim names. Remind me again why it is that they struggle to find work?

translation.HS: The Arabs want to impose their religion and to rule in our home. They must be sent back to their house on boats.
translation.CN: I think it's better to learn to live together instead. Sending them home without reason is equivalent to rejecting them and the rejection generates resentment.

translation.HS: Muslims are all terrorists.
translation.CN: Why in this case do Muslims unanimously condemn all attacks on French and European soil?

translation.HS: Muslims hate anyone who is not Muslim.
translation.CN: You don't know Islam or Muslims, apparently.

translation.HS: They make us think that islam is a religion to diffuse their doctrine in our tolerant culture. Enough is enough!
translation.CN: Oh the tolerant world that is spreading hate and fuelling discrimination against others?

translation.HS: Rape=jihad. Muslims are rapists that are everywhere in the UK. When they were not here, there wasn't the problem of rape.
translation.CN: This is simply wrong. How can you say such hateful things about millions of people?

translation.HS: Veiled women are subjected and forced to wear the headscarf.
translation.CN: If you claim to defend them, give them the floor and do not speak for them, do not take them for a lower being who must submit to the thinking of the strongest and see if it is actually submitted and obliged.

translation.HS: We cannot live with a religion that blows up his believers!
translation.CN: We cannot live with so much ignorance, which drives to support such nonsense.

translation.HS: Muslims are weak-minded.
translation.CN: Islam is a religion that calls for reasoning.

translation.HS: Veiled women are subjected and forced to wear the headscarf.
translation.CN: And a third not for hate.

translation.HS: Islam is a religion incompatible with the values
translation.CN: Islam means peace and like the French republic does, it defends identical values, freedom, fraternity, equality.

translation.HS: All Muslims should be deported, no one wants them here.
translation.CN: Deported where? They are UK Citizens?

translation.HS: Someone needs to put those Muslims in a hole in the ground before they start to blow us all up again.
translation.CN: And after you have done that, who's gonna taxi you home, provide that takeaway after a hard day's graft and nurse those calluses on your hands? And do not get me started on the doctors you might need.

translation.HS: Islam is comparable to a disease to eliminate.
translation.CN: An entire faith of 1.6 billion people is not a cancer.

translation.HS: The Islamic veil is the demonstration of political Islam.
translation.CN: The veil restores the woman's dignity.

translation.HS: We need to Burn the Koran and all the Mosques down - this will solve all problems in this country.
translation.CN: Really? Cause it seems problems in this country are caused by hatred and intolerance.

translation.HS: Muslims are all terrorists.
translation.CN: The terrorists have all served in prison.

translation.HS: The Arabs want to impose their religion and to rule in our home. They must be sent back to their house on boats.
translation.CN: An answer like that so indiscriminate seems not a solution to me to migration; people that arrive in Italy are not here to 'conquer' us, they come to try to have a better future.

translation.HS: Appeasement to Islam and Muslims is a mental illness. It is a fact.
translation.CN: If values of tolerance, respect and human decency are akin to mental illness, I am happy to be classed that way.

translation.HS: Veiled women are subjected and forced to wear the headscarf.
translation.CN: Yes if they want to have things in accordance with their religion.

translation.HS: It is curious that almost all easter eggs are being labelled 'chocolate eggs'. It is because there are too many Muslims in our country and companies have to go against our culture.
translation.CN: When I last looked there were very few words, just pictures of chocolates, that is what makes us want chocolate and sells the eggs.

translation.HS: Islam is brainwashing its faithful. It is a horrible cult made of persons that reproduce continuously.
translation.CN: So, you say that highly educated Muslim doctors, researchers, teachers are brainwashed lunatics? Sorry, but you got this so wrong.

translation.HS: Islam will invade us: It is Islamization.
translation.CN: Christians are present all over the world and no one asks questions.

translation.HS: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
translation.CN: Some of the oldest civilisations in existence are Islamic. I would not call the religious hatred directed at Muslims in Europe 'civilised'.

translation.HS: Muslims cannot add any value to our culture.
translation.CN: The knowledge western society is built on was discovered by Islamic scholars, then colonists claimed it as their own. Our society would not be so developed without Muslim contributions to science, medicine, and many other fields.

translation.HS: We let in people who want to educate to violence and repression.
translation.CN: You talk as if inter-religious dialogue did not exist! There are minds, philosophers, feminist movements by Islamic groups who oppose terror. Do not throw the baby out with the bathwater.

translation.HS: Islam pretends to be a religion but in reality it is only a moon cult.
translation.CN: Yes, a 'moon cult' that has been around for thousands of years, has holy books, formed the basis for many early and modern societies. Sounds a lot like any other real religion to me?

translation.HS: The Islamic veil is the demonstration of political Islam.
translation.CN: No, these are the right of every person to dress freely.

translation.HS: Islamophobia is a right. Fighting Islam is a duty.
translation.CN: Islamophobia is a crime.

translation.HS: These Islamic will bring us back to the Middle Age. We will starve to death and die of diseases that disappeared.
translation.CN: The level of healthcare response of the Islamic people is similar to ours.

translation.HS: Muslims are invading London. There are more Muslims than Londoners in London. #londinistan #LondonHasFallen.
translation.CN: Must be hard for you being in a vibrant, international metropolis.

translation.HS: Veiled women are subjected and forced to wear the headscarf.
translation.CN: Veil is a religious devotion, like prayers are for all religions.

translation.HS: The Muslims are imposing their culture in the U.K and the government allows it by submitting to Islam.
translation.CN: What do you mean by 'islamized'? If mosques are built in some areas, I do not see this as a threat but as representation of community in those areas?

translation.HS: Islam will invade us: It is Islamization.
translation.CN: Islam means Peace.

translation.HS: Muslims cannot add any value to our culture.
translation.CN: Muslims contribute much to the UK, through their hard work and charitable activities.

translation.HS: Muslims steal our work.
translation.CN: In so-called Muslim countries, there are thousands of repatriated non-Muslims working there without hearing this speech.

translation.HS: Islam is barbaric.
translation.CN: Islam is a religion that respects all religions.

translation.HS: Muslims are all terrorists.
translation.CN: Terrorism has always existed and it is the work of terrorists, linking it to Muslims shows the will to stigmatize this community and make it responsible for all evils.

translation.HS: We welcome them in our house, we support them and they kill us: they are beasts, not men.
translation.CN: How can you say that they kill us? Do you have data to prove it?

translation.HS: The Arabs want to impose their religion and to rule in our home. They must be sent back to their house on boats.
translation.CN: If we learnt to put ourselves in another's shoes, we would live in a better world without negative prejudices.

translation.HS: Muslims are all terrorists.
translation.CN: I have Muslim friends who do not think at all to blow themselves up.

translation.HS: Your veil is an attack against me.
translation.CN: This is the way you see it, in any case, it isn't its purpose. I freely wear it, religiously, for myself.

translation.HS: We should not trust any Muslim, they all could become a terrorist.
translation.CN: No, Muslims are actually more likely to be the victim of a terrorist attack, especially those living in the Middle-East.

translation.HS: Since 2000, the number of suicide bombings by Muslims = 5284; by non-Muslims = 0. One of the fact about Global Terrorism no one wants to deal with.
translation.CN: Actually, in 2015 13,286 people were killed in the US by firearms and 26,819 were injured. Tell me does that count as terrorism or it is only that when Muslims do it?

translation.HS: Muslims are all terrorists.
translation.CN: Terrorism is a serious problem but it has nothing to do with religion.

translation.HS: Rape=jihad. Muslims are rapists that are everywhere in the UK. When they were not here, there wasn't the problem of rape.
translation.CN: How old are you? The first Mosque in the UK was built in 1889!

translation.HS: All Muslims are incompatible with any Western society.
translation.CN: What makes 'all' Muslims incompatible with Western society? The vast majority of Muslims in Western society share western values of respect, freedom, tolerance, etc. There are only a few that have extremist anti-West views, these are not representative.

translation.HS: Muslims rape our women and must be neutered.
translation.CN: The rapists of women have nothing in common except the male gender.

translation.HS: Islam is a plague infecting our planet.
translation.CN: Dare to explain why? I see people from this religion to be valuable members of our society like the rest of us.

translation.HS: Islam cannot get along with science because is illogical.
translation.CN: Are you sure? There are an awful lot of Muslim, scientists, researchers, and medical professionals for a religion which is supposedly incompatible with science.

translation.HS: Our national flag cannot be shown as it could annoy a Muslim.#fitinorfuckoff.
translation.CN: If that were really true why are there so many union flags around then? Should we report the Queen next time she is home?

translation.HS: Muslims are all fundamentalist Islamist Salafist terrorists.
translation.CN: Prove it!

translation.HS: The Arabs are all terrorists and they want to conquer us with the violence and the bombs. We must respond with napalm.
translation.CN: Really, with napalm. And then where? They are not all terrorists as you say, some belong to ISIS but others are people like you and me.

translation.HS: Islam=evil. Islam is invading us and trying to take over countries. It does not follow the scriptures that say 'you shall not envy anyone anything' Stop islam!
translation.CN: Islam is having many followers, that is true. But does it mean that it is taking over countries and nations? And how can you stop it? People are free to choose for themselves what religion to follow, and if they choose Islam that is their right!

translation.HS: Islam will invade us: It is Islamization.
translation.CN: If tomorrow, all French people converted to Islam out of conviction, what exactly would be the problem? As long as people are in step with their spiritual journey, this should not worry you.

translation.HS: Benefits and access to our national health service must be stopped for Muslims. We should ban them from the UK!
translation.CN: These people are actually subject to a harsh punitive system.

translation.HS: Muslims: return to your country.
translation.CN: I am flattered that my city of Essonne is considered a country.

translation.HS: Using violence to punish another person? Sounds like a muslim issue.
translation.CN: Using violence does not sound like a muslim issue, it sounds like a tactic used by all groups to some extent, religious or not, that you are framing as muslim to support your own agenda.

translation.HS: We do not want to admit that islam isn't a religion, it is only a cult that support murder.
translation.CN: This is not true. How can you say this about an entire faith? Just hatred.

translation.HS: The majority of immigrants are Muslims. It's useless to deny that this invasion, certainly peaceful, will bring in our society the Sharia. Glad you, if sharia represents culture and enrichment!
translation.CN: 1. On what basis do you define this an invasion? 2. Can you explain your point of view?

translation.HS: All Muslims are incompatible with any Western society.
translation.CN: Western Society seems pretty incompatible with Western Society or any other at the moment, maybe we could learn something from Indonesia, which has been conflict free since 2005.

translation.HS: If we do not stand up against Islam they will consider our silence as a way of acceptance!

translation.HS: Veiled women are subjected and forced to wear the headscarf.

translation.HS: Muslims rape our women and must be neutered.

translation.HS: Muslims are all terrorists.

translation.HS: All Muslims should be deported, no one wants them here.

translation.HS: A woman who accepts to live hidden under a veil and gets beaten by her man does not deserve to live in a civilized country like Italy.

translation.HS: Muslims steal our work.

translation.HS: Muslims: return to your country.

translation.HS: Whether you accept it or not, people are concerned with Islamic rape gangs and the spread of extremism.

However, people usually can access only negative events and issues about Islam and do not consider good news meaningful. We do not want only fear to exist in the society. Hence, we should help people know about Islam and Muslims.

translation.HS: Islamic are criminals: they rape, enslave and murder people. Islam is more a worship than a religion and we do not have anything to share with them.

translation.HS: These Islamic will bring us back to the Middle Age. We will starve to death and die of diseases that disappeared.

translation.HS: Muslims hate anyone who is not Muslim.

translation.HS: Almost all Muslims deliberately decide not to work.

translation.HS: The Arabs want to impose their religion and to rule in our home. They must be sent back to their house on boats.

Especially Jehovah's Witnesses and Christians, but I've never heard of Muslims if you are referring to them, who sought to impose their religion even with force.

translation.HS: Muslims are all fundamentalist Islamist Salafist terrorists.

The most important thing is how we can make the society and the world a better place, not just excluding others.

translation.HS: Islamic are criminals: they rape, enslave and murder people. Islam is more a worship than a religion and we do not have anything to share with them.

translation.HS: We cannot even celebrate Christmas in our own country for fear of offending Muslims.

translation.HS: Islam is a non-peaceful religion that professes violence.

translation.HS: All Muslims are incompatible with any Western society.

translation.HS: Women and girls are harmed by Islamic that were allowed to enter in our country by our government.

translation.HS: All Muslims are incompatible with any Western society.

translation.HS: Islam is a religion incompatible with the values

translation.HS: These islamic beasts rape their and our women, after all their religion allows it to them!

translation.HS: We need to kill Muslims, otherwise, they will make us explode!

translation.HS: Islam is a religion incompatible with the values

translation.HS: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.

translation.HS: It's a shame that there is no longer the crucifix in school, a lack of respect.

translation.HS: These animals.

translation.HS: Islam is a religion incompatible with the values

This was true for all types of domestic abuse, other than non-sexual family abuse. Around three times as many adults experienced sexual assault by a partner than by a family member.

translation.CN: No one wants to have more places of worship for others. There are citizens who want a place of worship close to home.

translation.HS: The Arabs want to impose their religion and to rule in our home. They must be sent back to their house on boats.
translation.CN: The migrants are fleeing from situations where it was impossible to continue to live, they are leaving everything to board themselves on boats with absent safety standards in hope of finding a country where they can live in peace. I do not think that their purpose is to control and impose their religion.

translation.HS: Uk is being islamized very fast. British government submits to every whim of Islam.
translation.CN: People have the right to build their churches and follow their confession. They are not trying to convert us all, are they? So we should just leave them at peace.

translation.HS: Muslims do not want to integrate, they want to impose sharia. And then they ask for respect! They are a problem!
translation.CN: To be fair, I would guess its hard to feel a sense of belonging when you are perpetually identified as a problem?

translation.HS: If they love Sharia law so much, why do not they go off and live in a Muslim country?
translation.CN: Because many Muslims were born here and have every right to live in this country. Next question please?

translation.HS: Islam is a violent religion. Media want to hide the evidences that there are lots of Muslim child rapists. They raped children more than a hundred times in a week.
translation.CN: Such numbers! Are you sure they are true? Can you give a link to the evidence about that?

translation.HS: Islamic are criminals: they rape, enslave and murder people. Islam is more a worship than a religion and we do not have anything to share with them.
translation.CN: The demonisation of the Muslim community is the real problem here. Comments like this are the catalysts that drive chasms across our communities, not Islam.

translation.HS: One of many Pakistani rapist.we should extradite them from our country.
translation.CN: Except the ones that diagnosed my illness, take care of me in hospital, drive me to where I need to be, cook my delicious take away when I haven't got time, teach my children in school. Get the point?

translation.HS: They began to build mosques everywhere, and so they compete with our churches.
translation.CN: It does not appear to me that so many mosques have been built in recent years, yet it would be a better way also to isolate the extremists.

translation.HS: It is curious that almost all easter eggs are being labelled 'chocolate eggs'. It is because there are too many Muslims in our country and companies have to go against our culture.
translation.CN: Except for Muslims, both Jesus and Easter are very important so they do not really have a problem with Easter.

translation.HS: We need to kill Muslims, otherwise, they will make us explode!
translation.CN: Terrorism is not confined to one particular religion.

translation.HS: Muslims cannot add any value to our culture.
translation.CN: Muslims have an excellent academic record, with many well-known Doctors and Professors.

translation.HS: Muslims should go home.
translation.CN: Islam means, submitted to a unique God, how can it exist a land or an own country for them.

translation.HS: Islam is a non-peaceful religion that professes violence.
translation.CN: There aren't monotheistic religions that profess violence. Those who practice violence are to be considered extremist regardless of the religion to which he belongs.

translation.HS: Islamists / Moslems have mastered the corrupt art of playing the victim and blaming other cultures for the violent beliefs taught in their main books.
translation.CN: Maybe hostile, discriminatory comments like this aren't helping.

translation.HS: If I cannot go to their countries and build a church, why should they come to our countries and build mosques?
translation.CN: If a country will not allow the practice of other religions, that is a cultural issue. The vast majority of Muslims support people's right to freedom of religion.

translation.HS: Talking of shitholes, I have to go to Londonistan tomorrow #LondonHasFallen.
translation.CN: Send me a postcard!

translation.HS: Great Britain is not Great anymore, it is a shadow of its former self because of the cancer which is an islamic invasion.
translation.CN: No. Having a diverse society is a positive. There is no 'invasion'.

translation.HS: Muslims hate anyone who is not Muslim.
translation.CN: Islam promotes respect for God's creation, i.e. all humanity.

translation.HS: I would prefer the Martians than these fucking Muslims.
translation.CN: This statement seems to me inappropriate. Can you explain to me what is the source of so much hatred?

translation.HS: They began to build mosques everywhere, and so they compete with our churches.
translation.CN: Our constitution guarantees freedom of worship, so it makes sense that Muslims have places of prayer for them.

translation.HS: The Arabs want to impose their religion and to rule in our home. They must be sent back to their house on boats.
translation.CN: Those who run away from war and hunger do not impose anything on anyone, they do not have the forces to control anything.

translation.HS: They want to impose the veil on all of us.
translation.CN: Why do you make this statement?

translation.HS: How boring these Muslims who put their prophet everywhere!
translation.CN: Without exaggeration, it seems to me that there is worse than the prophet . Like the feeling of shame and guilt of those who administer the cult.

translation.HS: Muslims should stay in their country if they want to follow sharia law.
translation.CN: If you dislike diversity so much, why do not you go off and live in a country where there are no Muslims, only people like you?

translation.HS: Britain is not on our side. It does not protect our citizens. It cannot protect our people from Muslim rapists. Do we still continue supporting this government and the law?
translation.CN: Where is your evidence for this? This is just hatred.

translation.HS: The Arabs want to impose their religion and to rule in our home. They must be sent back to their house on boats.
translation.CN: It is not true, but even if it was true, I am not aware that all Italian criminals have been deported in the past. I remind you that we have exported the mafia all over the world, huh.

translation.HS: The Islamic veil is the demonstration of political Islam.
translation.CN: I'm not surprised to hear it from someone who is obsessed with social networking.

translation.HS: Islam is a cult (even if I couldn't say that) that leads us to war, in addition to that they are intolerant, biased,sexist and so on.
translation.CN: Everyone has the right of free speech, while it does not mean anyone can use it to hurt people. Plus, based on what you critisize Islam? I recommend you to read something about true Islam and Muslims. You would find that they are no different from us.

translation.HS: Islamophobia is Muslims who want to prevent blasphemy.
translation.CN: Muslims do not want to ban blasphemy.

translation.HS: I've been into Muslim shops in areas of Birmingham and they have refused to serve me. I've even seen signs saying 'No Whites After 8pm'.
translation.CN: Try harder next time. It was graffiti, not a sign from the owners.

translation.HS: We are seeing more and more of a Muslim problem.
translation.CN: Analysis of the 'we'? Who makes it?

translation.HS: They should open the mosques at their homes.
translation.CN: People who can practice their religion are people who feel respected and therefore they respect and learn to respect people of different religions.

translation.HS: Islam hates women.
translation.CN: Islam considers women to be jewels. And like any gemstone, it must be protected from unhealthy eyes.

translation.HS: Since 2000 there were 5248 suicide bombings and all of them were made by Muslims. But nobody considers this when talking about global terrorism.
translation.CN: Actually, in 2015 13,286 people were killed in the US by firearms and 26,819 were injured. Tell me does that count as terrorism or it is only that when Muslims do it?

translation.HS: Muslims are all terrorists.
translation.CN: Ignorance leads to hate.

translation.HS: I do not think that Ramadam will stop Muslims from raping and terrorism.
translation.CN: Muslims criticize violence and terrorism as well. They even became victims of ISIS after they denounced ISIS for its violent actions.

translation.HS: We should pay attention to not offend Muslims while celebrating Christmas in our country.
translation.CN: You know, I spoke with Muslim people and they actually fine with us celebrating Christmas. Such a relief isn't it?

translation.HS: Muslims are a problem in my opinion. They do not want to assimilate. They demand that everyone shows respect for Islam, but do they respect our laws? They establish sharia laws and polygamy.
translation.CN: I do not share your opinion, but I do acknowledge that opinions, mine or yours, do not have to be based on fact or knowledge. My 'experience' of Muslims, as neighbours, colleagues, friends hasn't led me to view them as a problem.

translation.HS: The world would be a better place without Muslims. They are only killing and raping our children.
translation.CN: It wasn't Muslims protecting Jimmy Saville or Gary Glitter, how many more public figures will we find? It wasn't Muslims turning a blind eye to those in the Church in Ireland or the Vatican. Let's route out child abuse everywhere and not just scapegoat.

translation.HS: Appeasement to Islam and Muslims is a mental illness. It is a fact.
translation.CN: I do not think it is. A 'fact' by who?

translation.HS: Appeasement to Islam and Muslims is a mental illness. It is a fact.
translation.CN: Accepting people from all walks of life is not an illness.

translation.HS: Because of the Muslims, Britain is no longer the great country of the past! They are a disease!
translation.CN: Why are you attacking muslims? Many people come and live in Britain and I do not see why it is a bad thing.

translation.HS: Islamists / Moslems have mastered the corrupt art of playing the victim and blaming other cultures for the violent beliefs taught in their main books.
translation.CN: Stop and search disproportionately targets ethnic minorities, looks to me like institutional racism is fuelling this culture of hate.

translation.HS: Muslims are all fundamentalist Islamist Salafist terrorists.
translation.CN: Poor you! I feel sorry for you!

translation.HS: A Muslim is loyal only to Allah (as a comment in relation to election for public office etc.).
translation.CN: No, a person can be religious and have multiple allegiances and responsibilities.

translation.HS: People that live in the West cannot live with Muslims.
translation.CN: Maybe prejudice and xenophobia are incompatible with any Western society?

translation.HS: Bombs on you, bad infamous people (enough is enough stinky)
translation.CN: Perhaps to wish death at people is not the right approach to use.

translation.HS: The Islamic veil is the demonstration of political Islam.
translation.CN: Submission to God.

translation.HS: Everything will be better if Muslims did not exist. Their only contribution to our society is violence.
translation.CN: What exactly are you suggesting?

translation.HS: Our children are taught Islamic ideologies. It is awful!
translation.CN: No child is 'forced fed' Islam. Parents retain the right to take their child out of any religious education.

translation.HS: Muslims have privileges that we do not have.
translation.CN: Yes, as well as everything non-Muslims aren't allowed to do by law, Muslims also have to put up with hateful bigotry and prejudice from people like you.

translation.HS: There are bands of muslim rapists everywhere in telford, rotherham, rochdale, oxford, newcastle etc. It is awful!
translation.CN: You cannot blame an entire faith.

translation.HS: If the Koran was published today it would be banned as hate speech.
translation.CN: The real problem here is the amount of Islamophobic hate speech that Muslims face, not the book which their beliefs are based on. That is the hate which is having real and dangerous consequences.

translation.HS: Muslims are guilty in the sexual exploitation of children. Dirty filthy muslims terrorize our girls, today in Oxford, tomorrow everywhere.
translation.CN: I feel your anger. The often ignored fact is that around 90% of the criminals were persons known to the child. Besides, most of people convicted of child abuse offences were white men. Sexual exploitation of children should be stopped and prevented. Please help our girls: visit English National Domestic Violence Helpline and National Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Children.

translation.HS: Your veil is an attack against me.
translation.CN: I understand that I do not represent your feminine ideal, but know that this veil is my pride.

translation.HS: Islam teaches only hate! Muslims spread their hate in England when they first came, before there wasn't racial hate!
translation.CN: So race hate started when Westerners could not tolerate other people who had different beliefs?

translation.HS: Our children are being forced fed with this 'Islam' nonsense in schools. This is a disgrace.
translation.CN: No child is 'forced fed' Islam. Parents retain the right to take their child out of any religious education.

translation.HS: The veiled women do not work. They are locked up at home.
translation.CN: Muslim woman + educated woman + valuable woman + educated woman = free woman.

translation.HS: The Arabs are all terrorists and they want to conquer us with the violence and the bombs. We must respond with napalm.
translation.CN: It does not seem correct to me to generalize. If some Arabs are terrorists, that does not mean they all are. Some Italian men kill their partners/wives, does this mean that we are a nation of uxoricide?

translation.HS: Islam is a just a repressive ideology that persecutes women and gay people.
translation.CN: An ideology based on a holy book written thousands of years ago isn't likely to match up to contemporary standards of equality and tolerance, but it's not the ideology that matters, it is how followers act it out.

translation.HS: The Arabs want to impose their religion and to rule in our home. They must be sent back to their house on boats.
translation.CN: It does not appear anywhere that an Arab is trying to command in our country unless the members of the government have Arab ancestors, which is very likely given that we Italians are one of the most mixed peoples in the world.

translation.HS: Muslims rape our women and must be neutered.
translation.CN: Not all Muslims commit such terrible crimes, we must respect those that want to integrate normally doing nothing wrong.

translation.HS: Damn bastards, they want us to close all churches.
translation.CN: The best answer to this fear is to defend your religion, not attack Islam; do you attend church regularly?

translation.HS: Muslims cannot add any value to our culture.
translation.CN: I take it you have never eaten a curry then?

translation.HS: Muslims hate anyone who is not Muslim.
translation.CN: They lost the head.

translation.HS: The vast majority of Muslims are unemployed and refuse to work.
translation.CN: Muslims make up many important jobs in the UK, such as charity workers, healthcare professionals and teachers.

translation.HS: Muslims: return to your country.
translation.CN: We are at home.

translation.HS: We should expel Muslims, everyone wants them out of the country.
translation.CN: But we would have much less doctors, chefs, politicians, drivers, scientists, philanthropists.

translation.HS: Liberal double standards! Muslims oppress women, homosexuals and other cultures but are not held responsible due to our society's tolerance! The government should stop submitting to these people.
translation.CN: How exactly are Muslims oppressing other cultures? Do you think maybe spreading the opinion that all Muslims are homophobic and sexist demonises them and legitimises oppressing their culture?

translation.HS: Finally a person who represents westerners, we hate Islam!
translation.CN: Who are 'all'? You cannot decide for all people, you cannot decide what is my opinion, that is rude.

translation.HS: Most religions cause death and despair, but Islam is the worst and cruelest of them all, it is nothing but trouble.
translation.CN: Before making judgement, do you understand what Islam and its history are?

translation.HS: Women of our culture that decide to become Islamic are so selfish. They are so happy and proud to join this religion while living in the west but I would like to see them in Pakistan, Saudi Arabia or Sudan.
translation.CN: Methodist, Lutheran, Jehovah's Witness, Catholic, Protestant, there are different types of Christianity and different countries interpret it different ways why do you think Islam would be different?

translation.HS: There are many of them and they will conquer the world.
translation.CN: I do not think so, we westerners will arrive sooner to destroy the world.

translation.HS: Islam teaches only hate! Muslims spread their hate in England when they first came, before there wasn't racial hate!
translation.CN: [positive example of Muslim community] when the Muslim community [is doing this] do you really think someone's very existence is an excuse to project hate at them? Clearly the Muslim community doesn't.

translation.HS: All Muslims are incompatible with any Western society.
translation.CN: That is an unusual thought. Muslims are human beings like the rest of us. And, as all human beings, they can integrate into any society should the need arise.

translation.HS: Islam will invade us: It is Islamization.
translation.CN: Is this a country?

translation.HS: Someone needs to put those Muslims in a hole in the ground before they start to blow us all up again.
translation.CN: The 100 million pounds they donated to charity on Ramadan must be part of that evil plan to blow everyone up.

translation.HS: Islam is a non-peaceful religion that professes violence.
translation.CN: Islam is not a violent religion, but, like Christianity, is considered by those who practice it, the only true path to safeness. Muslims try to do good by offering their message, that is not a message of violence. Unfortunately, some people allow themselves to be fascinated by extremism, as has happened with Christianity long ago.

translation.HS: If the Koran was published today it would be banned as hate speech.
translation.CN: If any religious text written thousands of years ago was published today you could say the same. Have you read the Bible's old testament?

translation.HS: I don't want to have anything to do with the Islamists! They are murderers and terrorists and we must fight them!
translation.CN: Generalizing is not right and does not lead to anything good: explaining what is the faith of over a billion and a half people living in very different cultural contexts is complicated. Terrorism has nothing to do with Islam, but some persons give a wrong and extremist reading to it. The pillars of Islam are the declaration of faith of monotheism, the prayer, the alms, the fasting during the month of Ramadan, the pilgrimage to La Mecca.

translation.HS: Veiled women are subjected and forced to wear the headscarf.
translation.CN: There is no compulsion in Islam, the use of the veil is a personal choice of faith, not required by the husband or the family.

translation.HS: Muslims are all terrorists.
translation.CN: Divide and conquer better!

translation.HS: Our children are being forced fed with this 'Islam' nonsense in schools. This is a disgrace.
translation.CN: Only as much as any other religion, and yet you do not seem to have a problem with those. I wonder why?

translation.HS: Muslims are all fundamentalist Islamist Salafist terrorists.
translation.CN: Could you enlighten me on the following definitions: fundamentalist / Islamist and Salafist.

translation.HS: Muslims are all terrorists.
translation.CN: A deviant minority does not represent all Muslim believers.

translation.HS: A Muslim is loyal only to Allah (as a comment in relation to election for public office etc.).
translation.CN: So their faith and belief in the teachings of God guides them to a virtuous path of public service. What exactly are you complaining about?

translation.HS: Muslims: return to your country.
translation.CN: My country is France. Sorry musulmanie does not exist.

translation.HS: Veiled women are subjected and forced to wear the headscarf.
translation.CN: Have you collected their opinion before making such comments?

translation.HS: Islam is a religion incompatible with the values
translation.CN: In a secular republic, state and religion are separated; everyone has its own domain.

translation.HS: These Islamic will bring us back to the Middle Age. We will starve to death and die of diseases that disappeared.
translation.CN: It seems to me an excessive alarmist statement, with no connection to reality.

translation.HS: Your veil is an attack against me.
translation.CN: If a veil has this effect on you, how can you stand to walk around town with so much melting pot?

translation.HS: There are groups of Muslims, instructed by Koran, that rape our women, and we allow this to happen. Why?
translation.CN: The vast majority of rapes are committed in the home, by someone the victim knows, or by a partner. There are numerous examples of rape culture in this country. (add a link to the everyday sexism project)

translation.HS: The world is already lost, but US and UK face challenges from Islam. These are death cult, intolerance, barbarism, freedom, free speech, being gay, quran, jihad.
translation.CN: This is not true and your argument does not make sense as hatred does not counter hatred.

translation.HS: Islam cannot get along with science because is illogical.
translation.CN: Actually all modern science and mathematics are children of Islam.

translation.HS: Your veil is an attack against me.
translation.CN: If I were trying to strangle you with my veil, your words would be justified; but now you are really exaggerating a lot.

translation.HS: Most religions cause death and despair, but Islam is the worst and cruelest of them all, it is nothing but trouble.
translation.CN: Can I suggest that some of the cruelest acts in human history have been committed the name of politics just as much as the various faiths, and that this is more about what it is to be 'human' than any aspect of 'divinity'?

translation.HS: They began to build mosques everywhere, and so they compete with our churches.
translation.CN: There are very few mosques in Italy compared to the churches.

translation.HS: Muslims in a few years will impose their beliefs, and I want to see all the radical-chic bleeding hearts that will have to wear the veil!
translation.CN: Not all Muslims impose the veil on women.

translation.HS: Islam is a cult (even if I couldn't say that) that leads us to war, in addition to that they are intolerant, biased,sexist and so on.
translation.CN: Have you ever truely understand the religion Islam, including its history, principles, or teaching? Islam actually teaches people to respect life and care for people. It is also what the majority of Muslims follow.

translation.HS: These Islamic will bring us back to the Middle Age. We will starve to death and die of diseases that disappeared.
translation.CN: Even the Muslims have the right to practice their religion.

translation.HS: Your veil is an attack against me.
translation.CN: Clothing worn by others may bother you, because you are not used to it, but not to attack you. It doesn't make sense.

translation.HS: It's a shame that there is no longer the crucifix in school, a lack of respect.
translation.CN: In countries like France at school it is forbidden any religious symbol, from the crucifix to the islamic veil.

translation.HS: They are beasts, they keep their women at home and under the veil, then they go out and rape ours.
translation.CN: It does not appear to me that there is data to support this theory.

translation.HS: Did you know that the rape epidemic in Europe is due to Muslim immigrants? They have been raping our children for many years with no counteraction from the police and government. Islam is a death cult!
translation.CN: Child rapists are arrested and punished no matter what religion they follow. I do not think it is true that police does not counteract it.

translation.HS: The Arabs are all terrorists and they want to conquer us with the violence and the bombs. We must respond with napalm.
translation.CN: It would be like saying that all Italians are mobsters and kill people with a shotgun or dissolve children in acid. You can never generalize.

translation.HS: Your veil is an attack against me.
translation.CN: It is just a piece of tissue.

translation.HS: Veiled women are subjected and forced to wear the headscarf.
translation.CN: If you know what's going on in a woman's head, it may be that you unconsciously take too much from Mel Gibson in the movie "What women want".

translation.HS: These Islamic will bring us back to the Middle Age. We will starve to death and die of diseases that disappeared.
translation.CN: Really? It seems to me that it is a comment a bit excessive.

translation.HS: All the Muslims should have been punished for yesterday, not only a few. Citizens will take action if the government does not do anything.
translation.CN: The ones who deserved to be punished, were punished. If others are innocent, clearly they do not deserve to be penalized?

translation.HS: Islamists / Moslems have mastered the corrupt art of playing the victim and blaming other cultures for the violent beliefs taught in their main books.
translation.CN: Or maybe they actually ARE the victims of discrimination and biased negative media coverage spreading false stereotypes.

translation.HS: Muslims are all terrorists.
translation.CN: A billion terrorists.

translation.HS: I am done with Islam and isis. All Muslims should be sent to their homeland. Britain will be better without their violence and ideology.
translation.CN: I agree that ISIS is an evil aberration, but to extend this to include up to 3 million people just in the UK is just plain silly.

translation.HS: Islam is a cult and not a religion. They rape children, enslave and murder people, attack our values, and there is nothing good about it. It is incompatible with our way of life.
translation.CN: This is not true. How can you say that about 1.6 billion people?

translation.HS: Islam is fanaticism. Muslims want to kill all who do not believe in their god.
translation.CN: Muslims in general do not impose their religion by force. Christians did this thing more often.

translation.HS: The Islamic veil is the demonstration of political Islam.
translation.CN: You see political Islam everywhere.

translation.HS: The Muslims are imposing their culture in the U.K and the government allows it by submitting to Islam.
translation.CN: What type of whmis are you talking about? Laws are created after careful consideration of matters, it is not like every sudden desire will be fulfilled.

translation.HS: All Muslims are incompatible with any Western society.
translation.CN: All people who share such blatant lies and hate are incompatible with any Western society.

translation.HS: The Arabs are all terrorists and they want to conquer us with the violence and the bombs. We must respond with napalm.
translation.CN: The number of mosques is not even remotely comparable to the number of churches, let's not panic.

translation.HS: We should expel Muslims, everyone wants them out of the country.
translation.CN: I have so many amazing Muslim friends. I do not want them deported. What is your reasoning?

translation.HS: Islam is just a moon cult masquerading as a religion.
translation.CN: Pretty impressive 'cult' to have produced 12 Nobel Prize winners.

translation.HS: Liberal double standards! Muslims oppress women, homosexuals and other cultures but are not held responsible due to our society's tolerance! The government should stop submitting to these people.
translation.CN: Last I checked, the government does not tolerate oppression, ever. Much of the media however, focuses negative coverage on Muslims and other minority communities to try to paint a false image. Don't be fooled by their fake news.

translation.HS: Islam is a disease that must be eradicated.
translation.CN: Hatred and xenophobia must be fought, nothing else.

translation.HS: Islam is a cult and not a religion. They rape children, enslave and murder people, attack our values, and there is nothing good about it. It is incompatible with our way of life.
translation.CN: I think you are confusing Islam with the crusades.

translation.HS: They began to build mosques everywhere, and so they compete with our churches.
translation.CN: In Italy, there is freedom of worship, so anyone is free to practice their religion by any means that seems appropriate, then also with building places of worship.

translation.HS: The vast majority of Muslims are unemployed and refuse to work.
translation.CN: Let's be honest a quick google search shows that simply isn't true. Please tell me where on earth you managed to drag up those stats from?

translation.HS: Even if all religions bring death, Islam is the worst one. Islam does not lead to anything but death.
translation.CN: This is not true. Why do you think this?

translation.HS: The Islamic veil is the demonstration of political Islam.
translation.CN: False because the veil is not islamic, it is present in all religions.

translation.HS: The veiled women do not work. They are locked up at home.
translation.CN: It must be understood that these same women have a brain like the others that they went to school and that they have the same weapons as other women, not to confuse them with immigrants.

translation.HS: Our liberal government continues to ignore child rapes and Islamic radicalisation, because they promote modern values, e.g. Increasing the sexualization of children. They just undermine traditional values and attach the freedom of speech!
translation.CN: Let's remind ourselves that in the US, in 1880, the age of consent was set at 10 or 12 in most states, with the exception of Delaware where it was 7. We live in more enlightened times.

translation.HS: The Arabs want to impose their religion and to rule in our home. They must be sent back to their house on boats.
translation.CN: I think they want to keep their customs and I understand it, I would not say that they want to impose their customs on us.

translation.HS: Now we are not even allowed to walk the dog for fear of offending the local Muslim population.
translation.CN: Wish I could believe everything I read but sometimes reality keeps sneaking in.

translation.HS: These liberal standards! Muslims are intolerant with other cultures, women and homosexuals, but our society protects them with this liberalist policy.
translation.CN: If we excluded everyone who had prejudice, who would be left?

translation.HS: The Arabs are all terrorists and they want to conquer us with the violence and the bombs. We must respond with napalm.
translation.CN: Arab countries have always condemned terrorist acts.

translation.HS: We welcome them in our house, we support them and they kill us: they are beasts, not men.
translation.CN: They said the same of Jews, Italian immigrants and history have proved them wrong. What part do you choose? In which way you want to be remembered? As someone who has helped those in trouble or as someone who caused the death of innocent people?

translation.HS: Your veil is an attack against me.
translation.CN: Other people may feel assaulted by your words as well.

translation.HS: The Arabs want to impose their religion and to rule in our home. They must be sent back to their house on boats.
translation.CN: I live in a city absolutely multiethnic and it does not seem to me that nothing alarming happens.

translation.HS: Another rapist from Pakistan. We should deport them all back to their disgusting country.
translation.CN: Our justice system deportes the rapists back to their countries after the sentences are finished. Meanwhile, we should also think about how to stop rapists from both UK and other countries.

translation.HS: Islam is the cancer of the world and need to be surgically removed.
translation.CN: An entire faith of 1.6 billion people is not a cancer.

translation.HS: I am done with Islam and isis. All Muslims should be sent to their homeland. Britain will be better without their violence and ideology.
translation.CN: Positive news stories*.

translation.HS: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
translation.CN: I'd rather have a civilisation based on equality and justice where everyone is judged by their merit and not through sweeping generalisations and prejudice.

translation.HS: Image (features protesters with signs such as 'behead those who insult Islam) with a caption saying 'they want to eliminate us, we must be islamophobic'.
translation.CN: There are a hundred similar images of Christian including those in the KKK standing next to their victims who used the Bible as a justification. Of course none of us believe they represent all Christians.

translation.HS: Islam produces criminals, even if it is true that criminals are not all of a certain religion. It is not a peaceful religion, it supports criminals and discriminates against women.
translation.CN: Today, in many Muslim-majority community, women receive equal, even higher in some places, treatment as men. For example, many women work as scientists, engineers, lawyers, etc.

translation.HS: Muslims have done horrible things in our countries such as machete attacks, gang rapes, killings and so on. Why hasn't our government done anything?
translation.CN: Are seriously suggesting these things did not happen until we invited people from the Indian sub-continent to come and work in our mills and factories?

translation.HS: We need to kill Muslims, otherwise, they will make us explode!
translation.CN: Think you are digging yourself into a bit of a hole there.

translation.HS: They want us to believe that this is normal, soon our little girls will be veiled.
translation.CN: These are our daughters, we have the choice to educate them as we wish.

translation.HS: Is strange that BBC hadn't reported the murder of two men in Paris, they were killed by a Muslim shouting 'Allah Akbar'.
translation.CN: Is this true? Where is your source?

translation.HS: Muslims rape our women and must be neutered.
translation.CN: Actually, Muslim people are very selective and do not like Western women.

translation.HS: What have Muslims ever done for us?
translation.CN: Uhm, Maths.

translation.HS: Islam is a religion incompatible with the values

Muslims ruled India for about a millennium. Today, more than 80% of Indians are non-Muslim, a sign that Islam was not imposed by the sword. The most populated regions in Muslims are the east coast of Africa, Indonesia and Malaysia, while no Muslim armed forces have gone to these regions, which were conquered only by the intellectual sword.

translation.HS: Islam is a religion of war, we must all fight.

translation.HS: The Arabs are all terrorists and they want to conquer us with the violence and the bombs. We must respond with napalm.

translation.HS: Islam is fanaticism. Muslims want to kill all who do not believe in their god.

translation.HS: Veiled women are subjected and forced to wear the headscarf.

translation.HS: Islam will invade us: It is Islamization.

translation.HS: They began to build mosques everywhere, and so they compete with our churches.

translation.HS: Muslims rape our women and must be neutered.

translation.HS: Veiled women are subjected and forced to wear the headscarf.

translation.HS: The veil is contrary to secularism.

translation.HS: All Muslims should be deported, no one wants them here.

translation.HS: Muslims are all fundamentalist Islamist Salafist terrorists.

translation.HS: Muslims are all terrorists.

translation.HS: These 8 criminals are all Muslims because their victims are always white or Non-Muslim!

translation.HS: Islam is a religion incompatible with the values
translation.CN: I dare to say that the Republic is incompatible with all religions.

translation.HS: Islam is a plague infecting our planet.

translation.HS: The veiled women do not work. They are locked up at home.

translation.HS: Veiled women are subjected and forced to wear the headscarf.

translation.HS: Muslims cannot add any value to our culture.

translation.HS: We welcome them in our house, we support them and they kill us: they are beasts, not men.

translation.HS: Veiled women are subjected and forced to wear the headscarf.

translation.HS: It appears I cannot criticize islam for being a cult which encourages wars and takes over host nations by any means justified by their scriptures. Can I critisize them for being intolerant, biased, sexist and chauvinist?
translation.CN: What you are saying is not true about the culture in general. Not all islamic people are like that and it is not true to claim such facts. Moreover, many non-islamic people can be blamed for being intolerant, sexist, etc. Should we deal with them first and then turn to Islamic criminals?

translation.HS: Islam is a plague infecting our planet.

translation.HS: People that live in the West cannot live with Muslims.

translation.HS: Muslims are all terrorists.

translation.HS: The veiled women do not work. They are locked up at home.

translation.HS: Go on talking to yourself, no one will listen. Islam does not belong within western society. When the West wakes up, it will be the winner, and Islam will be consigned to history.

translation.HS: Islam pretends to be a religion but in reality it is only a moon cult.

translation.HS: Italy: Muslim demolishes a statue of Jesus. Italy: Why do we accept their Mosques? Why do we tolerate this scum? And they want to continue to import this filth?
translation.CN: Many Muslims feed the homeless, offer shelter, work in hospitals, schools and keep the country going. Maybe we should invite more?

translation.HS: People who criticize Islam and its traits in our country - rape gangs and terrorism - are being banned, but this will not end well. People are driven to the right - the only ones who can openly talk about it!
translation.CN: It is true that people are driven to the right, and the right promotes this view. But I did not hear about any people being banned for criticism. Rapism and terrorism are discussed in our society and Muslim society and no one makes anyone silent.

translation.HS: The veiled women do not work. They are locked up at home.
translation.CN: That's not true. All the women I work with are veiled and working.

translation.HS: Our children are taught Islamic ideologies. It is awful!

translation.HS: These Islamic will bring us back to the Middle Age. We will starve to death and die of diseases that disappeared.

translation.HS: Muslims hate anyone who is not Muslim.
translation.CN: Wrong, try to be around Muslims and you'll see.

translation.HS: Islamists / Moslems have mastered the corrupt art of playing the victim and blaming other cultures for the violent beliefs taught in their main books.
translation.CN: Playing the victim and blaming other cultures for violence? Sounds like a far-right tactic to me.

translation.HS: It is curious that almost all easter eggs are being labelled 'chocolate eggs'. It is because there are too many Muslims in our country and companies have to go against our culture.

translation.HS: Your veil is an attack against me.
translation.CN: Your words are an assault to me.

translation.HS: Islam oppresses and persecutes gay and women.

translation.HS: Muslims steal the work of our citizens. I do not care if they have more skills, it is not right! First we and then them!

translation.HS: What is the point in listening to Muslim women? They are all retarded.
translation.CN: And when CVs submitted under a non Muslim name are 3 times more likely to get an interview than those submitted under a Muslim name, the problem very clearly lies with those employers who discriminate against Muslim women.

translation.HS: Muslims in Britain vote for the Labour party. This is why the problem of antisemitism is not solved. It is a mathematical fact!
translation.CN: Are you accusing all the Britain Muslims of antisemitism? I disagree, from my experience they are just usual people who do not show their hate towards anybody, they just live their lives.

translation.HS: Islam will invade us: It is Islamization.
translation.CN: It is a myth that is prevalent in identity settings, don't worry.

translation.HS: #visitmymosque. But do not ask any questions about Muslim grooming gangs targeting white schoolgirls in Rotherham, Rochdale, Tyneside, Teeside etc.

translation.HS: Almost all Muslims deliberately decide not to work.

translation.HS: These Islamists only think about stealing.

translation.HS: Veiled women are subjected and forced to wear the headscarf.
