translation.HS: The Arabs are all terrorists and they want to conquer us with the violence and the bombs. We must respond with napalm.

translation.HS: People are afraid of Muslims rape gangs and the spread of extremism, even if you pretend not to see it.

translation.HS: Above all Islam is a religion of conquest.

translation.HS: Islam is all about hate! When Muslims first set foot in Britain was when race hate started in England!

translation.HS: Muslims rape our women and must be neutered.

translation.HS: Our children are taught Islamic ideologies. It is awful!

translation.HS: No religion claims to be the 'religion of peace' more than Islam. I wonder why they need to keep repeating this?

translation.HS: Muslim rape gangs have spread over Telford, Rotherham, Rochdale, Oxford, Newcastle, everywhere. This is disgusting!

translation.HS: Islam is a disease that must be eradicated.

translation.HS: Muslims are all terrorists.

translation.HS: Muslims hate Christians. They want to kill all of us.

translation.HS: The Arabs want to impose their religion and to rule in our home. They must be sent back to their house on boats.

translation.HS: Veiled women are subjected and forced to wear the headscarf.

translation.HS: Islam is the religion of obscurantism.

translation.HS: Islam is a cult and not a religion. They rape children, enslave and murder people, attack our values, and there is nothing good about it. It is incompatible with our way of life.

translation.HS: The world would be a better place without Muslims. They are only killing and raping our children.

translation.HS: Muslims rape our women and must be neutered.

translation.HS: The last bastion that we will have, will be the atomic bomb.

translation.HS: Muslims rape our women and must be neutered.

translation.HS: The veiled women do not work. They are locked up at home.

translation.HS: Muslims: return to your country.

translation.HS: Islamic are criminals: they rape, enslave and murder people. Islam is more a worship than a religion and we do not have anything to share with them.

translation.HS: Maybe not all muslims are violent but they all support the jihad and follow sharia law. Islam is fanaticism.

Sharia law is a guidance for the goal of leading humanity close to God and living in kindness and justice with God's creation. Seond of all, jihad, based on the concept of Muslim, means struggle for the advancement of oneself within the guidelines of Islam. All these reveal that Islam is a peaceful religion.

translation.HS: Muslims rape our women and must be neutered.

translation.HS: Islam is a disease that must be eradicated.

translation.HS: Muslims had destroyed a Christian statue in Italy. Italy should ask itself why they are allowed to build mosques and why it is tolerating these despicable people.

translation.HS: Veiled women are subjected and forced to wear the headscarf.

translation.HS: Islamic are criminals: they rape, enslave and murder people. Islam is more a worship than a religion and we do not have anything to share with them.

translation.HS: A recent YouGov survey shows that Westerners view islam less favourably than other religions, deeming it incompatible with Western values.
translation.CN: Isn't this the result of the conflation of the the 'actions' of some people professing a faith in Islam, with the religion itself. In Christian terms, this would be like judging Catholicism on the basis of the behaviour of a handful of the clergy.

translation.HS: Muslims hate Christians. They want to kill all of us.

translation.HS: Some Muslims recited the Quran while raping a girl because it validates their actions.

translation.HS: Islam - Silence is tacit acceptance. Raise your voice before it is too late!

translation.HS: The Arabs are all terrorists and they want to conquer us with the violence and the bombs. We must respond with napalm.

translation.HS: Your veil is an attack against me.
translation.CN: What bothers you?

translation.HS: Islam will invade us: It is Islamization.
translation.CN: What makes you say that ?

translation.HS: All Muslims are incompatible with any Western society.
translation.CN: Muslims have been a part of western society for hundreds and hundreds of years and have been integral to its development, to try and separate the two is impossible.

translation.HS: If we do not stand up against Islam they will consider our silence as a way of acceptance!
translation.CN: Islam - Silence is tacit acceptance. Raise your voice against Islamophobia!

translation.HS: To solve all our problems it is enough to burn down mosques and the Koran.
translation.CN: Though looking at your tweet, I think what is left would be worse.

translation.HS: It is obvious that this girl is at risk of FGM. Her parents are Muslims!
translation.CN: Many Islamic scholars actively campaign against FGM, it is not mentioned in the Qaran and is banned in a number of Muslim countries. This is a cultural problem, not a religious one.

translation.HS: The Arabs are all terrorists and they want to conquer us with the violence and the bombs. We must respond with napalm.
translation.CN: Although terrorism is a phenomenon that has to be monitored not all Arabs are terrorists and generalize in this way leads to a lot of ignorance.

translation.HS: #visitmymosque. But do not ask any questions about Muslim grooming gangs targeting white schoolgirls in Rotherham, Rochdale, Tyneside, Teeside etc.
translation.CN: Actually, I think that the whole point of #VisitMyMosque is to ask questions.

translation.HS: Islam is a religion incompatible with the values
translation.CN: What values are you talking about because the values of Islam are fully compatible with the values of the republic.

translation.HS: Almost all Muslims deliberately decide not to work.
translation.CN: There is a slightly higher unemployment rate (a couple of percentage points higher than white British- certainly not a majority) but this mainly down to a higher proportion of Muslims coming from lower socioeconomic backgrounds and a higher likelihood of discrimination from employers, not refusing to work.

translation.HS: Christians have fought for lots of years against Muslims, we also stopped a genocide. We are enemies. But now it seems that our government forgot about this. This is a war! We must fight.
translation.CN: What you said is an extreme case. One of the Islamic principles is to respect human dignity. Islam condemns violence.

translation.HS: According to a recent OFSTED report, a school in Birmingham is still segregating girls and boys, despite a Hight Court ruling in 2017 that this is unlawful.
translation.CN: Gender segregation in faith schools is clearly a negative, but hardly exclusive to some Islamic schools. I was 15 before I attended mixed classes, but then, this was regarded as normal in the 1960's / 70's. The issue is really, if we are to allow faith based education, we need effective mechanisms to uphold standards, and legal requirements.

translation.HS: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
translation.CN: It is not very civilised of you to be intolerant of another religion.

translation.HS: Isis bride wants to return to our country, we must not let her in! They aren't british! Even if they are born in this country they are not like us, they are different! Not british!
translation.CN: Dog's and horse's do not have passports. A stable isn't a country, and matters of nationality and citizenship are legal constructs, rather than genetics.

translation.HS: We are not allowed to celebrate Easter as a Christian festival for fear of offending Muslims.
translation.CN: Have you actually spoken to Muslim people and asked whether it offends them?

translation.HS: Islam is irrational and incompatible with science.
translation.CN: Much like your statement then.

translation.HS: Has our political elite forgotten that we were Christians? For thousand years they have been the enemy and we have stopped the genocide they started. And now we encourage that? Let the warriors take care of this because this is the war.

translation.HS: Muslims are all fundamentalist Islamist Salafist terrorists.

translation.HS: Muslims rape our women and must be neutered.

translation.HS: Your veil is an attack against me.
translation.CN: It is possible to change sidewalks in a democracy.

translation.HS: Muslims in a few years will impose their beliefs, and I want to see all the radical-chic bleeding hearts that will have to wear the veil!

translation.HS: It is absurd to see how in 2018 there is a religion so conservative, and we let them disembark in mass in our country! Italy will always remain a Christian country!

translation.HS: The Islamic veil is the demonstration of political Islam.

translation.HS: Muslims rape our women and must be neutered.

translation.HS: Muslims have nothing to contribute to our society.
translation.CN: Maybe prejudice and xenophobia have nothing to contribute to our society.

translation.HS: The Arabs are all terrorists and they want to conquer us with the violence and the bombs. We must respond with napalm.
translation.CN: What do you mean by the term 'Arabs'? If you refer to professors of the Islamic faith, they do not necessarily coincide with the inhabitants of Arab countries, given that minorities of Christians also live in these countries.

translation.HS: Your veil is an attack against me.
translation.CN: These words are not very tolerant towards humanity.

translation.HS: All Muslims are incompatible with any Western society.
translation.CN: Except all of those which live and add to Western Societies.

translation.HS: Muslims are all fundamentalist Islamist Salafist terrorists.
translation.CN: I do not understand this simplistic sequence concerning a world population of 1.5 billion people on Earth, which has never been at the origin of colonial massacres throughout history or the tragedies of the 20th century.

translation.HS: Islam teaches only hate! Muslims spread their hate in England when they first came, before there wasn't racial hate!

translation.HS: They began to build mosques everywhere, and so they compete with our churches.

translation.HS: Islam is not a religion, its just an excuse for retarded sexual psychopaths, bastards who pollute the world.

translation.HS: A raped girl says rapists recited Quran to her to justify their crimes.
translation.CN: The Yorkshire Ripper' said God told him to commit his atrocities. In neither case is this a justification. Individuals are responsible for their actions, not whatever warped interpretation of a particular faith they cite as possible cause.

translation.HS: These liberal standards! Muslims are intolerant with other cultures, women and homosexuals, but our society protects them with this liberalist policy.
translation.CN: Unfortunately, hate can be found in all walks of life. It is no more prevalent in Muslim communities.

translation.HS: Muslims are anti-semitic.
translation.CN: Stereotypes.

translation.HS: Islam is barbaric.
translation.CN: Islam is peace, love, tolerance, compliance.

translation.HS: Since 2000, the number of suicide bombings by Muslims = 5284; by non-Muslims = 0. One of the fact about Global Terrorism no one wants to deal with.
translation.CN: 1) a quick google search shows that your stats are plain wrong about everything and 2) most Global Terrorism is motivated by politics and not religion. That is why no one is talking about it.

translation.HS: Liberal ideas are wrong, they want us to think that Islam is good but in reality it is a cult about war and violence.
translation.CN: How did you make that conclusion, by observation or speculation? I personally know many Muslims and they are all very respectful, nice and kind. They also invite me for dinners.

translation.HS: Appeasement to Islam and Muslims is a mental illness. It is a fact.
translation.CN: I do not see anything wrong in trying to understand different cultures and religions better. Most important, I would not call it a mental illness. This is disrespectful.

translation.HS: We cannot even celebrate Christmas in our own country for fear of offending Muslims.
translation.CN: This is simply not true.

translation.HS: Veiled women are subjected and forced to wear the headscarf.
translation.CN: The veil is a personal choice.

translation.HS: And war it is.You don't pass over here troglodytes.
translation.CN: It seems to me there is a lot of hate in your comment, where did it come from?

translation.HS: A raped girl says rapists recited Quran to her to justify their crimes.
translation.CN: That is a sad tragedy. However, the message from Quran is misunderstood. Instead, the message is 'if women do not cover themselves adequately with their outer garments, they may be abused - and that such abuse would be justified'.

translation.HS: The Islamic veil is the demonstration of political Islam.
translation.CN: I know of no religious party in France, what are we talking about? French women?

translation.HS: Muslims, if they cannot assimilate, they should emigrate.
translation.CN: Maybe you are the one that needs to assimilate to living in a multicultural society with people who are different from you?

translation.HS: We need to eradicate these pests, stop their benefits, free housing, access to our National Health service and remove them ALL from the UK, it is the only language they will understand.
translation.CN: Bit of a generalisation, isn't it? If you cannot see that most Muslims contribute positively to the UK, you need to do a quick google search I think.

translation.HS: They began to build mosques everywhere, and so they compete with our churches.
translation.CN: Do you know how many mosques are there in Italy? 10, we have instead 66,994 churches, so what are you referring to exactly?

translation.HS: Since 2000 there were 5248 suicide bombings and all of them were made by Muslims. But nobody considers this when talking about global terrorism.
translation.CN: Of all the mass shootings that took place in the US in 2018, all were committed by white men. Were they terrorists too or just 'lone wolves' with mental health issues as the media says?

translation.HS: Islam is a medieval religion.
translation.CN: Wisdom has no age.

translation.HS: Muslims have privileges that we do not have.
translation.CN: It is quite literally not.

translation.HS: Islam is a religion of war, we must all fight.
translation.CN: Islamophobic comments.

translation.HS: Veiled women are subjected and forced to wear the headscarf.
translation.CN: Muslim women are free to think and act freely.

translation.HS: Islam is a religion incompatible with the values
translation.CN: Such statements jeopardize living together.

translation.HS: Muslims cannot add any value to our culture.
translation.CN: The 26% of NHS doctors who are Asian/Asian British beg to differ.

translation.HS: Muslims hate anyone who is not Muslim.
translation.CN: Stop for a moment, you are creating a permanent enemy.

translation.HS: Muslims: return to your country.
translation.CN: I am Muslim and French and proud of being here.

translation.HS: I've been into Muslim shops in areas of Birmingham and they have refused to serve me. I've even seen signs saying 'No Whites After 8pm'.
translation.CN: Saw that in the Mirror, bit of graffiti sprawled across a wall, hardly a shop sign. Have you nothing better than false news?

translation.HS: Muslims are all terrorists.
translation.CN: If the 1.5 billion Muslims were terrorists, we would have known quickly.

translation.HS: All Muslims should be deported, no one wants them here.
translation.CN: There's a few people I do not want here but deporting British Citizens feels a bit like a dictatorship.

translation.HS: Muslims hate anyone who is not Muslim.
translation.CN: Please don't generalize.

translation.HS: The vast majority of Muslims are unemployed and refuse to work.
translation.CN: That might be because of the discrimination they face in the labour market.

translation.HS: These Islamic will bring us back to the Middle Age. We will starve to death and die of diseases that disappeared.
translation.CN: Good evening, what is the connection between Islam and the return of hunger and disease?

translation.HS: Muslims had destroyed a Christian statue in Italy. Italy should ask itself why they are allowed to build mosques and why it is tolerating these despicable people.
translation.CN: Man spreads Hate, encourages intolerance, why do we accept this? And they want to continue this filth?

translation.HS: One of many Pakistani rapist.we should extradite them from our country.
translation.CN: Rapists are, in most cases, friends, family, or partners of the victim. The proportion of Pakistani people who are rapists is no more than that of White British population.

translation.HS: Repatriation of Muslims to any Islamic country is a necessity. Islamic culture is not compatible with our values.
translation.CN: This is not true. How can you say this about an entire faith who adds so much to society?

translation.HS: Islam is fanaticism. Muslims want to kill all who do not believe in their god.
translation.CN: Thereis a forgiving and an uncompromising Islam, just like Christianity or Judaism.

translation.HS: We should not trust any Muslim, they all could become a terrorist.
translation.CN: Every Muslim is a potential peace advocate as well.

translation.HS: We welcome them in our house, we support them and they kill us: they are beasts, not men.
translation.CN: I understand the concern linked to certain crimes committed by foreign citizens, but generalizing is unfair to all those who want to integrate normally.

translation.HS: Muslims: return to your country.
translation.CN: Imagine that I am there in my country.

translation.HS: What have Muslims ever done for us?
translation.CN: List of positive news stories.

translation.HS: Muslims hate anyone who is not Muslim.
translation.CN: This is wrong. I do not hate you.

translation.HS: Islam is a totalitarian doctrine dressed disguised as a religion so that it can spread across our tolerant Christian world. Enough IS ENOUGH!
translation.CN: I only wish followers of all religions and none were more tolerant. For a tolerant Christian world there sure is a lot of discrimination and hate crime.

translation.HS: Muslims are all terrorists.
translation.CN: It was non-Muslims who opened the practice of terrorism.

translation.HS: These Islamic will bring us back to the Middle Age. We will starve to death and die of diseases that disappeared.
translation.CN: I think it's fair to argue such a statement with data and reliable information. Far away then from clich��s completely unfounded.

translation.HS: Every Muslim is a potential terrorist.
translation.CN: Every person is a potential terrorist. What is your point?

translation.HS: They want to impose the veil on all of us.
translation.CN: I do not think they have an interest in putting the veil on non-Muslim women.

translation.HS: Islam is fanaticism. Muslims want to kill all who do not believe in their god.
translation.CN: The Koran clearly says that Christians and Jews should be respected.

translation.HS: Muslims use corporal and cruel punishment on people.
translation.CN: Violence is a muslim issue. Especially all the violence being endured by muslims due to hateful intolerance and discrimination.

translation.HS: We need to kill Muslims, otherwise, they will make us explode!
translation.CN: Getting rid of 22% of the world's population sounds quite laborious, perhaps we should just punish the small minority of people who actually commit a crime instead.

translation.HS: Islam is the cancer of the world and need to be surgically removed.
translation.CN: Please check this [https://www.theguardian.com/commentisfree/2016/aug/01/immigrant-muslim-cancer-research]

translation.HS: These Islamic will bring us back to the Middle Age. We will starve to death and die of diseases that disappeared.
translation.CN: Could you show me with precision to what diseases you refer?

translation.HS: If someone wrote the Koran to the present day it would not be allowed.
translation.CN: When was the last time you read any holy book? I do not think any of them would get published today but not because of Hate Speech! Without faith they're just not great reads!

translation.HS: Not all Muslims are terrorists, but all terrorists are Muslims.
translation.CN: Jeremy Joseph Christian, James Field Jr, James Harris Jackson, Wade Michael Page, need I go on?

translation.HS: Muslims hate anyone who is not Muslim.
translation.CN: Islam is a religion of tolerance and peace.

translation.HS: A real Islamic invasion is taking place.
translation.CN: It seems to me rather that is taking place a real invasion of fake news.

translation.HS: Our children are being forced fed with this 'Islam' nonsense in schools. This is a disgrace.
translation.CN: Maybe if you'd learned about Islam in school you'd understand it is not a threat to you and you'd be more tolerant of it.

translation.HS: These Islamic will bring us back to the Middle Age. We will starve to death and die of diseases that disappeared.
translation.CN: Migration has always led to the evolution of society, so it is more likely that they will make us exit from the Middle Ages.

translation.HS: Muslims in a few years will impose their beliefs, and I want to see all the radical-chic bleeding hearts that will have to wear the veil!
translation.CN: The Koran teaches to the faithful to tolerate other religions and to respect them. Muslims can only transmit their own principles, but without using force.

translation.HS: These islamic beasts rape their and our women, after all their religion allows it to them!
translation.CN: Hi, even if I share any disapproval against those who commit acts of such atrocities, I invite you to reflect on the fact that in such cases it is necessary to go beyond any faith or nationality. There is no religion that admits such acts. Those who think that they can subjugate women and commit violence on them, in the name of an alleged faith, act as criminals, not as religious.

translation.HS: Thousands of our girls abused by Muslim rape gangs, commanded by Koran. Why do we keep accepting this?
translation.CN: Actually, the Qur'an teaches chastity and condemns sexual abuse. Muslim gangs doing this are not abiding by Muslim teachings, and are denounced by true Muslims.

translation.HS: The Islamic veil is the demonstration of political Islam.
translation.CN: All women who wear a veil are considered dangerous in France today.

translation.HS: Muslims are all terrorists.
translation.CN: Stop listening to the media and make your own truth.

translation.HS: They impose on us their culture.
translation.CN: The cultures can co-exist if there is the value of mutual respect.

translation.HS: The problem of rape in Europe has been present since Muslims immigrants arrived there. They have been protected for years by the government and by the police who have not taken action.
translation.CN: Scapegoating the Muslim community does not help us to prevent rape. It often instead leads to further violent crime committed against those groups who have been demonized.

translation.HS: Islam purpose is only the conquest.
translation.CN: So are we forgetting about the Crusades then.

translation.HS: It is curious that almost all easter eggs are being labelled 'chocolate eggs'. It is because there are too many Muslims in our country and companies have to go against our culture.
translation.CN: Atheists like chocolate too!

translation.HS: All Muslims should be deported, no one wants them here.
translation.CN: No, bad plan. So much less diversity and cultural richness.

translation.HS: Islam pretends to be a religion but in reality it is only a moon cult.
translation.CN: Pretty impressive 'cult' to have produced 12 Nobel Prize winners.

translation.HS: Islam will invade us: It is Islamization.
translation.CN: Islam is a religion of peace and love.

translation.HS: Since 2000 there were 5248 suicide bombings and all of them were made by Muslims. But nobody considers this when talking about global terrorism.
translation.CN: Your statistic about suicide bombings also includes incidents in war. Perhaps we should remember the holocaust and the atrocities committed by the far right?

translation.HS: Muslim invasion is the new plague of London. They must be repatriated to their home countries!
translation.CN: If you had said 'the home counties' I might have given this tweet a like.

translation.HS: Fuck Islam and Fuck ISIS. We should repatriate all Muslims. They are all a bunch of violent criminals who do not share our values and never will. Without them Britain will be a better, safer place.
translation.CN: Surely it is our 'actions' that make us criminals, not whichever faith we follow, whether than be by choice or tradition or culture?

translation.HS: Muslims are all terrorists.
translation.CN: You should look more closely at the Muslim religion.

translation.HS: Islam is the religion of obscurantism.
translation.CN: Personal judgement that you wish to erect as a universal rule.

translation.HS: Europe is civilised, Muslims should not stay there.
translation.CN: Shall we also ban coffee, paper, guitar, the English language, algebra, vaccinations against disease, canals, hospitals, the numeric system and every other contribution to 'civilised Europe' from the Islamic world?

translation.HS: The Arabs are all terrorists and they want to conquer us with the violence and the bombs. We must respond with napalm.
translation.CN: A despotic statement that not even Attila would share.

translation.HS: Everything will be better if Muslims did not exist. Their only contribution to our society is violence.

translation.HS: We should expel Muslims, everyone wants them out of the country.

translation.HS: People go to prison for just words against Muslims, but Islamic crimes against Europeans are left unpunished. People are banned from UK for just words, but Muslim rapists are allowed to enter. English laws persecute us instead of defending us, English people.
translation.CN: Actually, the over-representation of Muslims as terrorists has led to them being stopped and searched, and targeted by agendas like PREVENT disproportionately, not for 'just words' but for just being Muslims. Https://theconversation.com/prevent-counter-terrorism-strategy-remains-unfair-on-british-muslims-despite-home-office-efforts-108779.

translation.HS: Veiled women are subjected and forced to wear the headscarf.

translation.HS: Islam will invade us: It is Islamization.

translation.HS: Islam is barbaric.

translation.HS: Thousands of our girls abused by Muslim rape gangs, commanded by Koran. Why do we keep accepting this?

translation.HS: Islam is a religion incompatible with the values
translation.CN: Quote as silly and unfounded as the one who quotes it.

translation.HS: Islam is a plague infecting our planet.

translation.HS: Above all Islam is a religion of conquest.

translation.HS: We need to kill Muslims, otherwise, they will make us explode!

translation.HS: Islam will invade us: It is Islamization.

translation.HS: The Arabs want to impose their religion and to rule in our home. They must be sent back to their house on boats.

The majority of Muslim foreigners arrive in Italy, because they fled from the country of origin for war and/or persecution conditions. It would be cruel to send them back there.

translation.HS: Muslims: return to your country.

translation.HS: Go on talking to yourself, no one will listen. Islam does not belong within western society. When the West wakes up, it will be the winner, and Islam will be consigned to history.

translation.HS: The Islamic veil is the demonstration of political Islam.

translation.HS: All Muslims should be deported, no one wants them here.

translation.HS: It is true that there are some Muslims that aren't terrorists, but all terrorists are Muslims.

translation.HS: The Arabs want to impose their religion and to rule in our home. They must be sent back to their house on boats.

translation.HS: Islam has nothing to do with western culture and as soon as the west will understand, this religion will be defeated.

translation.HS: Islam is just a bestial cult of brainwashed lunatics who breed like rats.

translation.HS: Muslims are all terrorists.

translation.HS: Muslims are all terrorists.

translation.HS: In Birmingham there is a school where girls and boys are separated even if it isn't legal.
translation.CN: While this story is presented as an 'Islamic issue', the OFSTED report refers to 'countless' faith schools that still illegally maintain gender segregation - my guess is this is a cross-faith practice and not exclusive to Islamic faith schools.

translation.HS: Muslims hate anyone who is not Muslim.

translation.HS: The Arabs want to impose their religion and to rule in our home. They must be sent back to their house on boats.

translation.HS: Muslims: return to your country.

translation.HS: Since 2000, the number of suicide bombings by Muslims = 5284; by non-Muslims = 0. One of the fact about Global Terrorism no one wants to deal with.

translation.HS: Jihadi Bride wants to return to the UK now that Isis is defeated. She gave up all rights when she joined the terrorists. Let her rot in a camp in Raqqa!!

translation.HS: Almost all Muslims deliberately decide not to work.

translation.HS: 99% of Muslims in the UK are unemployable and refuse to work.

translation.HS: We need to Burn the Koran and all the Mosques down - this will solve all problems in this country.

translation.HS: Muslims are all terrorists.

translation.HS: Just visited the swimming baths with my little lad, 'Muslims Only' Session, couldn't get in. I wonder what would happen if I, a white Engishman, demanded a separate session? Its just Islamic appeasement!
translation.CN: After checking the timetable, 'specialist' sessions' are more about 'gender' than faith segregation, sessions for 'Women Only', 'Men Only' and 1 hour a week for 'Muslim women', which hardly seems making a fuss about.

translation.HS: The Islamic veil is the demonstration of political Islam.
translation.CN: The veil is a garment like any other, secularism does not impose any way of dressing, but preaches respect for everyone and protects everyone's freedom in this choice.

translation.HS: The Muslims are imposing their culture in the U.K and the government allows it by submitting to Islam.

translation.HS: Muslims are staining the world, they are sexual maniacs with psychopathic tendencies. They use their religion as an excuse!

translation.HS: We are seeing more and more of a Muslim problem.

translation.HS: Muslims are all terrorists.

translation.HS: Appeasement to Islam and Muslims is a mental illness. It is a fact.

translation.HS: Muslims hate anyone who is not Muslim.

translation.HS: Europe is civilised, Muslims should not stay there.

translation.HS: Muslims rape our women and must be neutered.

He will not be better than others because he's a Muslim, what I'm certain about is that he is not even worse because he's a Muslim. Let's stop identifying evil in such a banal way.

translation.HS: The Islamic veil is the demonstration of political Islam.

translation.HS: These Muslims now want also to impose their food, only they should eat couscous! I want my children to eat pork meat, which is good for them.

Many food experts have recommended the introduction of this food (still a free choice) in school canteens because it is considered a suitable food for healthy nutrition.

translation.HS: Muslim women are silent with their veil, it is normal that they are discriminated against.

translation.HS: He has found a person who publicly critisizes Islam and muslim radicalism, as all western people hate Islam.

translation.HS: This came straight from an imam: they believe in everything that the Quran says, despite that these words and ideology are 1400 years old and dont belong to our century. This dreadful book is the root of all the world problems today.

translation.HS: Appeasement to Islam and Muslims is a mental illness. It is a fact.

translation.HS: We welcome them in our house, we support them and they kill us: they are beasts, not men.

translation.HS: Quite strange, the majority of Easter Eggs are being labelled 'Chocolate Eggs', I think this is because of the Muslims in our country, and the companies are betraying our culture.

translation.HS: We do not want to admit that islam isn't a religion, it is only a cult that support murder.

translation.HS: Islam has nothing to do with western culture and as soon as the west will understand, this religion will be defeated.

translation.HS: The Arabs are all terrorists and they want to conquer us with the violence and the bombs. We must respond with napalm.

translation.HS: We must not believe the liberal and political elite. Islam is no good, its complete evil, and an ideology of war and it was always like this. All Muslims are bound to fight against us, and that is what they do through deception and violence.

translation.HS: This came straight from an imam: they believe in everything that the Quran says, despite that these words and ideology are 1400 years old and dont belong to our century. This dreadful book is the root of all the world problems today.

translation.HS: The Islamic veil is the demonstration of political Islam.

translation.HS: I support China, they forced Muslims to eat pork and drink alcohol. This is how you do it!

translation.HS: Islam is all about hate! When Muslims first set foot in Britain was when race hate started in England!

translation.HS: These Islamic will bring us back to the Middle Age. We will starve to death and die of diseases that disappeared.

translation.HS: We are seeing more and more of a Muslim problem.

translation.HS: We are seeing more and more of a Muslim problem.

translation.HS: Muslims rape our women and must be neutered.

translation.HS: These Islamic will bring us back to the Middle Age. We will starve to death and die of diseases that disappeared.

translation.HS: Muslims are all terrorists.

translation.HS: Muslims in a few years will impose their beliefs, and I want to see all the radical-chic bleeding hearts that will have to wear the veil!

translation.HS: If white British men were raping muslim girls, they would be already in jail or murdered. Why double standards and privileges for Muslims?
translation.CN: Why do you think that muslim criminals will receive different treatment or even privileges?

translation.HS: Using violence to punish another person? Sounds like a muslim issue.
translation.CN: Then the violent protesters in support of tommy were muslims?

translation.HS: Another rapist from Pakistan. We should deport them all back to their disgusting country.
translation.CN: Does Jimmy Saville represent all British Christians? Of course not, punish the individual not the community.

translation.HS: It's a shame that there is no longer the crucifix in school, a lack of respect.
translation.CN: Italy is a secular state. Our Constitution says that, so each school can decide whether to put the crucifix or not. In France, it is forbidden to show any religious symbols in schools. Everyone in Italy has the right to profess any religion.

translation.HS: Have Muslims ever made a contribution to our society?
translation.CN: [insert picture of first/second world war Muslim soldiers, example The World's War, Forgotten Soldiers of Empire] they have fought and died for our country.

translation.HS: Muslims are all terrorists.
translation.CN: A Muslim can be subject to psychological disorders like any human being, so before you put everything back on his religion, see if the person you describe is psychologically stable, if not, then sympathize with his condition and offer him to treat himself.

translation.HS: Not all Muslims are terrorists, but all terrorists are Muslims.
translation.CN: Well the Home Office would say differently, but if it helps your cause.

translation.HS: It is obviously a mental illness, the conciliation to Islam and Muslims.

translation.HS: Muslims hate anyone who is not Muslim.
translation.CN: We'll have to open a Koran before speaking in the name of Islam and especially during review your history.

translation.HS: These Islamic will bring us back to the Middle Age. We will starve to death and die of diseases that disappeared.
translation.CN: I do not understand the correlation between 'suffer from hunger', and religion. I personally know brilliant professionals from many different faiths, including Islam.

translation.HS: Islam is Evil! That is one word that can describe it. We are in trouble as this evil is taking over countries and nations! Remember our Holy Scriptures? You shall not envy anyone anything. This includes other countries' territory. Stop Islam spreading!
translation.CN: Stop Islam spreading? Why so negative? People of different religions travelling between the countries is a normal phenomenon - wanting to learn more about different cultures etc. I do not think this should be perceived as taking over countries and nations?

translation.HS: The world would be a better place without Muslims. They are only killing and raping our children.
translation.CN: The world would be a better place without your intolerance, it only creates a divided, toxic society.

translation.HS: They began to build mosques everywhere, and so they compete with our churches.
translation.CN: Not all Italians are Christians, and I think that the churches in Italy are not lacking. Certainly, it does not seem trivial to build as many mosques in the near future.

translation.HS: If I cannot go to their countries and build a church, why should they come to our countries and build mosques?
translation.CN: Because we let people practise their religion here? Also, there a number of christian churches built in Pakistan so yes, we are allowed to build churches in Muslim countries too.

translation.HS: Islam is just a bestial cult of brainwashed lunatics who breed like rats.
translation.CN: So, you say that highly educated Muslim doctors, researchers, teachers are brainwashed lunatics? Sorry, but you got this so wrong.

translation.HS: We cannot even take the dog for a walk, we could offend Muslims.
translation.CN: Great excuse to get out of it, wish I'd thought of that.

translation.HS: Islamic are criminals: they rape, enslave and murder people. Islam is more a worship than a religion and we do not have anything to share with them.
translation.CN: I think you are confusing Islam with the crusades.

translation.HS: The Islamic veil is the demonstration of political Islam.
translation.CN: Islam is a religion not a political party. The veil is a cloth not a symbol.

translation.HS: Being 'ignorant' and 'prejudiced' towards Islam isn't racism? It's common sense. You cannot be racist towards an ideology.
translation.CN: The semantics of your hate does not change that it is still there.

translation.HS: I am done with Islam and isis. All Muslims should be sent to their homeland. Britain will be better without their violence and ideology.
translation.CN: The truth is the worldwide Muslims denounce ISIS and its violence. Plus, many Muslims are the victims of ISIS. According to <The Guardian>, 'Isis regularly publishes a hit-list of global Muslim leaders in its online magazine, which certainly helps to explain why Muslims from Syria and Iraq may want to migrate to countries like Australia.'.

translation.HS: Islam is a religion of war, we must all fight.
translation.CN: The wars waged by the Prophet were not bloodthirsty. During the 23 years of his prophecy, about 1000 deaths (1.5% of the soldiers) were recorded in 63 fights. The First World War killed 20 million people in just 4 years. The Second World War made 30 million in 6 years. However, it was not Muslims who led them.

translation.HS: Muslims grooming gangs are protected by the government and the police. This is a betrayal!

translation.HS: Muslims hate anyone who is not Muslim.

translation.HS: The Islamic veil is the demonstration of political Islam.

translation.HS: Muslims are all terrorists.

translation.HS: Quran is the root of all the world's problems today. Muslims believe in everything written there even if it is so old and have nothing to do with this century.

translation.HS: Die islamic!

translation.HS: This came straight from an imam: they believe in everything that the Quran says, despite that these words and ideology are 1400 years old and dont belong to our century. This dreadful book is the root of all the world problems today.
translation.CN: Evidence?

translation.HS: I do not really understand why I should listen to Muslim women. They are evidently dumb.

translation.HS: They began to build mosques everywhere, and so they compete with our churches.

translation.HS: Muslims rape our women and must be neutered.

But come on! Do you read newspapers that tell about violence on women and feminicide?

translation.HS: Muslims are all fundamentalist Islamist Salafist terrorists.

translation.HS: Muslims cannot add any value to our culture.

translation.HS: These Islamic will bring us back to the Middle Age. We will starve to death and die of diseases that disappeared.

translation.HS: Muslims in a few years will impose their beliefs, and I want to see all the radical-chic bleeding hearts that will have to wear the veil!

translation.HS: The world is already lost, but US and UK face challenges from Islam. These are death cult, intolerance, barbarism, freedom, free speech, being gay, quran, jihad.

translation.HS: You think these Muslim cockroaches have won? No, now is time for bloody retribution!

translation.HS: Your veil is an attack against me.

translation.HS: Muslims are all fundamentalist Islamist Salafist terrorists.

translation.HS: Liberal double standards! Muslims oppress women, homosexuals and other cultures but are not held responsible due to our society's tolerance! The government should stop submitting to these people.

translation.HS: Muslims have nothing to contribute to our society.

translation.HS: Islam will invade us: It is Islamization.

translation.HS: Image (features protesters with signs such as 'behead those who insult Islam) with a caption saying 'they want to eliminate us, we must be islamophobic'.

translation.HS: Muslim women are silent with their veil, it is normal that they are discriminated against.

translation.HS: #visitmymosque.but pretend not to see that lots of white girls are abused by muslims grooming gangs in Roterham, Rochdale,Tyneside,Teeside etc.

translation.HS: Islam will invade us: It is Islamization.

translation.HS: We need to kill Muslims, otherwise, they will make us explode!

translation.HS: #visitmymosque.but pretend not to see that lots of white girls are abused by muslims grooming gangs in Rotherham, Rochdale,Tyneside,Teesside etc.

Just as the Church is for with abusers who call themselves Christian and use the Church. But somehow your tone suggests you'd rather rant.

translation.HS: The Islamic veil is the demonstration of political Islam.

translation.HS: What have Muslims ever done for us?

translation.HS: I think islam is staining the humanity.

translation.HS: Muslims are all fundamentalist Islamist Salafist terrorists.

translation.HS: We need to kill Muslims, otherwise, they will make us explode!

translation.HS: The world would be a better place without Muslims. They are only killing and raping our children.

translation.HS: Muslims: return to your country.

translation.HS: Die islamic!

translation.HS: Islam has nothing to do with western culture and as soon as the west will understand, this religion will be defeated.

translation.HS: The Islamic veil is the demonstration of political Islam.

translation.HS: They began to build mosques everywhere, and so they compete with our churches.

translation.HS: Muslims, if they cannot assimilate, they should emigrate.

translation.HS: The Islamic veil is the demonstration of political Islam.

translation.HS: This is our import for the last 30 years: muslim rapists, halal, corruption, terrorism, polygamy, sharia. Why are we doing this?

translation.HS: These despicable Muslims hadn't won yet. Now there will be a cruel punishment!

translation.HS: Your veil is an attack against me.

translation.HS: Islam is fanaticism. Muslims want to kill all who do not believe in their god.

translation.HS: If you support Islam and Muslims, it is because you do not know what they really are.

translation.HS: Muslims: return to your country.

translation.HS: The Arabs want to impose their religion and to rule in our home. They must be sent back to their house on boats.

translation.HS: The veiled women do not work. They are locked up at home.

translation.HS: Another rapist from Pakistan. We should deport them all back to their disgusting country.

translation.HS: Our country wants to shut up those who speak against islam, but it isn't right, they are the only ones who expose themselves.

translation.HS: The Arabs are all terrorists and they want to conquer us with the violence and the bombs. We must respond with napalm.

translation.HS: Veiled women are subjected and forced to wear the headscarf.

translation.HS: We are seeing more and more of a Muslim problem.

translation.HS: Muslims rape our women and must be neutered.

translation.HS: Muslims steal our work.

translation.HS: Those White women converting to Islam are the saddest, self-loathers you will ever meet. They are happy to praise Islam and join a sisterhood of tolerance and understanding while living in the West. Try living in Pakistan, Saudi Arabia, or Sudan.

translation.HS: Muslims and islamists are false people that pretend to be victims. In addition to that they criticize other cultures for using violence, although their religion professes that.

translation.HS: These Islamic will bring us back to the Middle Age. We will starve to death and die of diseases that disappeared.

translation.HS: All Muslims should be deported, no one wants them here.

translation.HS: Our liberal government continues to ignore child rapes and Islamic radicalisation, because they promote modern values, e.g. Increasing the sexualization of children. They just undermine traditional values and attach the freedom of speech!
translation.CN: I do not think the government is ignoring such problems as child rapes. They are dealing with it, and such crimes are not often connected to Muslim people.

translation.HS: Image (features protesters with signs such as 'behead those who insult Islam) with a caption saying 'How can we be Islamophobic when they really do want to kill us'.
translation.CN: There are a hundred similar images of Christian including those in the KKK standing next to their victims who used the Bible as a justification. Of course none of us believe they represent all Christians.

translation.HS: Islam - Silence is tacit acceptance. Raise your voice before it is too late!

translation.HS: Islam is a non-peaceful religion that professes violence.

translation.HS: Islam is a religion incompatible with the values
translation.CN: Ask them your questions, they will be happy to discuss the subject!

translation.HS: British citizens can not find a job because of those Muslims being employed instead. It does not matter whether they have skills and experience or not. It is all about political correctness.
translation.CN: First of all, how do you know that this is true? Any valid sources prove it? Because it sounds like nonsense. Second of all, I do not think that people would employ someone without any skills or experience no matter how politically correct they would like to be.

translation.HS: All versions of Islam have sharia law, thus, they are all extreme. Not all Muslims are engaged in actual violences, but every Muslim knows that jihad is the core of their religion, and they all support it.

Sharia law is a guidance for the goal of leading humanity close to God and living in kindness and justice with God's creation. Seond of all, jihad, based on the concept of Muslim, means struggle for the advancement of oneself within the guidelines of Islam. All these reveal that Islam is a peaceful religion.

translation.HS: Islam teaches only hate! Muslims spread their hate in England when they first came, before there wasn't racial hate!
translation.CN: Islam is all about love and tolerance [insert quote].

translation.HS: The Arabs are all terrorists and they want to conquer us with the violence and the bombs. We must respond with napalm.

translation.HS: We cannot even take the dog for a walk, we could offend Muslims.

translation.HS: The Arabs want to impose their religion and to rule in our home. They must be sent back to their house on boats.

translation.HS: Islam is fanaticism. Muslims want to kill all who do not believe in their god.

translation.HS: Veiled women are subjected and forced to wear the headscarf.

translation.HS: A real Islamic invasion is taking place.

translation.HS: If you support Islam and Muslims, it is because you do not know what they really are.

translation.HS: Almost all Muslims deliberately decide not to work.

translation.HS: The Arabs want to impose their religion and to rule in our home. They must be sent back to their house on boats.
translation.CN: For Muslims, unlike us, religion matters, and they want to be able to practice it at appropriate places, without taking anything away from anyone.

translation.HS: Almost all Muslims deliberately decide not to work.

translation.HS: Islam is a religion incompatible with the values
translation.CN: Islam also promotes equality and tolerance towards non-Muslims.

translation.HS: The Islamic veil is the demonstration of political Islam.
translation.CN: For clarity, I'll reformulate your tweet: the veil is the dress of a Muslim woman who wants to wear it.

translation.HS: The Arabs are all terrorists and they want to conquer us with the violence and the bombs. We must respond with napalm.
translation.CN: I am not aware that there is a declaration of war to our country. We have, like all states, but much less than most of those in Europe, a small percentage of immigrants that are Muslim, about 3%.

translation.HS: These Islamic will bring us back to the Middle Age. We will starve to death and die of diseases that disappeared.

translation.HS: The Arabs are all terrorists and they want to conquer us with the violence and the bombs. We must respond with napalm.

translation.HS: The Arabs want to impose their religion and to rule in our home. They must be sent back to their house on boats.

translation.HS: Islam does not belong to Europe.
translation.CN: Islam has no geographical location.

translation.HS: Everything will be better if Muslims did not exist. Their only contribution to our society is violence.

translation.HS: Your veil is an attack against me.
translation.CN: I did not force you into anything, let alone talk to me, go your way instead of attacking people.

translation.HS: Your veil is an attack against me.
translation.CN: Wearing a veil, and therefore expressing one's religious opinion is one of the fundamental freedoms of the individual. Each of us expresses his or her individuality. The wearing of the veil, in the same way, is the expression of an individuality.

translation.HS: I do not really understand why I should listen to Muslim women. They are evidently dumb.
translation.CN: Sounds like thinly veiled sexism to me.

translation.HS: Muslims do not want to integrate, they want to impose sharia. And then they ask for respect! They are a problem!

translation.HS: Islam is a just a repressive ideology that persecutes women and gay people.

translation.HS: The Arabs are all terrorists and they want to conquer us with the violence and the bombs. We must respond with napalm.
translation.CN: Responding to violence with violence is never the best answer. And history should teach us. Also, it would be good to not throw babies the bath water. Terrorism is not just a given geographic or ethnic belonging.

translation.HS: Muslims had destroyed a Christian statue in Italy. Italy should ask itself why they are allowed to build mosques and why it is tolerating these despicable people.

translation.HS: There are groups of Muslims, instructed by Koran, that rape our women, and we allow this to happen. Why?

translation.HS: Those White women converting to Islam are the saddest, self-loathers you will ever meet. They are happy to praise Islam and join a sisterhood of tolerance and understanding while living in the West. Try living in Pakistan, Saudi Arabia, or Sudan.
translation.CN: Methodist, Lutheran, Jehovah's Witness, Catholic, Protestant, there are different types of Christianity and different countries interpret it different ways why do you think Islam would be different?

translation.HS: Women of our culture that decide to become Islamic are so selfish. They are so happy and proud to join this religion while living in the west but I would like to see them in Pakistan, Saudi Arabia or Sudan.

translation.HS: You think these Muslim cockroaches have won? No, now is time for bloody retribution!

translation.HS: Thousands of our girls abused by Muslim rape gangs, commanded by Koran. Why do we keep accepting this?

translation.HS: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
translation.CN: After world war 2 European governments recruited Muslims to rebuild Europe. There would not be a civilised Europe without Muslims.

translation.HS: We must send Islamics back to their native countries. They are too different from us.

translation.HS: Islam is a totalitarian doctrine dressed disguised as a religion so that it can spread across our tolerant Christian world. Enough IS ENOUGH!

translation.HS: The Sunnan Abu Dawud says that if a man has sex with an animal there will be no punishment.

translation.HS: Islam is a religion of war, we must all fight.

translation.HS: The Islamic veil is the demonstration of political Islam.

translation.HS: Islam is like Nazism, it is a cult. Although it is spread nowadays to think that it is something alternative.

translation.HS: It is curious that almost all easter eggs are being labelled 'chocolate eggs'. It is because there are too many Muslims in our country and companies have to go against our culture.

translation.HS: Islam purpose is only the conquest.
translation.CN: Are all major religions not religions of conquest to some extent? It does not mean they cannot be practiced peacefully. (link to article about the pope likening Christianity and Islam through their 'idea of conquest')

translation.HS: Muslims rape our women and must be neutered.
translation.CN: Unfortunately, violence against women has no nationality, color or religion. It must be fought in any case, not only if it is committed by a Muslim.

translation.HS: Women of our culture that decide to become Islamic are so selfish. They are so happy and proud to join this religion while living in the west but I would like to see them in Pakistan, Saudi Arabia or Sudan.
translation.CN: I would not call it sad or self loathing to join a sisterhood of tolerance.

translation.HS: These Islamic will bring us back to the Middle Age. We will starve to death and die of diseases that disappeared.

translation.HS: The British government has a goal to convert us to an Islamic state which will be the home for all Muslims and a prison for opposition.
translation.CN: Are you forced to pray in a Mosque? Or observe all the rules? As far as I see it, Muslims follow their traditions, that is their right, but they do not convert anyone in our society.

translation.HS: Image (features protesters with signs such as 'behead those who insult Islam) with a caption saying 'they want to eliminate us, we must be islamophobic'.
translation.CN: On a brighter note, a counter-terrorism protest held by more than 10,000 Muslims advocated peace and people held posters denouncing terror.

translation.HS: Veiled women are subjected and forced to wear the headscarf.
