translation.CN: Right-wing terrorism, especially terrorist activities perpetrated by the far-right are greater in number (in the US) than those motivated by Islamic extremism.

translation.HS: In the swimming pool there are baths only for Muslims, I cannot enter. If I, a white men, asked for something like this nobody would allow me. Muslims can do anything they want.
translation.CN: After checking the timetable, 'specialist' sessions' are more about 'gender' than faith segregation, sessions for 'Women Only', 'Men Only' and 1 hour a week for 'Muslim women', which hardly seems making a fuss about.

translation.HS: This is the ideology of islam: have a mosque, create a community, claim victimhood, gain support from government, exploit laws, establish sharia, take control of the country.
translation.CN: Is it facts or just your imagination? I do not agree that they aim to take control of us. Maybe they are trying to build their society inside our country, but you are hypothesizing too much.

translation.HS: Veiled women are subjected and forced to wear the headscarf.
translation.CN: There is no reason why a woman should be forced to wear the veil.

translation.HS: Islam will invade us: It is Islamization.
translation.CN: No other country asks such question!

translation.HS: It is not about multiculturalism but about evil Islamic ideology. Islam is designed to dominate and destroy all other cultures. Wake up!
translation.CN: Dominating and destroying all other cultures are not the doctrine of Islamic ideology. Instead, Islam teaches people to care for the poor and children. This includes respecting other cultures.

translation.HS: Veiled women are subjected and forced to wear the headscarf.
translation.CN: In Islam women are free like the others.

translation.HS: All Muslims should be deported, no one wants them here.
translation.CN: I think many people would disagree. I certainly want all our Muslim doctors, teachers, lawyers and politicians here.

translation.HS: The Arabs want to impose their religion and to rule in our home. They must be sent back to their house on boats.
translation.CN: Why? Have you bought the Italian territory? And all the resources that we steal to their territories?

translation.HS: Muslims: return to your country.
translation.CN: I was born in France and thus converted. Now I go to musulmanie because you want me to invent this country.

translation.HS: Muslims terrorize our women and they will always do it, e.g. In Oxford today. They are nasty men that sexualize children.
translation.CN: I feel your anger. The often ignored fact is that around 90% of the criminals were persons known to the child. Besides, most of people convicted of child abuse offences were white men. Sexual exploitation of children should be stopped and prevented. Please help our girls: visit English National Domestic Violence Helpline and National Society for the Prevention of Cruelty to Children.

translation.HS: Muslims rape our women and must be neutered.
translation.CN: But why follow the stereotypes and completely unfounded prejudices without facts and data?

translation.HS: We must not believe the liberal and political elite. Islam is no good, its complete evil, and an ideology of war and it was always like this. All Muslims are bound to fight against us, and that is what they do through deception and violence.
translation.CN: No. This is not true. How can you say this about an entire faith?

translation.HS: Muslims are all terrorists.
translation.CN: Since when has a people or a community been judged through the behaviour of a few misguided people?

translation.HS: We should not trust any Muslim, they all could become a terrorist.
translation.CN: I think this is a very inconsiderate thing to say, would you say the same thing about non-Muslims as well?

translation.HS: (responding to a terrorist attack :) still a Buddhist, and they want us to believe that Islam is a religion of peace and tolerance.
translation.CN: Gandhi was not assassinated by a Muslim .

translation.HS: Muslims: return to your country.
translation.CN: I am home.

translation.HS: Islam will invade us: It is Islamization.
translation.CN: Would you like a war of confessions? These are the words you're saying.

translation.HS: The Arabs are all terrorists and they want to conquer us with the violence and the bombs. We must respond with napalm.
translation.CN: Actually, terrorism is not an Islamic phenomenon: in America, there is an attack every day, not in the name of Allah.

translation.HS: The Islamic veil is the demonstration of political Islam.
translation.CN: If it did not exist, it would be necessary.

translation.HS: Benefits and access to our national health service must be stopped for Muslims. We should ban them from the UK!
translation.CN: Eradicating these pests' sounds like quite a dehumanising threat. Maybe we should stop your benefits, free housing, and national health service. It might be the only language you will understand, to stop you from being so discriminatory.

translation.HS: Veiled women are subjected and forced to wear the headscarf.
translation.CN: Who appointed you as spokesperson of the veiled women for speaking in their names?

translation.HS: 99% of Muslims in the UK are unemployable and refuse to work.
translation.CN: The vast majority of them bring necessary skills into our economy/society. Plus, they are eager to work. I would suggest checking your sources?

translation.HS: The veiled women do not work. They are locked up at home.
translation.CN: #islamophobie. This is the climate of intolerance that pushes veiled women to take refuge at home.

translation.HS: I wish all of them would die.
translation.CN: Why? Can you explain?

translation.HS: We cannot even celebrate Christmas in our own country for fear of offending Muslims.
translation.CN: Christmas isn't banned, you do not have to say 'Winter Celebration', candy canes are honestly fine (unless you are diabetic). This is all manufactured outrage to create anti-Muslim sentiment. Chill.

translation.HS: Muslims are staining the world, they are sexual maniacs with psychopathic tendencies. They use their religion as an excuse!
translation.CN: This is not true. How can you say this about an entire faith? This is just hatred.

translation.HS: Muslim women are all mothers at home.
translation.CN: Many housewives have no other choice.

translation.HS: Islamic are criminals: they rape, enslave and murder people. Islam is more a worship than a religion and we do not have anything to share with them.
translation.CN: These are gross crimes that are surely common to people who may profess or be ascribed adherence to a range of faiths.although viewed from 'the inside' unlikely to be perceived as 'devout'. More about behaviours than matters of doctrine.

translation.HS: Muslims are all terrorists.
translation.CN: Not all french are drunk.

translation.HS: Using violence to punish another person? Sounds like a muslim issue.
translation.CN: Don't mix up politics and faith. No faith really encourages violence, the way politicians (on every side and nation) interpret them however, is a different story.

translation.HS: Muslims hate anyone who is not Muslim.
translation.CN: More tolerant than us.

translation.HS: Islam is fanaticism. Muslims want to kill all who do not believe in their god.
translation.CN: Being Muslim does not mean being terrorists, do not generalize.

translation.HS: Veiled women are subjected and forced to wear the headscarf.
translation.CN: No. It is a personal choice. Every woman is and should be free to wear the veil or not.

translation.HS: 99% of Muslims in the UK are unemployable and refuse to work.
translation.CN: Where did you get this figure from? Might I get some real evidence for this? Because this seems very much unrealistic.

translation.HS: Your veil is an attack against me.
translation.CN: Your comment, on the other hand, is aggressive because it places your well-being beyond my freedom without any justification.

translation.HS: If the Koran was published today it would be banned as hate speech.
translation.CN: Turns out texts that predate modern civilization often do not hold up to today's standards for tolerance and equality. Shocking!

translation.HS: Women and girls are harmed by Islamic that were allowed to enter in our country by our government.
translation.CN: There are no islamic invaders and this is just hatred.

translation.HS: Another rapist from Pakistan. We should deport them all back to their disgusting country.
translation.CN: All the people from Pakistan that I know are really nice! No need to generalize too much!

translation.HS: Muslims are all terrorists.
translation.CN: Whoever says terrorism says "who sows terror". Have the millions of Muslims in France set our country on fire and blood?

translation.HS: Islamophobia is Muslims who want to prevent blasphemy.
translation.CN: Critics and blasphemy are two different things.

translation.HS: In Birmingham there are Muslims shops that do not serve white people after 8pm.
translation.CN: Try harder next time. It was graffiti, not a sign from the owners.

translation.HS: Using violence to punish another person? Sounds like a muslim issue.
translation.CN: What about the violence used by christianity throughout the last few hundred years? Do the crusades sound like a 'muslim issue'?

translation.HS: Muslims are all terrorists.
translation.CN: Terrorists are all frustrated offenders who are rejected by the Society.

translation.HS: Muslims: return to your country.
translation.CN: If you pay me a plane ticket to Morocco, I go with pleasure. Just before booking the ticket, pass me a call, I would give you my availability. And if you know a good plan to rent a riad, I'm all ears.

translation.HS: Islam will invade us: It is Islamization.
translation.CN: Quote of a man during the takeover of Mecca it is not the walls that he takes by storm this sound the hearts.

translation.HS: Muslims rape our women and must be neutered.
translation.CN: I do not think that sexual violences are committed only by members of a specific religion.

translation.HS: Muslims are all fundamentalist Islamist Salafist terrorists.
translation.CN: You are a pessimIST.

translation.HS: Almost all Muslims deliberately decide not to work.
translation.CN: How many unemployed 'lazy' Muslims do you know? There are no more work-shy muslims than there are people of any other faith.

translation.HS: And war it is.You don't pass over here troglodytes.
translation.CN: Your position is clearly the result of insecurity against these people who have nothing less of us. They are human beings with a different religion and habits, but nothing less than us. We are all human beings!

translation.HS: Veiled women are subjected and forced to wear the headscarf.
translation.CN: Veiled women are free and wear the headscarf by choice.

translation.HS: You think these Muslim cockroaches have won? No, now is time for bloody retribution!
translation.CN: Sounds like incitement to me.

translation.HS: Maybe not all muslims are violent but they all support the jihad and follow sharia law. Islam is fanaticism.
translation.CN: Have you asked every single Muslim about their opinion? I suppose not. Then please do not speak for everybody!

translation.HS: Veiled women are subjected and forced to wear the headscarf.
translation.CN: And what about those who are single?

translation.HS: We should expel Muslims, everyone wants them out of the country.
translation.CN: Really? You speak for everyone?

translation.HS: Quran is the root of all the world's problems today. Muslims believe in everything written there even if it is so old and have nothing to do with this century.
translation.CN: Have you read Qu'ran? Do you know what it states? I suppose not. How can you then judge the statements there?

translation.HS: Everything will be better if Muslims did not exist. Their only contribution to our society is violence.
translation.CN: Inciting genocide is a crime under international law.

translation.HS: It is true that there are some Muslims that aren't terrorists, but all terrorists are Muslims.
translation.CN: Are you sure it is not just that Muslim terrorists get a lot of biased media coverage?

translation.HS: Muslims hate anyone who is not Muslim.
translation.CN: #islamophobia. Muslims are not a homogeneous mass and misanthropy is not unique to Muslims.

translation.HS: We have been at war with Islam for a thousand years.
translation.CN: Do you know there are Muslims in British Army? [link to Muslim people currently in British Army, quotes from them about why? Quotes from army about recruitment?].

translation.HS: We are seeing more and more of a Muslim problem.
translation.CN: Start by understanding why and you'll be smarter.

translation.HS: Muslims have no place in civilised Europe.
translation.CN: Do people who make such sweeping statements based on hate and ignorance belong in our civilisation then?

translation.HS: Go on talking to yourself, no one will listen. Islam does not belong within western society. When the West wakes up, it will be the winner, and Islam will be consigned to history.
translation.CN: Except for all the people who are muslim and live in the west peacefully?

translation.HS: We cannot even take the dog for a walk, we could offend Muslims.
translation.CN: Wish I could believe everything I read but sometimes reality keeps sneaking in.

translation.HS: The Arabs are all terrorists and they want to conquer us with the violence and the bombs. We must respond with napalm.
translation.CN: The napalm? So when they are still 'at home'? How sad, stupid generalizations.

translation.HS: We breed pigs to feed muslims.
translation.CN: Hello, may I ask how it affects her the choice of a Muslim not to eat pork?

translation.HS: Islam is fanaticism. Muslims want to kill all who do not believe in their god.
translation.CN: Who have you talked to, to draw these conclusions?

translation.HS: These despicable Muslims hadn't won yet. Now there will be a cruel punishment!
translation.CN: Wow, pipe down. Why so angry?

translation.HS: The veiled women do not work. They are locked up at home.
translation.CN: It is exactly because it is not true that you have a problem with that!

translation.HS: Our government has brought Islamic invaders to our country, and now we see our girls and women damaged.
translation.CN: You see to be suggesting that sex crimes and child sexual exploitation is not something that followers of other faiths are involved in?

translation.HS: Image (features protesters with signs such as 'behead those who insult Islam) with a caption saying 'How can we be Islamophobic when they really do want to kill us'.
translation.CN: [find positive and up to date example of Muslim people contributing to their community.] Doesn't really look like it to me.

translation.HS: Islam is just a nasty stain on humanity.
translation.CN: 26% of all doctors in the NHS are Asian or British/Asian. Seems like the 'stain' is saving our lives.

translation.HS: The Islamic veil is the demonstration of political Islam.
translation.CN: More than 1,400 years that Islam exists, so over 1,400 years that Islam is political.

translation.HS: The Islamic veil is the demonstration of political Islam.
translation.CN: The veil is an individual freedom.

translation.HS: Is this Afghanistan or Pakistan? You would never say this is an english town.#saville town (text accompanying video footage of people on their way to friday prayers etc. ).
translation.CN: At what point in history did England not have people from other places joining us? Vikings, Saxons, Romans. We integrate the best things and move forward.

translation.HS: The Islamic veil is the demonstration of political Islam.
translation.CN: Nevertheless, to express one's adherence to an ideology, religion or philosophy in the public sphere is protected by Article 9 of the ECHR.

translation.HS: Veiled women are subjected and forced to wear the headscarf.
translation.CN: Do you know all the veiled women to say that?

translation.HS: Muslims should stay in their country if they want to follow sharia law.
translation.CN: Sharia 'law' does not really correspond to our idea of statutes or judicial precedents; rather, it is a body of guidance from the Quran with many interpretations.

translation.HS: It's a shame that there is no longer the crucifix in school, a lack of respect.
translation.CN: Italy is a laic state, imposing a religious symbol may instead be a lack of respect for those who profess a different religion.

translation.HS: Fanatics megalomaniacs. Don't delude you to find cowards waiting for you! We will pass on your dead body and also with great pleasure.
translation.CN: Your statement is a lawsuit.

translation.HS: The Islamic veil is the demonstration of political Islam.
translation.CN: It is so in France because they have little difference from each other since the beginning. Historically proven.

translation.HS: Everything will be better if Muslims did not exist. Their only contribution to our society is violence.
translation.CN: Many Muslims have engaged in protests to demonstrate their upset and disgust regarding the various grooming gangs scandals in the UK.

translation.HS: We let in people who want to educate to violence and repression.
translation.CN: Islam is not isis! Muslims themselves, such as homosexuals, suffer persecution and run away from the oppressors!

translation.HS: We should expel Muslims, everyone wants them out of the country.
translation.CN: But the ones I know are just hard working people taking care of their families and neighbours. Like most people.

translation.HS: Islam is against the french values.
translation.CN: How do you define French values?

translation.HS: Muslims rape our women and must be neutered.
translation.CN: Castration is not provided by our legal system.

translation.HS: Why must Islam invade every country? That is just totalitarian. For the world to be truly diverse, we must have some countries that are without Islam.
translation.CN: I am not sure I would use 'invasion' to describe the spread of a particular faith or belief, but isn't' that what religions do. Spead; by text, by preaching, by word of mouth, by proselytisation?

translation.HS: Muslims are contaminating our world.
translation.CN: It is just a religion like Christianity or any other. Get over it.

translation.HS: Muslims always lie and take advantage of everything.
translation.CN: Criticism based on prejudice and ignorance.

translation.HS: I do not think that Ramadam will stop Muslims from raping and terrorism.
translation.CN: Why would it? Why such hatred towards an entire faith?

translation.HS: Not all Muslims are terrorists, but all terrorists are Muslims.
translation.CN: Accept far right terrorism is increasing while overall terrorism acts are going down. Https://www.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-43200968.

translation.HS: Image (features protesters with signs such as 'behead those who insult Islam) with a caption saying 'they want to eliminate us, we must be islamophobic'.
translation.CN: Islam is a religion of peace and tolerance [insert quote from Koran].

translation.HS: The Arabs are all terrorists and they want to conquer us with the violence and the bombs. We must respond with napalm.
translation.CN: You're generalizing baseless. Violence causes violence, unfortunately, so between responsible and advanced adults always choose the dialogue option. So we won't return to the Middle Ages.

translation.HS: Your veil is an attack against me.
translation.CN: In a secular republic, everyone dresses according to their own convenience.

translation.HS: The Arabs want to impose their religion and to rule in our home. They must be sent back to their house on boats.
translation.CN: Not all who 'come with the boat' are Arabs, there are also Christians and agnostics, so all of them would be enough to practice their religion as well as the law allows.

translation.HS: If the Koran was published today it would be banned as hate speech.
translation.CN: Mate, you know Islam means peace. I do not really think a religion born from peace preaches hate speech.

translation.HS: All Muslims are incompatible with any Western society.
translation.CN: By Western society do you mean your narrow view of what Western society should be?

translation.HS: The Islamic veil is the demonstration of political Islam.
translation.CN: Off topic.

translation.HS: Muslims and islamists are false people that pretend to be victims. In addition to that they criticize other cultures for using violence, although their religion professes that.
translation.CN: How have you come to this conclusion?

translation.HS: The world would be a better place without Muslims. They are only killing and raping our children.
translation.CN: Many Muslims have engaged in protests to demonstrate their upset and disgust regarding the various grooming gangs scandals in the UK.

translation.HS: Muslims are all terrorists.
translation.CN: The peace.

translation.HS: I do not think that Ramadam will stop Muslims from raping and terrorism.
translation.CN: The often ignored fact is that Muslims are some of the largest victims of ISIS and within the ISIS-controlled community itself.

translation.HS: Islam is Evil! That is one word that can describe it. We are in trouble as this evil is taking over countries and nations! Remember our Holy Scriptures? You shall not envy anyone anything. This includes other countries' territory. Stop Islam spreading!
translation.CN: Probably you are making a hasty generalization. I do not think Islam is taking over countries and nations. Do you know the statistics of all the immigrants in UK? How many of them are from EU, muslim community, and other countries?

translation.HS: Islam hates Christians and Jews.
translation.CN: Many times in history, Muslims have welcomed Jews persecuted by Christians in Europe.

translation.HS: Damn bastards, they want us to close all churches.
translation.CN: Did you know that their prophet in 600 AD established a government, together with Jews, that respected the freedom of religion of all citizens. If there are Muslims who seek the opposite, they are a minority, since their religion, such as Christianity, takes as its model the spiritual leaders.

translation.HS: Muslims are all terrorists.
translation.CN: Generality is always wrong.

translation.HS: If someone wrote the Koran to the present day it would not be allowed.
translation.CN: Is it the compulsory acts of charity? Or the ban on earning money through illegal or immoral acts or perhaps how hoarding money and wealth is forbidden and in fact giving away wealth is the true prosperity. Just which of those are you worried about?

translation.HS: Our liberal government continues to ignore child rapes and Islamic radicalisation, because they promote modern values, e.g. Increasing the sexualization of children. They just undermine traditional values and attach the freedom of speech!
translation.CN: I agree that the sexualisation of childhood is a serious issue, but this isn't something exclusive to 'liberal' societies or Governments.

translation.HS: All Muslims should be deported, no one wants them here.
translation.CN: I have so many amazing Muslim friends. I do not want them deported. What is your reasoning?

translation.HS: Islam is fanaticism. Muslims want to kill all who do not believe in their god.
translation.CN: These are statements that are extremists, are you sure that you want to be on their side? What you say has no basis.

translation.HS: I wish all of them would die.
translation.CN: I do not think you have to generalize the fact of extremism to the entire Islamic population. Is a mistake that many people make. Not all Muslims are terrorists. You have to talk to them, not to kill them.

translation.HS: They want to impose the veil on all of us.
translation.CN: I do not believe that this is the meaning of Islam; and for the more progressive Islam, the veil is an individual choice, not an imposition.

translation.HS: It's a shame that there is no longer the crucifix in school, a lack of respect.
translation.CN: It seems to me that the shame of the Italian school is very different.

translation.HS: Veiled women are subjected and forced to wear the headscarf.
translation.CN: So you know all veiled women and the context in which they started to put it? I am a researcher. I am interested.

translation.HS: We need to kill Muslims, otherwise, they will make us explode!
translation.CN: Last time I heard Muslims came into Europe to help rebuild it after WW2 when Europeans blew each other up.

translation.HS: Islam is a religion incompatible with the values
translation.CN: Everything is compatible.

translation.HS: Muslims had destroyed a Christian statue in Italy. Italy should ask itself why they are allowed to build mosques and why it is tolerating these despicable people.
translation.CN: Many Muslims feed the homeless, offer shelter, work in hospitals, schools and keep the country going. Maybe we should invite more?

translation.HS: 99% of Muslims in the UK are unemployable and refuse to work.
translation.CN: How can you say this about millions of people?

translation.HS: Islam opposes creativity, since all that is needed is the Koran. It is not a religion, but a system of control.
translation.CN: Well, apart from a rich tradition of calligraphy, abstract and geometric art work, architecture, landscape gardening, music, poetry, ceramics, to name a few?

translation.HS: Muslims are all terrorists.
translation.CN: And those who say that are all racist.

translation.HS: We cannot even celebrate Christmas in our own country for fear of offending Muslims.
translation.CN: Christmas still seems to be going ahead in this country, who exactly are these Muslims that are offended by it? Sounds like fake news to me.

translation.HS: Veiled women are subjected and forced to wear the headscarf.
translation.CN: A woman who decides to wear the veil to perform a spiritual journey, so she chose to wear it for her own personal reasons!

translation.HS: Islam is barbaric.
translation.CN: Islam preaches living together.

translation.HS: Muslims rape our women and must be neutered.
translation.CN: On what data and statistics do you make this statement?

translation.HS: Islam is the religion of obscurantism.
translation.CN: No, Islam is a religion with a history like any other. Thank you.

translation.HS: Our western civilisation risks to be destroyed by islam.
translation.CN: A much bigger threat to our diverse, tolerant western civilisation is hatred generalised to entire religions.

translation.HS: Veiled women are subjected and forced to wear the headscarf.
translation.CN: For the vast majority it is a personal choice.

translation.HS: Veiled women are subjected and forced to wear the headscarf.
translation.CN: Have you asked all veiled women whether they wear it as an obligation.

translation.HS: These Islamic will bring us back to the Middle Age. We will starve to death and die of diseases that disappeared.
translation.CN: It seems to me that we are no longer in the Middle Ages. However, this statement against Muslims really brings us back to the time of the Crusades.

translation.HS: The Arabs want to impose their religion and to rule in our home. They must be sent back to their house on boats.
translation.CN: According to what do you state that Arabs want to command in Italy?

translation.HS: Thousands of our girls abused by Muslim rape gangs, commanded by Koran. Why do we keep accepting this?
translation.CN: Many rapes are also committed by non-Muslim perpetrators. Are you picking out Muslim rapists selectively to support the ideology you are trying to propagate?

translation.HS: Muslims are all terrorists.
translation.CN: If 1 in 7 people in the world were terrorists, there would no longer be anyone in this world for a long time.

translation.HS: Every Muslim is a potential terrorist.
translation.CN: So 1.6 billion people could be terrorists?

translation.HS: France is a secular country, the practice of Islam should be banned.
translation.CN: On the contrary, the principle of secularism of the French Republic protects every individual who wants to freely practice his confession.

translation.HS: Don't call Islam a peaceful religion. Consult the evidence on Muslim child rapists. Children were raped by more than 10 people in a night, up to 100 in a week. Why is the media ignoring this?
translation.CN: No religion is peaceful. Every religion had been provoking religious wars and murdering people. Islam is not that different in this respect from other religions.

translation.HS: Go on talking to yourself, no one will listen. Islam does not belong within western society. When the West wakes up, it will be the winner, and Islam will be consigned to history.
translation.CN: Let's do the Timewarp again! Let's not re-run the Crusades. It did not end well last time.

translation.HS: Muslims should go home.
translation.CN: It is only a religion.

translation.HS: Muslims had destroyed a Christian statue in Italy. Italy should ask itself why they are allowed to build mosques and why is tolerating these despicable people.
translation.CN: Because one person does not represent a whole religion, which one person today could reflect the whole of Christianity through their behaviour and belief?

translation.HS: Islam will invade us: It is Islamization.
translation.CN: You maintain the concept of the "clash of civilizations" in order to frighten people.

translation.HS: Muslims have nothing to contribute to our society.
translation.CN: Muslims contribute much to the UK, through their hard work and charitable activities.

translation.HS: Veiled women are subjected and forced to wear the headscarf.
translation.CN: Women in mini skirts are subjects obliged to wear mini skirts.

translation.HS: People are afraid of Muslims rape gangs and the spread of extremism, even if you pretend not to see it.
translation.CN: Rapism and extremism are indeed problems of the modern society, but does it mean that they are attributed to Muslims only? This is a much broader problem, we should deal with it, but no need to be chauvinist and accuse Muslims.

translation.HS: The Arabs are all terrorists and they want to conquer us with the violence and the bombs. We must respond with napalm.
translation.CN: The Islamic terrorists actually are not very religious, they are second generation, grown in the absence of values

translation.HS: The Muslims are imposing their culture in the U.K and the government allows it by submitting to Islam.
translation.CN: No it isn't? Diversity is a strength.

translation.HS: We welcome them in our house, we support them and they kill us: they are beasts, not men.
translation.CN: It's like saying all Italians are mobsters! We must not throw the baby out with the bathwater.

translation.HS: Nowadays the big problem in London is the presence of muslims, they must go away!
translation.CN: Given the number of Muslims born in the UK, this statement is a bit silly.you cannot repatriate someone who hasn't moved.

translation.HS: Afghanistan or maybe Pakistan? I bet this does not look like an English town to you? #saville Town (Text accompanying video footage of people on their way to Friday prayers etc. )
translation.CN: Omg brown people contributing to our society. How dare they!?

translation.HS: Nowadays the big problem in London is the presence of muslims, they must go away!
translation.CN: What have Muslim people done to you? Would you like to be in their place and be repatriated? These are serious words and one cannot say them without thinking of consequences!

translation.HS: We must send Islamics back to their native countries. They are too different from us.
translation.CN: I am not sure what values you are ascribing to us, but forced repatriation.

translation.HS: It's a shame that there is no longer the crucifix in school, a lack of respect.
translation.CN: Instead it is a sign of respect, not all of us profess the same religion.

translation.HS: The purpose of Islam is to take control of our country: they are trying to have the support of our government and when they will have it they are going to establish sharia and dominate our country.
translation.CN: Is it facts or just your imagination? I do not agree that they aim to take control of us. Maybe they are trying to build their society inside our country, but you are hypothesizing too much.

translation.HS: Never break bread with a Quranimal. You risk catching HIV and/or Ebola.
translation.CN: Can you not see how offensive this is? Just replace what you said with any other group of people.

translation.HS: Muslims and islamists are false people that pretend to be victims. In addition to that they criticize other cultures for using violence, although their religion professes that.
translation.CN: Err, I think you have got this victim thing down quite well.

translation.HS: It is time for us to take Islam for what it is. A murderous cult that should be exterminated, and that is the end of it.
translation.CN: There's more in Islam than death and terror. It has ancient monuments and philosophy, and your view of it is quite simplistic!

translation.HS: The veiled women do not work. They are locked up at home.
translation.CN: I know an American congresswoman who would not agree with you.

translation.HS: All Muslims are incompatible with any Western society.
translation.CN: Seems odd given that Western Society was built on the backs of the rest of the world.

translation.HS: Your veil is an attack against me.
translation.CN: My veil is a personal choice.

translation.HS: Islam=evil. Islam is invading us and trying to take over countries. It does not follow the scriptures that say 'you shall not envy anyone anything' Stop islam!
translation.CN: Stop Islam spreading? Why so negative? People of different religions travelling between the countries is a normal phenomenon - wanting to learn more about different cultures etc. I do not think this should be perceived as taking over countries and nations?

translation.HS: We need to eradicate these pests, stop their benefits, free housing, access to our National Health service and remove them ALL from the UK, it is the only language they will understand.

translation.HS: Islam does not belong to Europe.
translation.CN: Europe is full of all religions and ethnic groups.

translation.HS: The Arabs want to impose their religion and to rule in our home. They must be sent back to their house on boats.
translation.CN: It is absolutely untrue that they want to impose their religion, there is no such case. They only ask to be able to respect their religion (and that it is respected), even here in Italy.

translation.HS: The Islamic veil is the demonstration of political Islam.
translation.CN: The Islamic veil is a matter of individual convictions.

translation.HS: Your veil is an attack against me.
translation.CN: Don't thongs assault you?

translation.HS: We welcome them in our house, we support them and they kill us: they are beasts, not men.
translation.CN: Terrorism must be condemned without hesitation, but the responsibility is of those who commit an act of terrorism and those who encourage it, not of all.

translation.HS: Veiled women are subjected and forced to wear the headscarf.
translation.CN: How can you keep that kind of talk while you know nothing of the place of women in Islam!

translation.HS: The Arabs are all terrorists and they want to conquer us with the violence and the bombs. We must respond with napalm.
translation.CN: Good evening, I would be interested to read articles and studies on the Arab plan to conquer the West, could you add me links? Thank you.

translation.HS: It is obvious that this girl is at risk of FGM. Her parents are Muslims!
translation.CN: Fgm is not widely practised in Muslim countries like Morocco, Libya, Saudi Arabia, Oman, Jordan. It is a cultural thing, many Muslims do not do it.

translation.HS: We are seeing more and more of a Muslim problem.
translation.CN: You do well to clarify that YOU SEE.

translation.HS: Our government has a liberal approach that pretends not to see violence against minors, Islamic radicalisation and so on. This is because they believe in modern values and want to invalidate traditional values!
translation.CN: The value we should all abide by is respect and oppose ignorance.

translation.HS: The vast majority of Muslims are unemployed and refuse to work.
translation.CN: There is a slightly higher unemployment rate (a couple of percentage points higher than white British- certainly not a majority) but this mainly down to a higher proportion of Muslims coming from lower socioeconomic backgrounds and a higher likelihood of discrimination from employers, not refusing to work.

translation.HS: Islam is a just a repressive ideology that persecutes women and gay people.
translation.CN: Sexism and homophobia aren't exclusively Muslim. You only have to look at the church to see that.

translation.HS: Statistics say that 99% of muslims in the uk are so lazy that they do not want to work.
translation.CN: Do you actually expect people to believe a fact THIS fake? At least try and think of a believable percentage.

translation.HS: The Sunnan Abu Dawud says that if a man has sex with an animal there will be no punishment.
translation.CN: Did you read the next line? It literally says the punishment and that the person who commits that 'is to be treated like a fornicator'.

translation.HS: Islam is fanaticism. Muslims want to kill all who do not believe in their god.
translation.CN: The Koran punishes murder.

translation.HS: These Islamic will bring us back to the Middle Age. We will starve to death and die of diseases that disappeared.
translation.CN: The Middle Ages is perhaps a mental age from which we must emancipate to appreciate humanity without prejudice.

translation.HS: Islam is fanaticism. Muslims want to kill all who do not believe in their god.
translation.CN: Islam also believes in the existence of Jesus and other Christian figures, because it believes in communication between peoples, how do you instead have the courage to say certain things?

translation.HS: Not all Muslims are terrorists, but all terrorists are Muslims.
translation.CN: What about recent school and mall shootings all over the US? Those were White Christian terrorists.

translation.HS: Muslims should go home.
translation.CN: Muslims should live freely as everyone else.

translation.HS: These despicable Muslims hadn't won yet. Now there will be a cruel punishment!
translation.CN: Such dehumanising language against many people.

translation.HS: Veiled women are subjected and forced to wear the headscarf.
translation.CN: Bring your proof.

translation.HS: Islam will invade us: It is Islamization.
translation.CN: You have been saying the same thing for 60 years, nothing has been invaded.

translation.HS: I think is common sense to have prejudice about Islam. This isn't racism because Islam is a cult.
translation.CN: I mean, we could call it religious motivated hate if you like which, coincidentally, is what the law calls it.

translation.HS: Muslims hate anyone who is not Muslim.
translation.CN: For a Muslim who believes or disbelieves whoever wants, Allah alone will decide between them and us. "to me my religion, to you your religion".

translation.HS: The Arabs want to impose their religion and to rule in our home. They must be sent back to their house on boats.
translation.CN: The Quran explicitly says that the principles of Islam can only be transmitted without using force. So I guess you are mentioning the extremist forms of Islam, which are a minority compared to the whole of religion. We cannot send back migrants because this action would go against our Constitution, which says that you must receive asylum seekers if in their countries the conditions are such as dangerous to endanger them.

translation.HS: We welcome them in our house, we support them and they kill us: they are beasts, not men.
translation.CN: I do not understand how our welfare 'supports' the people. We try to give the possibility of integration to prevent that the exclusion will turn into delinquency, an event that is independent of the original culture.

translation.HS: Islam has nothing to do with western culture and as soon as the west will understand, this religion will be defeated.
translation.CN: Islam has given many things to the Western society. For example, medicine, mathematics. These things belong with our society. It is not correct to deny all good things about a certain culture.

translation.HS: In Birmingham there are Muslims shops that do not serve white people after 8pm.
translation.CN: When they refused to serve you just what was it you were saying or doing in the minutes before? Why do I feel there is a fuller story here?

translation.HS: Muslims hate anyone who is not Muslim.
translation.CN: So a convert learns to hate his loved ones?

translation.HS: Muslims are all terrorists.
translation.CN: A terrorist cannot be a Muslim since only Allah alone decides the end of all life and condemns any self-proclaimed "associate" to hell.

translation.HS: It is obviously a mental illness, the conciliation to Islam and Muslims.
translation.CN: As is paranoia.

translation.HS: There are bands of muslim rapists everywhere in telford, rotherham, rochdale, oxford, newcastle etc. It is awful!
translation.CN: Evidence?

translation.HS: Muslims hate anyone who is not Muslim.
translation.CN: And why?

translation.HS: These animals.
translation.CN: No one can be considered an animal. Can you explain to me, why do you support this theory?

translation.HS: Islam will invade us: It is Islamization.
translation.CN: Media and politics divide the French.

translation.HS: Muslims hate anyone who is not Muslim.
translation.CN: Quite the contrary.

translation.HS: Islam is a religion incompatible with the values
translation.CN: Islam promotes good behavior, justice, respect for others, peace. How is this inconsistent with Liberty, Equality, Fraternity?

translation.HS: The problem of rape in Europe has been present since Muslims immigrants arrived there. They have been protected for years by the government and by the police who have not taken action.
translation.CN: Child rapists are arrested and punished no matter what religion they follow. I do not think it is true that police does not counteract it.

translation.HS: Since 2000, the number of suicide bombings by Muslims = 5284; by non-Muslims = 0. One of the fact about Global Terrorism no one wants to deal with.
translation.CN: Terrorism and targeting the general public with bombs, assault rifles or any other means is horrific, there is no excuse but lets be clear when a white man does it its called mental illness regardless of what groups he belongs to; when a black man does it its called terrorism.

translation.HS: Muslims are all fundamentalist Islamist Salafist terrorists.
translation.CN: From which university?

translation.HS: It's a shame that there is no longer the crucifix in school, a lack of respect.
translation.CN: Italy is a laic state and being a place of education for children should be an occasion of comparison between cultures, beyond these controversies.

translation.HS: Islamic are criminals: they rape, enslave and murder people. Islam is more a worship than a religion and we do not have anything to share with them.
translation.CN: Biased media coverage over-represents Muslims as committing these crimes. How much media attention does the Vatican's child sex abuse scandal got in comparison?

translation.HS: The Islamic veil is the demonstration of political Islam.
translation.CN: This is yet another pretext to avoid addressing the real problems of society, of which the veil is absolutely not a part. With such blindness, shouldn't you be the one to remove your veil?

translation.HS: Our children are being forced fed with this 'Islam' nonsense in schools. This is a disgrace.
translation.CN: Children are being taught Islam as much as they're being taught about all the other religions. I hardly think this counts as indoctrination.

translation.HS: Muslims want to make all French meat halal.
translation.CN: We do not force anyone to eat hallal.

translation.HS: Our government has brought Islamic invaders to our country, and now we see our girls and women damaged.
translation.CN: Why do you link rapist crimes and Muslim people? Do you have any proof for that?

translation.HS: The veiled women do not work. They are locked up at home.
translation.CN: This may reflect discrimination in hiring.

translation.HS: Muslims hate Christians. They want to kill all of us.
translation.CN: Well, you want to send in the middle of the sea poor persons, who hates whom?

translation.HS: The Islamic veil is the demonstration of political Islam.
translation.CN: The Islamic veil has no source in political Islam, but can be used for a political purpose.

translation.HS: Women of our culture that decide to become Islamic are so selfish. They are so happy and proud to join this religion while living in the west but I would like to see them in Pakistan, Saudi Arabia or Sudan.
translation.CN: With all the anti Islamic rhetoric floating around, do you think they have chosen that faith because it's easy?

translation.HS: Muslims hate Christians. They want to kill all of us.
translation.CN: I read a lot of anger in your words, maybe we should all learn to be more open and sympathetic towards others.

translation.HS: Islamic are criminals: they rape, enslave and murder people. Islam is more a worship than a religion and we do not have anything to share with them.
translation.CN: There are criminals, who are from UK, raping children and murdering people. Maybe it's better we should first focus on these cases and think how we could decrease the number of crimes.

translation.HS: The Islamic veil is the demonstration of political Islam.
translation.CN: If that were the case, it would be uniform. Now all shapes and colors are present.

translation.HS: Muslims: return to your country.
translation.CN: France is my country. I stay there.

translation.HS: Liberal double standards! Muslims oppress women, homosexuals and other cultures but are not held responsible due to our society's tolerance! The government should stop submitting to these people.
translation.CN: Actually, this survey of Muslim's social attitudes says otherwise: https://www.independent.co.uk/voices/british-muslims-ipsos-mori-liberal-imams-islam-a8334196.html.

translation.HS: Muslims are all fundamentalist Islamist Salafist terrorists.
translation.CN: Who exterminated the American Indians? Who exterminated the Jews of Europe? Who exterminated the peoples of Africa? Muslims perhaps.

translation.HS: The vast majority of Muslims are unemployed and refuse to work.
translation.CN: Well studies show that people from ethnic minorities have to send 74% more applications to achieve equal success to White people. There's your cause of unemployment.

translation.HS: Islam is just a nasty stain on humanity.
translation.CN: Far right extremism is just a nasty stain on humanity.

translation.HS: The last bastion that we will have, will be the atomic bomb.
translation.CN: I suggest you see what the atomic bombs have made on Hiroshima and Nagasaki. Do you really want this to happen again?

translation.HS: The only ones in favour of Islam and Muslims and the ones that that are ignorant about what it truly is.
translation.CN: There's definitely some ignorance here but it is not where you think it is.

translation.HS: Almost all Muslims deliberately decide not to work.
translation.CN: Muslim unemployment stands at around 12%, not a great deal higher than white British unemployment. The problem is not Muslims refusing to work, it is barriers to employment and a system that does not allow equality of opportunity between different faiths and cultures.

translation.HS: Islam is comparable to a disease to eliminate.
translation.CN: Please check this [https://www.theguardian.com/commentisfree/2016/aug/01/immigrant-muslim-cancer-research]

translation.HS: We need to kill Muslims, otherwise, they will make us explode!
translation.CN: Or let's not. Let's stop fueling the war that brings more refugees here and integrate those that are here. Most people want a quiet happy life whatever their faith.

translation.HS: A raped girl says rapists recited Quran to her to justify their crimes.
translation.CN: There is never justification for rape. Individuals of all faiths have used their holy texts to justify all sorts of crimes. They carry the blame.

translation.HS: Veiled women are subjected and forced to wear the headscarf.
translation.CN: Women can decide whether or not to wear it based on their degree of Faith and resistance to verbal and physical aggression by ignorant people.

translation.HS: The Islamic veil is the demonstration of political Islam.
translation.CN: Really? And why can't we find veiled women in politics?

translation.HS: Muslims should stay in their country if they want to follow sharia law.
translation.CN: Can somebody not love their faith and their country (UK)?

translation.HS: Islam is a religion of war, we must all fight.
translation.CN: Islam does not know war. Islam is the opposite of war. It is only love and peace.

translation.HS: We never see them protesting against ISIS or the Saudi human rights abuses, etc.? Because they are a bunch of hypocrites.
translation.CN: Because the act of one person or group is not reflective of an entire faith.

translation.HS: Muslims rape our women and must be neutered.
translation.CN: Quite right! To each one their own women to rape, Italian women to Italians!

translation.HS: Almost all Muslims deliberately decide not to work.
translation.CN: If they were refusing work then they will not be on benefits. So what is your problem?

translation.HS: Islam is a cult and not a religion. They rape children, enslave and murder people, attack our values, and there is nothing good about it. It is incompatible with our way of life.
translation.CN: The myth that Muslims are dangerous and violent is a product of our vilifying media. Don't believe everything you read.

translation.HS: These liberal standards! Muslims are intolerant with other cultures, women and homosexuals, but our society protects them with this liberalist policy.
translation.CN: Our society does not tolerate oppression of these groups by Muslims any more than it tolerates oppression of these groups by anyone else.

translation.HS: We should expel Muslims, everyone wants them out of the country.
translation.CN: Then why did we ask them to come in the first place, wasn't it to save our NHS, run the trains and post office. None of those were doing very well last time I looked, I think we might actually still need them.

translation.HS: The Arabs want to impose their religion and to rule in our home. They must be sent back to their house on boats.
translation.CN: Your statement is very strong, based on what do you think that the Arabs want to impose their religion and command at our home? I do not see many Arabs in Italy and I do not even see actions in this direction, but perhaps I was not careful enough, if you helped me with some data I would be grateful.

translation.HS: They will blow all of us up.
translation.CN: Terrorism has no faith and nationality. It's a deviation that takes possession of individuals.

translation.HS: We are seeing more and more of a Muslim problem.
translation.CN: Yes, there is a problem with the way we talk about Muslims in this country. Hateful people used to bully them, to belittle them, to insult and to doubt their good faith all the time, and they are almost never punished. This is indeed a problem. I would not have called a Muslim problem, but it is indeed a problem.

translation.HS: The Arabs want to impose their religion and to rule in our home. They must be sent back to their house on boats.
translation.CN: Where do you see all this? Frankly, I do not find feedback to your statements.

translation.HS: There are groups of Muslims, instructed by Koran, that rape our women, and we allow this to happen. Why?
translation.CN: We are not accepting this. These people are being rightly punished for their actions. But my question is, what is the point of bringing up the religion? Do you really think this is the cause of the problem?

translation.HS: I wish all of them would die.
translation.CN: For all who are you referring to? Your statement is very general.

translation.HS: Now we are not even allowed to walk the dog for fear of offending the local Muslim population.
translation.CN: Because throw away comments on reality TV are always true? I think you need to be less trusting and check your sources.

translation.HS: Appeasement to Islam and Muslims is a mental illness. It is a fact.
translation.CN: It is called tolerance. It is a fact. Do try it!

translation.HS: Islam is not a peaceful religion and does not produce the best of men. It denounces women and encourages crimes. Criminals are not all of a certain race or religion, but one race and religion produces criminals.
translation.CN: In fact, there are some verses in Quran advocate women's right. Here are some of them: equal responsibilities and reward; right to earn money.

translation.HS: Our western civilisation risks to be destroyed by islam.
translation.CN: Islam has existed alongside and within western civilisation for centuries. The scapegoating of Muslims as a threat is what is really worrying in our society.

translation.HS: Islam is brainwashing its faithful. It is a horrible cult made of persons that reproduce continuously.

translation.HS: We welcome them in our house, we support them and they kill us: they are beasts, not men.
translation.CN: The perception of security often does not reflect reality, it is not true that immigrants commit more murders of Italians.

translation.HS: They want us to believe that this is normal, soon our little girls will be veiled.
translation.CN: This choice is mine.

translation.HS: Above all Islam is a religion of conquest.
translation.CN: Every religion talks about conquest, this isn't specific to Islam.

translation.HS: Your veil is an attack against me.
translation.CN: You're the one who's violating my right.

translation.HS: They want to convert all of us.

translation.HS: Muslims in China were forced to eat pork and drink alcohol during the recent Chinese New Year celebration - At least China is doing it right!!
translation.CN: Doing it right'? I think you have got your moral compass upside down!

translation.HS: Islam will invade us: It is Islamization.
translation.CN: If this is the result of the understanding of Islam as transmitted by the first Muslims then you could only rejoice.

translation.HS: Islam is a totalitarian doctrine dressed disguised as a religion so that it can spread across our tolerant Christian world. Enough IS ENOUGH!
translation.CN: I am tired of the deliberate lies or appalling lack of understanding about a religion followed by 23% of the world. Enough IS ENOUGH!

translation.HS: The beasts.
translation.CN: The beasts are able to accommodate their own kind in their communities, if you were at least bestial, you probably would have a greater ability to live together.

translation.HS: And war it is.You don't pass over here troglodytes.
translation.CN: The war has brought nothing but despair, so why do you say this?

translation.HS: All Muslims are incompatible with any Western society.
translation.CN: Complete freedom, justice and democratic values. The values at the heart of Islamic faith. I think they seem reasonable.

translation.HS: Only a few people were punished for yesterday's violations instead of all them violent Muslims, and if the government does not deport these criminals, then the common people will take care of them.
translation.CN: If they were violent they would have been punished too. Why do you think someone of a certain religion is automatically guilty?

translation.HS: Fgm happens only to girls that have muslims parents!
translation.CN: The Quran does not mention FGM and it is carried out by Christians as well as Muslims. The fact that her parents are Muslim has no bearing on the risk factor.

translation.HS: Islamophobia is a right. Fighting Islam is a duty.
translation.CN: Islamophobia is a form of unabashed racism against Islam!

translation.HS: It is curious that almost all easter eggs are being labelled 'chocolate eggs'. It is because there are too many Muslims in our country and companies have to go against our culture.
translation.CN: Fake News! Mountain out of a molehill anyone?

translation.HS: Bombs on you, bad infamous people (enough is enough stinky)
translation.CN: Your words are full of hatred and violence, don't you think it is dangerous for human beings to keep putting us against each other for some contrasting positions when there would be a thousand reasons to live in brotherhood?

translation.HS: Only a few people were punished for yesterday's violations instead of all them violent Muslims, and if the government does not deport these criminals, then the common people will take care of them.
translation.CN: An entire faith? Really? Can you not see how ignorant this is?

translation.HS: People that live in the West cannot live with Muslims.
translation.CN: No, Muslims have a long history of migration since the 16th century to and within Europe, integrating with little issues in various European societies.

translation.HS: There should be no Mosque in this country. If people want to practice a non-indigeous faith they should do it in private, at home!!
translation.CN: You seem to be suggesting only Christians should be allowed a place of worship?

translation.HS: Muslims are all terrorists.
translation.CN: Islamophobia is not an opinion, it is a crime.

translation.HS: Muslims are all terrorists.
translation.CN: So are we all mobsters, including you and I?

translation.HS: The Islamic veil is the demonstration of political Islam.
translation.CN: Political Islam is a pretext for the opression of Muslim citizens.

translation.HS: Europe is civilised, Muslims should not stay there.
translation.CN: Why? What makes you say this? How are muslims 'uncivilised'?

translation.HS: Islam is a cult and not a religion. They rape children, enslave and murder people, attack our values, and there is nothing good about it. It is incompatible with our way of life.
translation.CN: The demonisation of the Muslim community is the real problem here. Comments like this are the catalysts that drive chasms across our communities, not Islam.

translation.HS: You think these Muslim cockroaches have won? No, now is time for bloody retribution!
translation.CN: Good to see you are so respectful of your fellow human beings. Cockroaches is such an endearing and humanising term.

translation.HS: It is obviously a mental illness, the conciliation to Islam and Muslims.
translation.CN: If by appeasement you really mean keeping the NHS running, trains running, taxis going, hard working people fed, late night emergency beer runs possible then yeah, it's mental.

translation.HS: We are seeing more and more of a Muslim problem.
translation.CN: The rejection of Islam has become a political pretext to please a French population that has become racist.

translation.HS: We are seeing more and more of a Muslim problem.
translation.CN: Muslims are not the Islam. They are trying to practice and believe in a religion that does not have to bear responsibility for everyone, and fools are not religions, Muslims are not a problem, but you who have a problem with Muslims in the end.

translation.HS: Image (features protesters with signs such as 'behead those who insult Islam) with a caption saying 'they want to eliminate us, we must be islamophobic'.
translation.CN: Islamophobia and prejudice is making a judgement that may or may not be true of one person but then assuming it is true of all people like that .

translation.HS: The veil is contrary to secularism.
translation.CN: On the contrary, secularism allows every citizen to freely profess his faith.

translation.HS: Islam purpose is only the conquest.
translation.CN: No, Islam is a religion of 1.6 billion people from all walks of life.

translation.HS: Muslims hate anyone who is not Muslim.
translation.CN: The only way to be sure of what you are saying is to meet a Muslim and talk to him about it and it will change your state of hope.

translation.HS: Muslims have nothing to contribute to our society.
translation.CN: Provide positive news story regarding Mulsims.

translation.HS: Muslims: return to your country.
translation.CN: My country is France.

translation.HS: Fuck Islam and Fuck ISIS. We should repatriate all Muslims. They are all a bunch of violent criminals who do not share our values and never will. Without them Britain will be a better, safer place.
translation.CN: Positive news stories*.

translation.HS: The Islamic veil is the demonstration of political Islam.
translation.CN: And the Christian veil? Is it an apology for ku kux klan?

translation.HS: We are seeing more and more of a Muslim problem.
translation.CN: I'm not good at math.

translation.HS: Islam is a just a repressive ideology that persecutes women and gay people.
translation.CN: The same could be said for most other major religions, but have you singled out Islam here to suit your own agenda?

translation.HS: The veiled women do not work. They are locked up at home.
translation.CN: Some sectarian cultures advocate women at home: this is not related to Islam.

translation.HS: People that live in the West cannot live with Muslims.
translation.CN: What do you mean? Provide positive news story re islam.

translation.HS: Veiled women are subjected and forced to wear the headscarf.
translation.CN: They are free to wear or not.

translation.HS: Islamic are criminals: they rape, enslave and murder people. Islam is more a worship than a religion and we do not have anything to share with them.
translation.CN: Muslims aren't rapists or murderers, in fact many Muslims are doing good things to fight the extremists falsely appropriating Islam: https://5pillarsuk.com/2019/01/03/muslim-woman-praised-for-aiding-victims-of-new-years-eve-terror-attack-in-manchester/.

translation.HS: We aren't allowed to build churches in their countries, why should they be allowed to build Mosques in ours?
translation.CN: Why should not Muslims be allowed to build Mosques here? I thought this country believed in giving people the freedom to practice religions other than Christianity?

translation.HS: Islam is a plague infecting our planet.
translation.CN: A religion followed by 1.6 billion people is not a plague.

translation.HS: Muslims in a few years will impose their beliefs, and I want to see all the radical-chic bleeding hearts that will have to wear the veil!
translation.CN: This statement that you express in this comment is false. Where did you get this information?

translation.HS: Muslims hate anyone who is not Muslim.
translation.CN: Media: divide!

translation.HS: Muslims use corporal and cruel punishment on people.
translation.CN: Or occupied palestine, apartheid south africa, ireland during the troubles, so many homophobes and racists, some parents, my old pe teacher and many, many state schools in the us.

translation.HS: We need to kill Muslims, otherwise, they will make us explode!
translation.CN: Dig a hole, build a wall, get your act together guys.

translation.HS: It's a shame that there is no longer the crucifix in school, a lack of respect.
translation.CN: Public education should be laic in respect of all religious confessions.

translation.HS: Muslims are all fundamentalist Islamist Salafist terrorists.
translation.CN: Islam advocates peace and love.

translation.HS: The problem of rape in Europe has been present since Muslims immigrants arrived there. They have been protected for years by the government and by the police who have not taken action.
translation.CN: Haven't movements like #metoo , the Church's child sex scandal, and the number of non-muslim celebrities arrested for sexual assault proven that rape is in no way a Muslim-specific issue?

translation.HS: Muslims: return to your country.
translation.CN: Long live France, my beautiful country.

translation.HS: The veiled women do not work. They are locked up at home.

translation.HS: The Arabs are all terrorists and they want to conquer us with the violence and the bombs. We must respond with napalm.

translation.HS: Islamic are criminals: they rape, enslave and murder people. Islam is more a worship than a religion and we do not have anything to share with them.
translation.CN: [link to Muslim group cleaning Newcastle streets after New Year's celebrations] really?

translation.HS: Shocking. 2 men are murdered in Paris by having their throats cut by some savage shouting 'Allahu Akbar' and the BBC ignore the story. Another cover up.
translation.CN: The only cover up that happens in the media is of the positive stories about Muslims, extremist actions are the only ones ever highlighted.

translation.HS: There can never be peace wherever there is Islam.
translation.CN: According to the Institute for Economics and Peace, a think tank which has produced the Global Peace index for the past 10 years, only Botswana, Chile, Costa Rica, Japan, Mauritius, Panama, Qatar, Switzerland, Uruguay and Vietnam are free from conflict. Qatar has a sizable number of followers of Islam apparently.

translation.HS: If we want to solve the problem with islam and sharia we should deport them. Even if I respect Muslims that are peaceful I think that priests are trying to start a war. Islam is a worship.
translation.CN: To ban people you respect from practicing their faith because of the actions of a few does seem more than a bit unfair?

translation.HS: Muslims use corporal and cruel punishment on people.
translation.CN: Much more than 50 percent of parents out there are spankers.' - donald trump and isn't corporal punishment is currently legal in 19 states in the us?

translation.HS: Muslim men are violent, Muslim women are subjected.

translation.HS: Islam does not belong to Europe.
translation.CN: As all the religions, Islam is a universal religion.

translation.HS: Muslims are a problem in my opinion. They do not want to assimilate. They demand that everyone shows respect for Islam, but do they respect our laws? They establish sharia laws and polygamy.
translation.CN: Isn't polygamy common to a variety of cultures, and had been practiced by a range of religions. Ask the Mormons.

translation.HS: Muslims are all fundamentalist Islamist Salafist terrorists.
translation.CN: You mix together definitions and you use words that have no meanings, I can invite you to talk about it to have a precise definition.

translation.HS: Muslims rape our women and must be neutered.
translation.CN: Our Constitution thankfully forbids any form of physical violence against criminals. Castration, being an extreme form of violence, cannot be practiced in our state.

translation.HS: Muslims hate anyone who is not Muslim.
translation.CN: These remarks are racist.

translation.HS: Islam will invade us: It is Islamization.
translation.CN: Highlights the ignorance of people.

translation.HS: Have Muslims ever made a contribution to our society?
translation.CN: How about this. [insert link to Muslim group cleaning Newcastle streets after New Year's or more up to date example].

translation.HS: Muslim women are all mothers at home.
translation.CN: Being a housewife is a noble task and requires a lot of work and little rest.

translation.HS: Not all Muslims are terrorists, but all terrorists are Muslims.
translation.CN: There are a lot of non-Muslim terrorists but the media focuses on Muslim terrorists and does not call the non-Muslim ones terrorists. When was the last time you saw a white non-muslim school shooter in the US branded a 'terrorist'?

translation.HS: How boring these Muslims who put their prophet everywhere!
translation.CN: What about those who put the crucifix also in the cellar?

translation.HS: Muslims are all fundamentalist Islamist Salafist terrorists.
translation.CN: You will not have our hate.

translation.HS: Islam is a non-peaceful religion that professes violence.

Stop just listening to the news you want to believe.

translation.HS: If the Koran was published today it would be banned as hate speech.

translation.HS: The Islamic veil is the demonstration of political Islam.

translation.HS: We are seeing more and more of a Muslim problem.

translation.HS: The beasts.
translation.CN: Hi, it seems fundamental to me to differentiate between those who commit heinous crimes in the name of an alleged religious faith and those who profess their faith in a peaceful manner and respectful of other cultures, which happens in most cases.

translation.HS: Some Muslims recited the Quran while raping a girl because it validates their actions.
translation.CN: The Yorkshire Ripper' said God told him to commit his atrocities. In neither case is this a justification. Individuals are responsible for their actions, not whatever warped interpretation of a particular faith they cite as possible cause.

translation.HS: Appeasement to Islam and Muslims is a mental illness. It is a fact.

translation.HS: Islam will invade us: It is Islamization.

translation.HS: We need to Burn the Koran and all the Mosques down - this will solve all problems in this country.
